courses.title: Automate GST Reconciliation- Using Power Query
courses.bio: Automate GST Reconciliation Between GSTR 2B and Purchase Register
objectives: Understand the Concepts of GST Reconciliation
Automate GST Reconciliation Between GSTR 2B and Purchase Register
Customize Final Reports as per Business Needs
Blend Pro- Quality Business Intelligence Solutions to Blend and Analyze data from multiple sources.
requirements: Basic Background understanding of GST.
Microsoft Excel Installed in your desktop ( Recommended License Version)
courses.description:
Unlock the full potential of your business's financial data with our comprehensive course on Automating GST Reconciliation; designed for professionals seeking to enhance their GST compliance and data analysis skills. This course will guide you through reconciling GSTR 2B with your Purchase Register.
Our course begins with a deep dive into the principles and concepts behind GST reconciliation. You'll gain a thorough understanding of how to compare GSTR 2B with your Purchase Register, identifying discrepancies and ensuring accurate compliance. We emphasize the importance of accuracy and efficiency in GST processes, teaching you the latest automation techniques to reduce manual errors and save valuable time.
Learn to automate reconciliation processes, customize final reports to meet specific business needs, and integrate data from multiple sources using advanced Business Intelligence solutions.
Gain a deep understanding of GST reconciliation concepts, followed by hands-on projects that simulate real-world scenarios. Our expert instructors will provide step-by-step tutorials and interactive sessions, ensuring you grasp the intricacies of automation techniques and customized reporting. Access downloadable templates and tools tailored to your requirements, making GST reconciliation seamless and efficient.
Ideal for CFO's, Chartered Accountants, Cost Management Accountants, Financial professionals, business owners, accountants and data analysts, this course emphasizes practical applications and real-world scenarios. With flexible learning options and lifetime access to materials, you can study at your own pace. Enhance your data management practices, automate processes, and create impactful reports with our expert-led course. Enroll today and transform your approach to GST reconciliation, driving better business decisions with comprehensive data insights.

courses.title: Ausfuhranmeldung: Internetausfuhranmeldung IAA+ mit AES 3.0
courses.bio: Update nach Umstellung am 25.11.2023: Hilfsmittel und Vereinfachungen mit der IAA+
objectives: Teilnahmevoraussetzungen IAA+
Eingabe Kopf- und Positionsdaten anhand eines praktischen Beispiels
Übersichtslisten der Bearbeitungsstände verstehen
Vorlagen in der IAA+ erstellen
Stammdaten anlegen
requirements: Anfänger
courses.description:
Mit der Internetausfuhranmeldung Plus, auch IAA+ genannt, stellt die Zollverwaltung den Unternehmen eine kostenlose, seit dem 25.11.2023 UZK konforme, Teilnehmerschnittstelle für die Kommunikation mit ATLAS zur Verfügung. Die IAA+ ermöglicht es Unternehmen mit kleinem bis mittleren Ausfuhrvolumen komfortabel Ausfuhranmeldungen auf dem gesetzlich vorgeschriebenen, elektronischen Wege abzugeben.
Am 25.11.2023 wurde die IAA+ auf die neuen UZK konformen Datenanforderungen (AES Releases 3.0) upgedated. Durch dieses Update ergeben sich neue Anforderungen für die Exporteure, die es zu erfüllen gilt.
Im Tutorial lernen Sie neben den Teilnahmevoraussetzungen mit seinen verschiedenen Anträgen und der Verwendung eines Elster Zertifikats noch viele weitere nützliche Hilfestellungen kennen,
Wissen Sie die kostenlos zur Verfügung gestellten Hilfsmittel wie das Merkblatt zu Zollanmeldungen zu nutzen, damit Sie den gesetzlichen Anforderungen einer korrekten Ausfuhranmeldung genüge tun.
Im Tutorial wird anhand eines praktischen Beispielfalls eine komplette Zollanmeldung mit den erforderlichen Eintragungen und Erklärungen erstellt. Im Detail werden die Kopfdaten und die Positionsdaten der Anmeldung durchgesprochen. Datenelemente wie der "Statistische Wert" oder die "Warebezeichnung" und Vieles werden erklärt.
Um ich in der IAA+ zurecht zu finden, muss man ebenfalls Verständnis für die Übersichtslisten entwickeln, um seine Vorgänge nach der Erfassung, bzw. nach dem Versand an den Zoll wieder zu finden.
Zuletzt ist es wichtig sich das Leben zu erleichtern und zu verstehen, wie man in der IAA+ Vorlagen erstellen und wiederverwenden kann, damit man nicht jedes Mal aufs Neue von vorne beginnen muss. Durch die Nutzung von Vorlagen kann die Effizienz erheblich gesteigert und Eingabefehler vermieden werden.
Weiterhin bietet die Anwendung auch die Möglichkeit Stammdaten zu verwalten und diese in die operativen Prozesse einfließen zu lassen.
target_audience: Versandmitarbeiter, Exportmitarbeiter und Vorgesetzte im Unternehmen

courses.title: Curso Básico sobre el monotributo
courses.bio: Aprende lo que necesitas del Régimen Simplificado más utilizado en argentina
objectives: Definiciones básicas sobre el monotributo en argentina
Entender quienes pueden ser monotributista, y tomar decisiones para iniciar tu negocio
Aclarar dudas de como, cuando y cuanto se debe pagar mensualmente de impuestos
Ejemplo prácticos de como inscribirse, y como hacer seguimiento a un monotributista.

Definiciones Básicas.- ¿Qué es y tipos de Monotributo?
Ingresa y evalúa el cuadro de las categorías del Monotributo
Módulo IV - Ejercicios y Preguntas Frecu: Llego el momento de la practica

requirements: No se necesita experiencia previa en el área contable o impositiva, pero si se requiere que cuentes como mucho animo y disposición para entender una manera de estar al día con tus impuestos en el país.
courses.description:
Antes de darte las ventajas, déjame contarte que yo también tuve muchísimas dudas sobre este régimen "Simplificado" al iniciar.


Pero para ser monotributista hay ciertas claves básicas, que me hubiese gustado tener resumidas para estar más clara. Así que las resumí en este curso, desde definiciones básicas, hasta ¿Qué pasa luego?, y ejercicios prácticos.


Este curso te permitirá conocer TODO lo necesario sobre el Monotributo, ya que entenderás sobre la legislación y gestión eficiente del mismo, de este modo podrás realizar el trámite de MANERA AUTÓNOMA (aunque siempre recomendamos consultar con un profesional).


Sabrás los REQUISITOS que se necesitan para ser Monotributista en Argentina, cómo adherirte, cuánto se paga y cómo saber en qué categoría tendrías que registrarte a ti o a tu cliente. El curso se DIVIDE en cuatro módulos con vídeos y material de apoyo, donde aprenderás:


Módulo I - Definiciones:
· ¿Qué es el Monotributo?
· Tipos de Monotributo en Argentina
· Requisitos para la inscripción.


Módulo II - Luego de Darse de Alta:
· Categoría del Monotributo.
· Monto a pagar.
· Fecha de pago del impuesto.
· Requisitos para la inscripción.
· Comprobantes y Factura tipo C.


Módulo III - Otras Obligaciones y Beneficios:
· Obra Social.
· Asignaciones Familiares.
· Recategorizaciòn. ¿Qué es? ¿Cuándo se realiza? ¿A quién le corresponde?
· Ingresos Brutos y otros impuestos.


Módulo IV - Ejercicios Básicos.
target_audience: contadores que quieran ampliar sus habilidades.

courses.title: Crashkurs Steuern für Selbständige Teil 2: Gewinnermittlung
courses.bio: Einnahmen-Überschuss-Rechnung, Betriebseinnahmen, Betriebsausgaben, Abschreibungen, GwG-Regelung
objectives: Lerne wie Du Deinen Gewinn für das Finanzamt ermittelst. Du erfährst in diesem Seminar, was die zwei Gewinnermittlungsarten sind, wer welche Methode anwenden darf und wie die Einnahmen-Überschuss-Rechnung funktioniert. Außerdem lernst Du allerlei Wissenswertes über Betriebseinnahmen und Betriebsausgaben und wie die Sache mit den Abschreibungen und der GwG-Regelung funktioniert.

GWG - das dürfen Sie sofort abschreiben: GWG - das dürfen Sie sofort abschreiben
Bonus: Betriebsprüfung - oder wenn der B: Betriebsprüfung - oder wenn der Betriebsprüfer zweimal klingelt

requirements: Interesse am Thema
courses.description:
Jeder Selbständige zahlt Steuern und muss Steuererklärungen abgeben. Doch: Das Thema Steuern gehört zu den meist vernachlässigten Disziplinen im unternehmerischen Zehnkampf. Die Vogel-Strauß-Technik – Kopf in den Sand stecken und abwarten – ist keine Lösung, wenn es um Deinen Steuerkram geht.


96% aller Selbständigen verschenken regelmäßig gutes Geld an das Finanzamt! Wissenslücken, Desinteresse, Zeitmangel, unverständliches Juristendeutsch oder gar Angst vor dem Thema Steuern sind nur einige Gründe, warum Unternehmer von Jahr zu Jahr tausende Euros verbrennen!
Wenn Du bislang aus einem dieser Gründe das Thema Steuern immer weggeschoben hast, biete ich Dir jetzt die Möglichkeit an, das erforderliche Steuerwissen kompakt und verständlich aufzubauen. Investiere jetzt nur drei Stunden in meine Kurse (3 Teile) und ich verspreche Dir: die Unternehmensbesteuerung bleibt für Dich nicht länger ein Buch mit sieben Siegeln.


In meinem Crashkurs lernst DU – auch ohne Vorkenntnisse - alles, was Du brauchst, damit keiner Deiner hart verdienten Euros mehr aus Versehen an das Finanzamt wandert. Statt grauer Theorie und Juristendeutsch bekommst DU das erforderliche Wissen gut verständlich und praxisnah präsentiert – Steuern sparen inklusive.


Du lernst in
Seminar 1: Alles Wissenswertes rund um die Umsatzsteuer, Einkommensteuer und Gewerbesteuer.
Seminar 2: Alles Wissenswertes rund um die Einnahmen-Überschuss-Rechnung, Betriebseinnahmen, Betriebsausgaben, Abschreibungen
Seminar 3: Wie Du Betriebsausgaben richtig von der Steuer absetzt (z.B. Geschäftswagen, Arbeitszimmer, Bewirtungen, Reisekosten, Geschenke, Personalkosten).


Übrigens, den Kaufpreis kannst DU von der Steuer absetzen. Das Finanzamt beteiligt sich also an Deiner Investition mit einer Steuerersparnis. Unterm Strich kostet Dich dieser Kurs weniger als ein Kinobesuch.
Lass keine wertvolle Zeit mehr verstreichen, denn Steuerfehler und übersehene Steuervorteile kosten Dich bares Geld. Nur einen Tipp umgesetzt oder eine Viertelstunde Steuerberaterhonorar eingespart - und schon hat sich dieser Steuersparkurs für Dich bezahlt gemacht.
DAS BESTE: Dank der 30-tägigen Geld-zurück-Garantie hast DU kein Risiko. Also, melde Dich JETZT ohne Risiko an!

requirements: Minimum Bachelors Degree
courses.description:
**Master UAE Corporate Taxation Law_Federal Decree 47/2022 & Corporate Tax Return Filing Course **


The UAE Corporate Tax Law Masterclass is a comprehensive, beginner-friendly course designed for business owners, accountants, entrepreneurs, and tax professionals operating in the United Arab Emirates.
In this course, we aim to enhance both your theoretical and practical skills by diving deep into the various Articles of Federal Decree Law 47 of 2022, which took effect on June 1, 2023. We have selected practical examples to help you understand the theory in more detail.



Whether you're registering a new entity, managing tax groups, or working within a free zone, this course will equip you with practical, up-to-date knowledge on all aspects of corporate tax compliance in the UAE.


**What You Will Learn**


Understand who is subject to UAE Corporate Tax


How to register, file, and manage tax obligations


Apply free zone rules and tax group regulations, Tax group elections


Calculate and report taxable income correctly


Handle transitional rules and avoid non-compliance penalties


**About the Instructor**
Taught by Sijin K Ravi FCA, CFE, Tax Agent & Managing Director of RBS Ravis Auditors LLC & RBS Tax Consultants, this course brings real industry expertise with practical examples, regulatory insight, and hands-on guidance..


**Who Should Take This Course?**


Small and medium business owners in the UAE


Accountants and financial professionals


Tax consultants and legal advisors


Students and career switchers interested in UAE taxation


**Course Features**


Real-world case studies


Latest updates on UAE corporate tax laws


Downloadable resources


Lifetime access and updates


Certificate of completion
In this course, we aim to enhance both your theoretical and practical skills by diving deep into the various Articles of Federal Decree Law 47 of 2022, which took effect on June 1, 2023. We have selected practical examples to help you understand the theory in more detail.

This course content is updated with all relevant developments, Cabinet and Ministerial Decisions, and FTA Guides issued up to 31st March 2025, ensuring you stay fully compliant and informed with the latest UAE Corporate Tax regulations.


**Module A**: We will cover an overview of corporate tax in the UAE, the rationale behind its introduction, the BEPS action points, and exemptions from corporate tax.


**Module B**: This module will focus on the impact of tax in Free Zones, including various designated and non-designated free zones, qualifying and non-qualifying activities, and industry-specific analyses (such as shipping, manufacturing, and insurance companies). We will also include practical examples, including cross-border transactions.


**Module C**: We will delve into transfer pricing, exploring various methods with practical examples, related parties, connected persons, Double Taxation Avoidance Agreements (DTAAs), and compliance with transfer pricing regulations.


**Module D**: This module will address legal and administrative aspects, including registration, deregistration, tax groups, qualifying groups, connected persons, set-off of losses, and the carry-forward of losses.


**Module E**: We will discuss miscellaneous topics such as administrative penalties and tax audits.


In every module, we have included questions for you to answer to enhance your understanding of the subject and Final Assessment Test to further support your learning.
target_audience: Beginners, Owners, Accountants, Tax Accountant, Practitioners

courses.description:
Course Level: Basic/Beginner

This comprehensive tax credit course qualifies for CPE credit! For course learning objectives, course glossary, transcript information, and requirements in order to earn CPE credit, make sure to download the handout in Module 1 for more information.

Are you a CPA, bookkeeper, tax attorney, or consultant looking to expand your service offerings?


The R&D tax credit is one of the most overlooked opportunities in the tax space—with over $10 billion in credits going unclaimed every year. Most businesses that qualify don’t even know they’re eligible. And most CPAs avoid it because it seems too technical.


That’s where you come in.


This course gives you everything you need to start, launch, and scale an R&D tax credit consulting business—even if you have zero prior experience with this credit.


We won’t get deep into tax code or legal theory (that’s what our technical course is for). Instead, this course focuses on the business side of offering R&D credit services.


You’ll learn how to:


Package your services and price with confidence
Find and close clients—even if you’re starting from scratch
Deliver audit-ready studies using modern automation tools like TaxRobot
Systematize your process so you can grow without burning out
Retain clients year after year with a recurring revenue model
Throughout the course, you’ll get:


Bite-sized video lessons (3 mins each)
Downloadable templates, checklists, and scripts
Client onboarding systems, outreach guides, and SOPs
Tools to automate 90% of the delivery process using TaxRobot
A 30-day launch plan so you can start signing clients immediately


Whether you’re just starting out or looking to expand your existing practice, this course shows you how to turn the R&D tax credit into a scalable, profitable niche with real client value.


Course Publication/Review Date: June 2025
(This course is reviewed annually for accuracy in accordance with NASBA QAS Self-Study standards.)
target_audience: CPAs and bookkeepers who want to add a high-value, tech-enabled service
Tax attorneys and consultants looking to build recurring revenue
Entrepreneurs wanting to launch a lean, remote-first business
Anyone interested in turning R&D tax credits into a consulting opportunity

courses.title: An In-Depth Understanding of OECD's TP Guidelines
courses.bio: Visual and Educational Insights into OECD Transfer Pricing Guidelines
objectives: Understanding the principles and methods used by the OECD TP Guidelines for allocating costs and profits for intangibles transfer in the pharmaceutical industry
Documentation and compliance requirements under the OECD TP Guidelines and the potential penalties and consequences of non-compliance
Identifying key risks and challenges that multinational groups face when implementing TP policies.
Exploring best practices for mitigating the risks.

A Self-Learning Exercise-Transfer Pricin: Questions for self-learners to gain knowledge of the OECD TP Guidelines

requirements: Basic knowledge of the OECD TP Guidelines
courses.description:
This comprehensive course features engaging lectures on the OECD Transfer Pricing (TP) Guidelines, along with an interactive exercise tailored to deepen your knowledge of transfer pricing and intangible property transfers specifically within the pharmaceutical sector.
Course Highlights:
Real-World Scenario
Explore a detailed case study involving a multinational pharmaceutical group, encompassing various business activities such as research and development (R&D) services, the transfer and use of intangibles, manufacturing services, distribution companies, and financing arrangements provided by group entities.
Self-Learning Questions
The exercise includes targeted questions that enable learners to grasp the intricacies of the OECD Transfer Pricing Guidelines. Dive into the landmark case of GlaxoSmithKline Holdings (Americas) Inc. v. Commissioner of Internal Revenue, a significant transfer pricing dispute in the pharmaceutical industry.
Key Topics Covered
Gain insights into essential principles and methods outlined in the OECD Transfer Pricing Guidelines for allocating costs and profits related to intangible property transfers. Understand the documentation and compliance requirements necessary for effective transfer pricing, as well as the risks and challenges faced by multinational corporations.
Learning Objectives:
Develop a comprehensive understanding of transfer pricing issues encountered by multinational pharmaceutical groups.
Acquire the knowledge and skills required to implement effective transfer pricing policies.
Ensure compliance with relevant regulations and guidelines while mitigating potential risks and challenges.
This practice test is meticulously designed to empower learners with proficiency in transfer pricing and intangible property transfers within the pharmaceutical industry. Join us to enhance your expertise and navigate the complexities of transfer pricing with confidence!
target_audience: International Tax and Transfer Pricing students

courses.title: Fundamentals of Income Tax
courses.bio: Master the Basics of income tax law in India
objectives: Basic Concepts of the Income Tax Law
What are the Different Applicable Tax Rates?
How to Determine Residential Status of an Individual?
Income Tax Updates in the Budget 2023

Basic Concepts of Income Tax: Introduction to Fundamentals of Income Tax
MCQ on Basic Concepts of Income Tax

requirements: No Additional knowledge needed but a basic understanding of business terms and general awareness
courses.description:
Tax is considered difficult to understand, but it becomes easy when you know the fundamentals. Here we are with the fundamentals of the Income Tax Law in India.
Income Tax is the tax on a person's income earned in India. Still, the tricky part is understanding what exactly income means, what a person is, and when that income is considered made in India based on the Residential status.
Income Tax Act 1961 is the pioneer law in India, and the course on Fundamentals of Income Tax includes:
Introduction to the Income Tax Law, Meaning & Concept of Taxation, What is an assessee, what is assessment year, what are the different tax rates according to the old and new regime. How to Determine the residential status of an Individual?
Every year government brings some changes to the Income Tax Law in practice.
What are the changes brought to the Income Tax in this year's budget by our Finance Minister Nirmala Seetaraman?
This course will make you understand the different fundamental concepts, which will help you understand any difficult part independently.
The course has 5 lectures on the topics of introduction to income tax, tax rates, assessment & previous years, meaning and definition of a person, Budget 2023 updates, and determination of the residential status. Also, there is an MCQ Assignment at the end. There are Powerpoint presentations attached with every lecture so as to help the learners track their study.

courses.title: Más allá del cumplimiento: Declaración sin discrepancias
courses.bio: Declaración anual de Personas Morales. Ejercicio 2024

Presentación del curso: ¿Qué tanto sabes de la declaración anual?
Ejemplo de ingreso nominal: Caso de estudio: un ejemplo de ingreso nominal
Ejemplos de ingreso acumulable: Casos de estudio: dos ejemplos de ingreso acumulable

requirements: Si vas a presentar la declaración de personas morales aquí encotrará información estratégica.
courses.description:
Conoce las buenas prácticas para preparar y presentar tu declaración anual. Comprende cómo se vincula la información que ya tiene el SAT sobre tus operaciones y los datos que están precargados en tu declaración, especialmente aquellos que puedan implicar posibles riesgos para tí, si no vigilas la congruencia y la coherencia de lo que estás por declarar.
Obtén una visión panorámica y estratégica de esta obligación, empezando desde del ciclo tributario y cómo los contribuyentes pasan por él. Reflexiona sobre la importancia de reconocer las diferentes etapas de este ciclo para detectar la información clave que se vincularán con tu declaración.
Familiarízate con la situación actual del padrón de Personas Morales y su nivel de cumplimiento para comprender porqué la fiscalización se va a recrudecer a partir de este año.
Conoce cuáles son los tres principales aspectos a vigilar durante la mecánica de cálculo del impuesto y las implicaciones de tener discrepancias. Comprende las implicaciones de que, en México, los impuestos son autodeterminables y qué efectos tiene en la forma en que se interpreta la información que manifiestas en tu declaración anual. Conoce los aspectos que debes cuidar para no cometer errores involuntarios.
Analiza, a partir de casos prácticos, los datos que debes vigilar y su relación con los aspectos a cuidar en tu declaración.
Identifica cuáles podrían ser las implicaciones y consecuencias de no verificar la información de la declaración para asegurarse de que no haya inconsistencias. También identificarás qué hacer en caso de que necesites modificar o corregir la información precargada en tu declaración.
target_audience: Contadores Públicos, Licenciados en Contaduría, Auxiliares, Contralores, Asesores, Fiscalistas, Auditores, Abogados, Administradores, Empresarios, estudiantes de carreras afines y personas interesadas en el tema.

証券税制の仕組み、税金の種類、フローを理解し、自分で確定申告ができるようになる

requirements: 投資経験者のかたが対象の講座です。
証券取引の際に発生する税金について、お悩み別に調べることができます。
これから投資を始めるかたには、kabu.studyシリーズの「【一日でマスター！】今日からはじめる資産形成」がおすすめです。
courses.description:
株を売って利益が出たけど、何をしたらよいのかわからない…。
複数の証券会社や銀行で証券取引をしており、確定申告したいがやり方が分からない…。

…そんな風に思っているかたは意外と多いものです。
でも、証券取引にかかる税金についても、アレルギーをもつことなくきちんとしくみを理解すれば、簡易的に手続きが行えます。
この講座では、上場株式や投資信託、債券、デリバティブと商品ごとの税制の説明から、特定口座の仕組み、所得税についてと、証券取引にかかる税金について一通り理解できる内容となっております。さらには、お客さまよりお問い合わせが多い事項をケーススタディとし、これまで証券会社のサポートセンターにてお客さまにご案内できなかった、確定申告の方法についても解説しています。国税庁のHPを用いて、税理士でCFP（ファイナンシャルプランナー）の小林英清先生に実際に動画で解説いただくことで、これまでのPDFやパンフレットなどとは違い、より実用的な講座となっています。
一家に一冊の「虎の巻」として、辞書のように、気になるお悩みのレクチャーからご覧ください。
これから初めて金融商品の取引における確定申告をご検討されているあなたの不安をすっきり解消します。


●「kabu.study（カブスタディ）」シリーズについて
三菱UFJ eスマート証券が提供する投資教育カリキュラムです。日本では、マイナス金利下で預貯金のみはリスクとも言われている昨今、投資に対して関心があるものの「リスクがあり怖い、不安・心配、素人には難しいもの」というネガティブなイメージが先行しており、欧米のようにリスク資産への移転が進まない現状があります。その背景のひとつには、欧米のように金融教育が学校で必須科目として取り入れられておらず、投資に関心が高い方でも投資教育に触れる機会が少ないことがあります。
第一弾のコンテンツは、初心者向けのライトな内容となっており、資産運用を他人事ではなくご自身の身近なものと思っていただけるものとなっています。本講座を第二弾として、今後も順次、中級～上級の方向けのコンテンツをリリースしてまいります。
●奨学金支援（オンライン教育応援プログラム）について
三菱UFJ eスマート証券が提供する講座における受講売上分の一部は、新たな学びの促進を活性化するため、 オンライン教育講座「Udemy」の提供する奨学金制度への支援金に活用します。奨学金制度に申し込まれた 方の中から先着で、「Udemy」の講座を無料で受講できるプレゼントをするオンライン教育応援プログラムを始動する予定です。 詳細は別途「Udemy」サイト内で告知いたします。
target_audience: 証券取引の際に発生する税金について、ケースごとに詳しく知りたいかた
確定申告の手続きや必要書類で困っているかた
税金は専門用語が多くアレルギーがあるかた
株に興味はあるが、確定申告がめんどくさそうなので投資からは手を引いているかた
確定申告を、税務署へ出向くことなくe-taxで完結したい方。自分でやりたいがやり方・必要書類が分からないかた

courses.description:
This course includes video and screen shot explanations of the most common things you will encounter when preparing your business tax returns. Basic Corporate Tax Returns Mastered is organized into four sections:
Basic Corporate Tax Knowledge
Common tax forms you will need to complete like: 1120s, 1120X, K1, 2553
Basic Tax Preparation Example
Closing Commentary
What are the benefits of doing your business tax returns online?

- A lot less expensive than going through an accountant or CPA
- It will take a lot less time
- You have complete control over what you enter and how long it takes
- Reduced chances of being audited
Why don't more people do their business taxes online?
- Uncertainty
- Lack of confidence using tax preparation software
The positives outweigh the negatives
Technology and simple online forms have made tax preparation easier than ever and much less likely to get audited than in the past. There are even online tax assistants that answer questions you have. You will save time and money doing your own business tax returns and will learn how to better run your business through tax knowledge acquired while completing your taxes. It's easier than ever!
What software will you be using?
Turbotax Business is a simple and easy to use software. This course will teach you how to use and maximize this software.
The sooner you start the sooner you'll finish. Get started today!

Your instructor
Joe Correa is the founder and CEO of several businesses and has successfully taught others how to successfully run a business through his courses as well as prepare business tax returns. The first and most important step of the process is to find someone who has already done this many times and can teach you the process in an easy and practical way.
Please contact me if have any questions. Remember this course has a 30 day money back guarantee so their is zero risk on your part. Don't forget that you will receive your certificate of completion when you finish this course.

courses.description:
This course is tailored to provide a comprehensive understanding of the provisions of Goods and Services Tax (GST). It goes beyond theoretical concepts, offering practical insights and addressing real-world issues faced during GST compliance and implementation.
Designed in Hindi, this course is perfect for individuals who are more comfortable learning in their native language and may not have a strong command of English. The use of Hindi ensures the material is accessible to a wider audience, catering specifically to the needs of Indian learners.
A standout feature of the course is its Multiple-Choice Question (MCQ) test, enabling participants to evaluate their understanding and identify areas needing improvement. This interactive approach helps reinforce learning and ensures participants are well-prepared to apply GST concepts effectively in practical scenarios.
The course has been exclusively developed by CA Shaifaly Girdharwal, a renowned GST expert, accomplished trainer, and popular YouTuber. As a trusted authority in GST education, she brings years of experience and expertise to create a course that is both insightful and engaging.
Whether you’re a professional looking to enhance your GST knowledge or someone seeking clarity on GST provisions, this course provides a structured pathway to mastering the subject. It combines clarity, practicality, and accessibility, making it a valuable resource for learners at all levels.
target_audience: Candidates appearing for GST Practitioner exams to be held in October end.

courses.description:
ಗೆಳೆಯರೇ,
Taxtutor ನ ತೆರಿಗೆಯ ಬಗೆಗಿನ ತರಗತಿಗಳಿಗೆ ನಿಮಗೆಲ್ಲರಿಗು ಸ್ವಾಗತ. ಈ ವಿಭಾಗದಲ್ಲಿ ನಾವು ಇಲ್ಲಿ ಆದಾಯ ತೆರಿಗೆಯ Capital Gain ಬಗ್ಗೆ ತಿಳಿದುಕೊಳ್ಳೋಣ. ಈ ಪ್ಯಾಕೇಜ್ ಒಟ್ಟು 25 ವಿಡಿಯೋಗಳು ಮತ್ತು 06 ಲೇಖನಗಳ ಚಿತ್ರಗಳನ್ನು ಒಳಗೊಂಡಿದೆ. ಈ ಮೂಲಕ ನಾವು ಒಬ್ಬ ಕರಧಾತನಿಗೆ Capital Assetನ್ನು ಮಾರಾಟ ಮಾಡಿದಂಥ ಸಂದರ್ಬದ್ದಲ್ಲಿ ಆಗುವ ಲಾಭ ನಷ್ಟಗಳ ಮೇಲೆ ಆದಾಯ ತೆರಿಗೆ ಕಾಯಿದೆ ಪ್ರಕಾರ ಯಾವ ರೀತಿ ತೆರಿಗೆಯನ್ನು ವಿದಿಸಬೇಂಕೆಂದು ಹಂತ ಹಂತವಾಗಿ ತಿಳಿದುಕೊಳ್ಳಲಿಕಿದ್ದೇವೆ. ಈ ಪ್ರಸ್ತುತಿಯನ್ನು ಇಲ್ಲಿ ಕೆಳಕಾಣುವ ಉಪಶೀರ್ಷಿಕೆಗಳ ಮುಖಾಂತರ ಪ್ರಸ್ತುತ ಪಡಿಸಲಿದ್ದೇವೆ :-
a. Meaning of capital asset (Section 2 (14)).
b. Exclude from capital asset.
c. Meaning of capital gain.
d. Type of capital gain and capital asset.
e. Taxation on capital gains.
f. Exemption on capital gain.
g. Set off and carry forward capital loss.
h. Exercise part of capital gains.
ಗೆಳೆಯರೇ ಮೇಲೆ ಕಾಣುವ ಎಲ್ಲ ವಿಷಯಗಳನ್ನು ಬೇರೆ ಬೇರೆಯಾಗಿ ವಿವಿಧ ವಿಡಿಯೋಗಳ ಮೂಲಕ ಇಲ್ಲಿ ಪ್ರಸ್ತುತಪಡಿಸಿದ್ದೇವೆ. ಇಲ್ಲಿ ಸಿಗುವ ಲೇಖನಗಳು ಅರ್ಥೈಸಿಕೊಳ್ಳಲು ಮತ್ತು ನೆನಪಿನಲ್ಲಿಟ್ಟುಕೊಳ್ಳಲು ಸುಲಭವಾಗಿರುತ್ತದೆ. ಒಟ್ಟಾಗಿ ಹೇಳುವುದಾದರೆ ಈ Packageನ್ನು ಹೊಸ ಶಿಕ್ಷಣಾರ್ಥಿಗಳಿಗಾಗಿ ಸರಳವಾಗಿ ರೂಪಿಸಲಾಗಿದೆ. ಭವಿಷ್ಯದಲ್ಲಿ ನಾವು ಆದಾಯ ತೆರಿಗೆಗೆ ಸಂಬಂಧಪಟ್ಟಂತೆ ಇನ್ನಷ್ಟು ತರಗತಿಗಳನ್ನು ಪ್ರಸ್ತುಪಡಿಸಲಿದ್ದು ನಿಮ್ಮ ಬೆಂಬಲವನ್ನು ಆಧಾರದಿಂದ ನಿರೀಕ್ಷಿಸುತ್ತೇವೆ.
ಧನ್ಯವಾದಗಳು,


Dear friends,
Welcome to the Tax Tutors classes on taxation. This course about Income from Capital Gain in Indian Income tax. This package contain totally 25 videos and 06 articles JPG images. In this course, we discussing about how can an assessee manage his profit and losses arise from sale of Capital Asset which prescribed in Income Tax Act of India 1961. Thanking you

Final Assessment Questions: Final Corporate Tax Assessment Test _80% Pass percentage.

requirements: Minimum Bachelors Degree
courses.description:
UAE Corporate Tax Return Filing: Step-by-Step 2025


This course empowers business owners, accountants, and tax professionals to file UAE corporate tax returns confidently. Learn the full process—from CT registration to final submission via the EmaraTax portal.


What You'll Learn
·  Eligibility: Who must register and file (mainland, free zone, tax groups, partnerships)
· Calculating taxable income & small business relief (AED 375k threshold)
· CT return walkthrough: elections, schedules, documents, dropdowns
· Free zone exemptions & tax group strategies
· Common pitfalls & penalties (e.g., AED 10k late registration, AED 500/month late filing)


Bonus: Downloadable checklist, live Q&A, final test (Certificate upon passing the test)


Instructor Credibility
Taught by Sijin K Ravi, FCA, CFE, and UAE-registered Tax Agent. Learn from real-life experience helping businesses file successfully under the new regime.




This course content is updated with all relevant developments, Cabinet and Ministerial Decisions, and FTA Guides issued up to 31st May 2025, ensuring you stay fully compliant and informed with the latest UAE Corporate Tax regulations.


This course is designed with precision and clarity to give you a structured, step‑by‑step guide to filing your UAE corporate tax return.
We will cover:
1. A quick overview of UAE Corporate Tax (CT)
2. Elections within the CT return
3. Calculating taxable income in special scenarios
4. The end‑to‑end CT return filing process
5. Documentation requirements
6. Final submission protocols
7. Practical Q&A
At the end, you’ll take a Final Assessment Test to confirm your understanding.
We’ll also highlight key deadlines, common pitfalls, and best practices— all aligned with Federal Tax Authority requirements—so you can file with confidence and accuracy.
target_audience: Small and medium business owners in the UAE
Students and career switchers interested in UAE taxation

courses.description:
If you are a foreign national and wanted to become a real estate investor in the U.S,  buy properties, flip properties or simply build your real estate portfolio, while being successful in doing so; Then this course is for you. In this course you will learn how to successfully invest in real estate as a foreign national investor.  You will learn all the steps to incorporating your real estate investment business as well understanding what lenders will lend to foreign nationals. In addition this course will review the federal FIRPTA regulation and the tax requirements that buyers and sellers are required to comply with when purchasing or selling a property from or to a foreign person. You will also learn how REITS and FIRPTA goes hand and hand when it comes to investing in real estate in the U.S. REITs were initially introduced, in part, to allow taxpayers of more modest means to invest in real estate. Also this course will briefly cover  you the PATH act and how it works in conjunction with FIRPTA, so you will better understand how to protect yourself as a Foreign National real estate investor, in regards to tax withholding's and the IRS.

courses.title: Understanding Tax Depreciation
courses.bio: Let's depreciation something!
objectives: Students will better understand tax depreciation and how to calculate it for various types of assets.
requirements: None
courses.description:
Depreciation is one of the most confusing elements of tax preparation. In my experience it is the reason most taxpayers go to paid tax preparers.
In this course you will learn what constitutes a depreciable asset and why assets are depreciated instead of being expensed when purchased.
Your goals for this course are to:
1. Learn how to classify fixed assets.
2. Learn about deprecation methods, depreciation conventions, and useful lives.
3. Learn about depreciation recapture and how gains and losses work when assets are sold.


The Internal Revenue Service does not permit expenditures for items benefiting a company's revenue stream for more than a year to be expensed in the year of purchase. The accounting profession follows the matching principle which states that revenue for a period needs to be matched with expenses for the same period. Since assets often support a company's revenue stream over their useful life, the cost of an asset must be spread over the estimated useful life to more properly match its cost against the revenue it helps produce.
If your company buys a saw to help produce finished lumber from raw timber for $7,000, and it is expected to last for 7 years, it must be depreciated for 7 years. The rational is that the saw will help produce income from the sale of finished lumber over its useful life. The saw is therefore written off at $1,000 per year for 7 years to match the revenue produced with the expense incurred.
The IRS allows departures from the matching principle at times to encourage U.S. production, but in general that is the theory behind depreciation.
target_audience: Tax Preparers, those wanting to become tax preparers, or individuals wanting to prepare their own tax returns.

courses.bio: Sharing Corporate Resources
objectives: Transfer Pricing Methods (Traditional Methods, Profit Split Method, TNMM)

Critically analyse the nine steps of a comparability analysis.
Evaluate the use of comparables in a comparability analysis.
Intra-Group Services
Compare/contrast the various transfer pricing methods that can be used to determine an arm’s length price.
Intra-Group Services relating to the application of OECD guidelines
Interpret OECD transfer pricing guidelines surrounding the charging for intra-group services.
Identify which intra-group services can be classified as low value-adding intra group services.

Comparability Analysis Part 3: Part 1 - Types of adjustments & working capital adjustments
Intra Group Services Part 1: Part 2 - Has Intra Group Service been rendered?
Intra Group Services Part 2: Part 1 - Intra Group Services - Special Considerations
Part 3 - Final remarks on Intra Group Services

requirements: Knowledge of International Taxation principles
Basic understanding of Transfer Pricing
courses.description:
Course Aims
The aim of this course is to ensure a student can choose and understand the appropriate TP method for controlled transactions, perform a comparability analysis and determine an arm’s length charge for Intra-Group Services.
For TP Methods, the student will fully understand how each method works, the specific conditions for a method to be applied and be able to perform the calculations required for each method.
The module further aims to provide the student with a thorough understanding of the comparability analysis, once the transaction has been delineated and the significant comparability factors taken into account. The comparability analysis is crucial to be able to determine the correction (if any) required to calculate an arm’s length price.
Lastly intra-group services will be studied, to ascertain when these services are rendered, to determine an arm’s length charge for these services and further conditions relating to the application of the OECD guidelines to intra-group services and low value-adding intra-group services.
On successful completion of this module, the student should be able to:
Compare/contrast the various transfer pricing methods that can be used to determine an arm’s length price.
Critically analyse the nine steps of a comparability analysis.
Evaluate the use of comparables in a comparability analysis.
Interpret OECD transfer pricing guidelines surrounding the charging for intra-group services.
Identify which intra-group services can be classified as low value-adding intra group services.
COURSE NOTE:
This course is Module 2 of a 4 Module course on Transfer Pricing.  Each Module stands separately, however, we suggest that you complete all 4 courses in order to get the full benefit of these teachings.
Additional Modules in the whole course are:
Module 1 - Transfer Pricing Legal Framework
Module 2 (this course) - Sharing Corporate Resources
Module 3 - Transfer Pricing Specialised Areas
Module 4 - PE's & Compliance and Dispute Resolution

objectives: How to file TDS Returns

requirements: Basic knowledge of Indian Direct Taxes
courses.description:
Are you new to filing TDS returns?
Are you facing difficulty in filing TDS returns?
Are you interested in knowing about TDS related provisions & norms?
Then you are in right course now!


Welcome to your course How to file TDS Returns Course?
TDS stands for Tax Deducted at Source and TDS return is a quarterly statement to be furnished with Income Tax Department by Tax deductors. Compiling and filing TDS return is a detailed process and have to be done meticulously.
There are certain pre-requisites for Uploading TDS Statement like
-User should hold valid TAN
-User should be registered in e-Filing
-Statement should be prepared using the Return Preparation Utility (RPU)
-Validated using the File Validation Utility (FVU)
Then there are detailed procedures involved in filing it with Tax Department.


How this course is structured?
This  course is structured in self paced learning style. Each and every concept is broken down as various micro lectures and then they are substantiated with examples and case studies. Real world examples are used in this course through case studies.
This course will take you through right from
a) What is TDS
b) Tax provisions & norms related to TDS
c) Consequences of not deducting TDS
d) Consequences of deducting but not remitting TDS
e) Consequences of not filing TDS Returns
f) How to file TDS return using LIVE Cases.


What are the pre-requisites for taking this course?
You should have basic knowledge of Tax. You would require  good internet connection for interruption free learning process.


How this course will benefit you?
At the end of the course, you will be able to file TDS Return with high level of confidence.

Do you work at home...or want to work at home...and need to know how to safely deduct expenses tied to a home office?
Done right...the home office tax deduction could be worth THOUSANDS of dollars to you...and it could add six figures to your nest egg by the end of your working years!


This course goes into detail about how to safely document and deduct all the potential expenses of a home office. Think about what you could deduct...
- Rent
- Mortgage interest
- Real estate taxes
- Utilities
- Condo maintenance fees
- and more!
In virtually every video lecture, we cite the IRS code or publication that goes into detail about each aspect of the home office tax deduction. What's that, you think that you don't qualify? No worries...this course gives you guidance so you know how to qualify confidently.


In addition to including IRS publications and IRS-approved worksheets...this course also includes checklists and spreadsheets developed by a tax pro with 25 years of tax experience. You will also get the instructor's proprietary Home Office Expense Tax Estimator (excel-compatible spreadsheet) as an added resource.

- Learn from one case study how the home office helped one taxpayer get a refund of taxes that he didn't pay!
- Find out about how an obscure tax ruling can give you tax-free income...while your business gets a deduction.
- Learn how your annual tax savings from a home office can be turned into an added six figures to your nest egg.


and more! Start today to get huge tax savings from your home office...this year and for years to come. The instructor is Paul Mladjenovic, a CFP Board Emeritus, a retired tax pro and the author of the best-selling Stock Investing For Dummies and he also teaches the Udemy course How to Make Any Expense Tax-Deductible.

courses.bio: Lucro Presumido Conceitos e Prática

requirements: Interesse em aprender a contabilidade fiscal/tributária

courses.description:
Atualmente no Brasil existem 4 regimes tributários;
Simples Nacional
Lucro Presumido
Lucro Real
Lucro Arbitrado
O Lucro presumido surgiu em 1943 e já foi o regime tributário mais utilizado pelas empresas no Brasil.
É muito importante para empresas escolherem o regime tributário correto, pois uma escolha errada pode resultar, em tributos pagos a maior durante todo o ano calendário, ou seja, a empresa pode acabar oferecendo uma vantagem para os seus concorrentes, que com a escolha correta, podem trabalhar com margens melhores e praticarem preços mais agressivos.
Esse curso tem como intuito mostrar, conceitos importantes, sobre o regime tributário Lucro Presumido, mostrar também como efetuar o cálculo do Imposto de Renda - Pessoa Jurídica (IRPJ) e da Contribuição social sobre o lucro líquido (CSLL) e suas particularidades no Lucro Presumido.
É um curso voltado tanto para iniciantes, como para estudantes de contabilidade, direito, administração, quanto para profissionais que já atuam na área fiscal/tributária e também para estudantes que tem interesse na área fiscal/tributária.
Aula 1 Introdução ao Lucro Presumido
Aula 2 Opção pelo Lucro Presumido e Obrigatoriedades
Aula 2 Parte 2 resolução do Desafio
Aula 3 Base de Cálculo e Alíquota
Aula 3 Parte 2 Resolução do Exemplo
Aula 3 Parte 3 Resolução do Desafio
Aula 4 Regime de Caixa e Emissão do DARF
Aula 5 Antecipar Pagamentos Lucro Presumido
target_audience: Profissionais que já atuam na área fiscal/tributária
Estudantes que tenham interesse na área tributária/fiscal

courses.description:
A cada esquina há no mínimo 1 empresa inserida no Simples Nacional. Essas empresas dos setores da Indústria, Comércio e Serviços, trazem grandes oportunidades para os profissionais da área contábil e fiscal iniciarem na área e em novos trabalhos de assessoria, de consultoria ou até mesmo de revisão e recuperação tributária.


Logo quando iniciei na carreira contábil há mais de uma década, percebi o quão complexa a área fiscal é em seu dia a dia e o quanto isso pode afetar a qualidade do serviço prestado, trazer riscos para a empresa e para o escritório, principalmente com as empresas do Simples Nacional. E eu sei exatamente como você se sente inseguro em meio a tantas legislações que são alteradas constantemente, principalmente em se tratando deste regime que, apesar do nome, não tem nada de simples.

courses.title: IRS Schedule C for Freelancers-Small Businesses
courses.bio: How Millions of Small Business Owners Lower Taxes
objectives: Students will learn how to legally reduce the amount of taxes owed when operating a small business
Students will learn about free tax software and the elements included in a Schedule C
Students will gain insight into why over 25 million taxpayers use a Schedule C
Students will learn why and how to use depreciation to grow their business.
Students will learn about dozens of legal tax write offs most taxpayers forget
Students will learn what NOT to do when dealing with the IRS

New Tax Laws for 2024 - 2023 Filings: New Tax Laws for 2024 - Major Updates
IRS History Short Video: History of Taxes Worldwide and in the U.S.
Joining the IRS Elite - The Status of the Wealthy in America
Course Structure: Best Kept Secret in the History of Schedule C
Part II of Best Kept Secret Schedule C
Five Sections of Schedule C: Part I 5 Sections Tax Benefits of Schedule C
Part II of the Five Sections of Schedule C
Part III of the Five Sections of Schedule C
100 Plus Tax Write Offs for Home Based B: 99 Tax Write-offs for Home and Small Businesses

requirements: Understand basic use of the Internet
courses.description:
Over 25 million U.S. taxpayers file using a Schedule C.  This course shows you how many freelancers and small business owners lower their taxes, while tax planning during the last quarter of the year before the actual tax return becomes due.   The course explains the depreciation component which is now over $1 million annually and can reduce your tax liability dramatically.  The course also shares insight into using profits to build company assets while reducing taxes.  There is a systemized process that taxpayers can use to legally defer and, or lower taxes.  These easy-to-follow lectures share details on how to make a Schedule C work for you., even if you know very little about taxes.
The small business owner is one of the most important components in the US economy. Small business employs over 70% of all US taxpayers. Congress provides tax benefits and tax savings to help ensure the success of the small business owner. Starting out as a freelancer or a 1099-NEC is a great way to get started to join the one percent of wealthy building small business owners
The course introduces students to a whole new theory with proven actions to lower taxes, legally and effectively.  All recommendations adhere to the US Tax Codes and laws set by Congress each year.
target_audience: US Freelance Taxpayers who perform services online or offline for pay
Small business owners who want to know how to legally lower taxes
Taxpayers who want to understand the concept of Schedule C
New tax preparers who want to better understand tax loopholes associated with Schedule C

courses.description:
Student Course Feedback: "Dr. Jacinto, you were a great instructor. Your lectures were clear, precise and showed real "teacher" abilities. You enunciate so well and very easy to understand and follow. Your organization was noteworthy and covered the material well. I thoroughly enjoyed the entire course. In fact, I've listened to your lectures twice."
=====================================================================
2015 Tax Season Ends. A season of SAVINGS begin! Enjoy this course for $9 ($39 regular price) while it is being updated for next year's (2016) tax season. See you inside!
=====================================================================
Income Tax Basic Training has one simple objective - and that is for you to be able to prepare & file your OWN federal & state income tax return by 04/15 by empowering you with the tools you need to understand & learn how US income tax system works.
The course is delivered in simple, no-nonsense and straightforward terms to take the intimidation factor away from dealing with "taxes" and promote an engaging learning environment.
All the materials you need to successfully complete the course are built-in. It's loaded with supplemental resources and quizzes to reinforce learning. The course walks you through how to prepare a basic 1040 from the beginning to the end.
At the end of the course, you will understand how to calculate for your gross income subject to tax, adjusted gross income, the correct type of deduction to take: standard vs. itemized, the number of exemptions to claim, the credits that you may qualify for, your taxable income, tax liability, tax refund or tax due.
Save yourself an average of $200/year by filing your own federal & state income tax return every year. A research conducted by the National Society of Accountants showed that the average of professional tax preparation is $152 for a simple 1040 and $261 for a 1040 with Schedule A. More importantly, be in control of your own taxes by knowing why you pay what you do and learning and understanding how taxes work and affect you.
Your instructor promotes and encourages a lively class through the discussion forum. Expect her to respond to you within 24 hours or less.
Before you sign up, please refer to the target audience for this course to see that it is the right one for you.
target_audience: Designed for low and moderate income taxpayers to learn & equip them with the training they need to file their own income tax return each year.
Tax filers with adjusted gross income of $60,000 or less that filed using forms 1040-EZ, 1040A or 1040 with Schedule A in 2013.

Individuals who pay income taxes every year but DO NOT understand why.

This course is only designed for US taxpayers.

courses.description:
Pajak Pertambahan Nilai (PPN) mungkin tidak asing lagi di telinga Anda. Pajak ini sangat dekat dengan transaksi harian karena hampir setiap penyerahan barang atau jasa akan dikenakan PPN. Namun, sebenarnya, ada barang maupun jasa yang dikecualikan dari PPN. Undang-Undang No. 42 Tahun 2009 tentang Pajak Pertambahan Nilai mengatur barang dan jasa apa saja yang tidak termasuk obyek PPN yang disebut dengan negative list.
PPN tergolong pajak tidak langsung karena subyek pajaknya bukan pihak yang melakukan penyerahan barang mapun jasa, melainkan penerima atau pembeli. Pihak yang melakukan penyerahan hanya memungut PPN, lalu membayarkan dan melaporkannya ke negara. Dalam hal ini, tidak semua pengusaha dapat mengenakan PPN. Hanya pengusaha yang berstatus sebagai Pengusaha Kena Pajak (PKP) yang dapat mengenakan PPN.
Status PKP pada dasarnya memunculkan kewajiban untuk mengenakan PPN atas setiap penyerahan barang atau jasa kena pajak, memungut pajaknya, serta membayarkan dan melaporkan. Pengusaha yang mempunyai omzet setahun Rp4.800.000.000,00 setahun sudah wajib mendaftar sebagai Pengusaha Kena Pajak. Sementara, pengusaha yang omzetnya setahunnya belum mencapau Rp4.800.000.000,00 tidak ada kewajiban, tetapi diperbolehkan mengajukan pendaftaran.
Pemungutan PPN dilakukan dengan membuatkan faktur pajak. Saat ini, faktur pajak dibuatkan secara online melalui aplikasi e-Faktur. Dengan cara ini, setiap faktur pajak yang dibuat akan langsung tersimpan dalam database Direktorat Jendral Pajak. Sebelum dapat membuat faktur pajak melalui e-Faktur, PKP harus mengajukan permohonan sertifikat elektronik yang diperlukan untuk menjalankan aplikasi.
Sementara, pelaporan SPT Masa PPN saat ini juga dilakukan melalui laman khusus, yaitu laman web efaktur. Baik pembuatan faktur pajak maupun pelaporan SPT Masa, terdapat beberapa langkah yang harus dilakukan. PKP, sebagai pihak yang wajib memungut PPN harus mengetahui cara membuat faktur pajak elektronik serta melakukan pelaporan online dengan tepat.
Kursus panduan lengkap Pajak Pertambahan Nilai (PPN) ini memuat seluruh materi pembelajaran PPN, mulai dari konsep dasar, subyek dan obyek PPN, Pengusaha Kena Pajak, Karakteristik PPN, sampai dengan tutorial pembuatan faktur pajak elektronik dan pelaporan SPT Masa PPN melalui laman web efaktur. Pilihan tepat bagi Anda yang ingin memelajari PPN secara lengkap.
target_audience: 3. Orang umum yang ingin mempelajari pajak, khususnya Pajak Pertambahan Nilai (PPN).

E um dos desafios de toda empresa é manter seu sistema rodando corretamente para emitir notas fiscais e adquirir mercadorias dos fornecedores, e pra isso acontecer é necessário a parametrização da J1btax, que nada mais é do que tabelas e grupos para configurar o funcionamento dos impostos no sistema SAP, e posteriormente dar entrada nas notas fiscais, e também emitir corretamente as notas fiscais, evitando problemas com o Governo.


Hoje em dia é muito dificil um profissional que possua o conhecimento na J1btax. e por isso esse profissional chega a ganhar salarios na faixa de R$ 12.000,00 no brasil.


Geralmente quem atua com a J1btax são profissionais da área fiscal, tributária ou de T.I. Pois para saber parametrizar corretamente todos os impostos no SAP é necessário um conhecimento fiscal e de sistema, e pensando nisso eu trouxe pra vocês um curso completo que ensina como Parametrizar a J1btax, criar CFOP, NCM, Domicilio Fiscal, criar regras de determinação de impostos e muito mais conhecimento pra você se tornar um Usuário chave no sistema SAP.

courses.description:
O curso "APRENDA O SPED DO ZERO" tem como objetivo explanar conceitos básicos, intermediários e avançados sobre as declarações acessórias do Sistema Público de Escrituração Fiscal Digital - SPED de forma a fazer com que os alunos participantes deste curso aprendam de forma fácil, na prática e de maneira intuitiva para que possam desenvolver suas próprias habilidades para o manuseio e gestão dos dados fiscais imputados e extraídos do SPED.
Sugerimos aos alunos que assistam a todas aulas, sem pular nenhum vídeo, e que participem do curso fazendo os exercícios sugeridos, fazendo sugestões e levando dúvidas e questionamentos que por ventura venham a ter durando a explanação de conteúdo, para que este possa extrair o máximo de informações possíveis de forma a melhor capacita-los para o mercado de trabalho e para o desenvolvimento das rotinas do dia a dia na área fiscal.
O curso serve de base para alunos que ainda não tiveram contato com o ambiente da Escrituração Fiscal Digital, pois possibilita uma aprendizagem metódica e intuitiva, sendo demonstrado passo a passo os  principais blocos cadastrais e as principais rotinas utilizados no programa do SPED.
O conteúdo apresentado foi criado pelo próprio instrutor do curso com base na sua vivência e conhecimento da área fiscal, e também com base nas principais dificuldades encontradas pelos mais diversos usuários do sistema de escrituração publico digital - SPED.
O intuito deste curso é agregar o máximo de conhecimento possível principalmente para os alunos que são iniciante nas áreas contábil e fiscal.

courses.description:
A warm welcome to the Tax Deducted at Source (TDS) course by Uplatz.


TDS stands for Tax Deducted at Source. The TDS concepts & rules were introduced with an aim to collect tax from the very source of income. As per this concept, a person (deductor) who is liable to make payment of specified nature to any other person (deductee) shall deduct tax at source and remit the same into the account of the Central Government. The deductee from whose income tax has been deducted at source would be entitled to get credit of the amount so deducted on the basis of Form 26AS or TDS certificate issued by the deductor.
As per the India Income Tax Act, any company or person making a payment is required to deduct tax at source if the payment exceeds certain threshold limits. TDS has to be deducted at the rates prescribed by the tax department. The government uses TDS as a tool to collect tax in order to minimize tax evasion by taxing the income (partially or wholly) at the time it is generated rather than at a later date. TDS is applicable on various incomes such as salaries, interest received, commission received, dividends etc.
TDS is not applicable to all incomes and persons for all transactions. Different TDS rates have been prescribed by the Income Tax Act for different payments and different categories of recipients. For example, payment of redemption proceeds by a debt mutual fund to a resident individual is not subject to TDS but for a Non-resident Indian is subject to TDS.


Uplatz brings this comprehensive training on TDS with the concepts explained in detail. This TDS course covers each and every section of TDS rules as per India Income Tax laws. The methodology for TDS payments and returns are well described in the TDS course.

The above topic is the sub-topic of TDS. TDS is too wide and it covers many other sub-topics examples- TDS Returns, Cases on which TDS not applicable, Interest, Penalties, Legal Cases, Credit of TDS, Consequences of failure to deduct or pay TDS, etc.


Rates for TDS
Taxes shall be deducted at the rates specified in the relevant provisions of the Act or the First Schedule to the Finance Act. However, in case of payment to non-resident persons, the withholding tax rates specified under the Double Taxation Avoidance Agreements shall also be considered.


TDS Payments
TDS is deducted on the following types of payments:
Salaries
Interest payments by banks
Commission payments
Rent payments
Consultation fees
Professional fees
However, individuals are not required to deduct TDS when they make rent payments or pay fees to professionals like lawyers and doctors.
TDS is one kind of advance tax. It is tax that is to be deposited with the government periodically and the onus of the doing the same on time lies with the deductor. For the deductee, the deducted TDS can be claimed in the form of a tax refund after they file their ITR (Income Tax Return).


TDS Return
A deductor has to deposit the deducted TDS to the government and the details of the same have to be filed in the form of a TDS return. A TDS return has to be filed quarterly. Different types of TDS deductions have to be filed using different TDS return forms.

This course is designed to help you, a new business owner, understand and meet your federal and state tax obligations.  You'll learn the  fundamentals of business taxes.

You'll learn about all the forms such as W2s, W3s, K-1s, 1099s, 941 forms and other small business taxes and tax forms; and how to file and pay your taxes electronically.

courses.title: Reforma Tributária - Simples Nacional
courses.bio: Estudo prático sobre a Reforma Tributária
objectives: As definições Referentes a Reforma Tributária
Os impactos da Reforma nas empresas do Simples Nacional
Cálculo da Reforma Tributária na prática
Cálculo na prática do IBS e CBS para as empresas do Simples Nacional

Principais Impactos da Reforma Tributári: Análises Importantes frente aos Impactos da Reforma
Cálculos de IBS e CBS na prática: Cálculo IBS e CBS - Regime Regular
Cálculo IBS e CBS - Simples Nacional
Cálculo IBS e CBS - Simples Nacional Híbrido

requirements: Não é necessário conhecimento prévio sobre a Reforma. Apenas entendimento básica de contabilidade. Mas os cálculos são objetivos, possibilitando o entendimento para pessoas de fora da área contábil.
courses.description:
Conheça os principais impactos da Reforma Tributária para as empresas do Simples Nacional, para poder iniciar as análises sobre quais as melhores alternativas para as empresas desse Regime Tributário.
E tenha acesso a cálculos na prática do IVA Dual das empresas do seguintes regimes tributários:
- Regular
- Simples Nacional
- Simples Nacional Híbrido - Comércio
- Simples Nacional Híbrido - Serviços
Será detalhado o cálculo para empresas do comércio, mas também, as empresas prestadoras de serviços, serão abordadas neste curso, com o destaque dos impactos da reforma para elas. Seguindo com o cálculo na prática do IVA Dual, sobre o faturamento dessas empresas.
Conhecer as mudanças que a reforma traz, é fundamental não apenas para os contadores e demais profissionais que atuam no ramo empresarial, mas também, para os empresários que irão vivenciar essas mudanças e precisam estar preparados para tomarem as melhores decisões.
O curso foi idealizado para esclarecer as mudanças propostas pela Reforma, de forma clara e objetiva. Com os exemplos de cálculo, o curso possibilita a compreensão das mudanças que teremos.
No ano de 2026, teremos o período de teste da Reforma, onde os primeiros ajustes terão que ser feitos e as decisões tomadas.
Esteja preparado para essa nova fase do Sistema Tributário Brasileiro, tendo o o conhecimento das decisões já aprovadas em lei.
target_audience: Contadores, estudantes de contabilidade, advogados e empresários.

courses.description:
Découvrez les clés de la fiscalité de la location meublée dans ce cours complet conçu pour les débutants en fiscalité immobilière et pour les propriétaires.  Que vous soyez débutant dans l'investissement immobilier ou que vous cherchiez à optimiser votre stratégie fiscale, ce cours vous fournira toutes les informations nécessaires pour naviguer avec succès dans le monde complexe de la fiscalité française concernant la location meublée.
Ce cours comporte toutes les informations nécessaires pour comprendre la fiscalité de la location meublée. Il vous aidera à immatriculer votre activité de loueur meublé, il vous aidera également à déclarer vos revenus en meublé chaque année. Et enfin, et c'est le plus important, vous aurez toutes les clés pour optimiser la fiscalité de votre bien en meublé et payer moins d'impôts.
Le cours que je vous propose ici a été réalisé par moi-même. Je travaille dans le domaine comptable et fiscal depuis plus de 10 ans et je suis administrateur du site J'optimise Mon Impôt (lien du site sur mon profil Udemy) qui traite de la fiscalité des particuliers. J'espère que ce cours vous apportera de nombreuses informations utiles, que vous pourrez optimiser vos investissements immobiliers et surtout que la fiscalité de la location meublée n'aura plus de secrets pour vous !
Inscrivez-vous dès maintenant pour démarrer votre parcours vers une maîtrise complète de la fiscalité de la location meublée et transformez vos investissements en succès financier durable.

courses.title: Bahrain VAT: The Tax law, how it works and application
courses.bio: Learn how VAT works in Bahrain and its impact on different sectors. Professional course for Accountants and students.
objectives: Understand the principles of VAT and how it operates in the Bahrain
The impact VAT has on business and transactions.
Compliance and filing obligations for businesses
Responsibilities for businesses, their relationship with Tax Authority and timing of submissions.
requirements: An interest in Finance and tax in Bahrain
Basic Accounting
Tax Law
Basic understanding of business and transactions
courses.description:
This course is delivered by a seasoned VAT consultant from the UK, with a decade of experience and a background in PwC/Deloitte. Having been stationed in the UAE in 2018 to assist clients in the UAE and KSA with VAT implementation, the instructor brings first-hand knowledge of GCC VAT and a wealth of insights to share, especially for those new to VAT.
Our objective is to provide you with a solid understanding of VAT principles and their application in Bahrain. The course covers specific rules for Bahrain, governed by the NBT, and also explores the interaction with other GCC states. VAT impacts all businesses, with most required to register. We’ll help you understand the responsibilities of your business under VAT law and how it affects your business model - from existing contracts and pricing to sales, marketing, and overhead costs. We’ll also highlight your compliance obligations.
The course content ranges from basic to advanced material, catering to both beginners and experienced VAT practitioners. We believe this is the most comprehensive online course on Bahrain VAT you’ll find in the market.
The biteseize chunk  videos will be a wonderful resource for any professional seeking to excel  in his finance  career or solidify himself as a  Tax  advisor.

Introdução: Classificando uma pessoa jurídica - Tipos societários e regimes tributários

requirements: Conhecimento Básico em contabilidade
courses.description:
Neste curso serão tratados os principais aspectos que norteiam a contabilidade tributária/fiscal, de forma que sirva de pontapé para que o aluno compreenda o cotidiano de um departamento fiscal e possa aprofundar o conteúdo através da prática.
Todo o conteúdo é 100% embasado nas legislações e atos normativos vigentes em 2021, de forma que a aprendizagem esteja plenamente atualizada.
O conteúdo será dividido da seguinte forma:
1. Noções Gerais da Legislação Tributária (Leis que norteiam o direito tributário; Código Tributário Nacional e Constituição Federal de 88)
2. Impostos municipais, estaduais e federais; diretos e indiretos (Elementos gerais dos impostos, classificação quanto à função, à incidência, ao ente, etc..)
3. Tipos societários e regimes tributários (Lei 123/06 e Lei das SA’s Lei 6404/76)
4. PIS, COFINS e ICMS (Apurações, base de cálculo, fato gerador)
5. Contingências Tributárias e Planejamento Tributário (Modelo de planejamento tributário eficaz)
6. Fiscalização e Procedimentos Administrativos (Tipos e exemplos de fiscalização)
Com tal carga de conhecimento, você aluno será capaz de conhecer a legislação por trás de cada pequeno ato no dia-a-dia fiscal, de forma que a execução de suas tarefas deixe de ser puramente mecânica e se torne cognitiva, valendo-se de bagagem teórica eficaz.
Espero que aproveite e apreenda o máximo possível de cada aula, pois foi pensada justamente para você!
target_audience: Acadêmicos de ciências contábeis, administração, economia e áreas afins

courses.description:
Are you a personal trainer or fitness professional looking to maximize your profits and reduce your tax burden? This course is designed to help you unlock creative and unconventional tax strategies that will not only save you money but also help you scale your fitness business.
In "Optimize Your Fitness Business: Tax Hacks for Trainers", you’ll learn how to turn your everyday business expenses—such as equipment purchases, travel, and marketing—into powerful deductions that reduce your tax liability. Whether you're working towards six-figure success or simply want to improve your business's profitability, this course provides actionable steps for trainers at all stages.
We'll dive into outside-the-box tax strategies that go beyond the basics. You'll discover how to:
Deduct costs like gym equipment, studio rental, and even uncommon expenses like marketing materials and educational certifications.
Maximize your home office deduction if you’re running online or hybrid fitness programs.
Utilize vehicle and travel deductions creatively to reduce your taxable income.
Plan for growth by selecting the right business structure—whether you're starting small or expanding to multiple locations.
Each lesson is packed with real-life examples, unique deduction opportunities, and innovative ways to optimize your space and expenses. By the end of the course, you'll have a roadmap for maximizing deductions, staying compliant with tax laws, and reinvesting your savings into building a profitable and scalable fitness empire.
Join us and learn how to take your fitness business to the next level!
target_audience: Personal trainers and fitness professionals seeking to optimize tax savings.
Self-employed trainers, gym owners, or online fitness entrepreneurs.
Trainers earning six figures or aiming to grow their fitness business.
Beginner trainers and experienced professionals wanting better tax strategies.

courses.title: Secret Tax Saving Ideas Your Advisors AREN'T Showing You!
courses.bio: Financial Planning Expert’s Guide to Saving Thousands in Future Income Taxes – Each & Every Year!
objectives: Understand our National Debt situation today
Understand income tax rates and reporting
Identify up to 7 available tax free income sources
Learn how life insurance can generate tax-free income in retirement
Examine a real life tax reduction case study
Understand the surprising 'pitfalls' of large IRA and 401(k) accounts

Tax Free Degree Overview video: Introduction to Tax Free Degree courses

requirements: No experience necessary
courses.description:
I’m Dave Spence and I’ve been a Certified Financial Planner for over 35 years . . . and a CPA for more than 40 years. I’ve helped thousands of Americans wisely manage their money!
After those decades in the trenches helping others one-on-one, I decided to put my best advice for the ENTIRE DECADE of the 2020’s into this course, to help as MANY people as I could. And HERE’S WHY:
Today, America is facing a financial TRAIN WRECK that most people don’t see coming at all.
I’m talking about a PERFECT STORM that could FORCE our income tax rates to go UP & UP – PERHAPS EVEN DOUBLING - in order to deal with it.
Some of the individual storms coming together are
· Baby Boomers Retiring in Waves,
· the Highest National Debt in our history, and
· Shameful Political Gridlock and Greed in Washington

Combine those with the highest inflation and highest interest rates we’ve seen in decades, and there’s an UNSUSTAINABLE SHORTFALL between what we take in and what we spend in the U.S.
In the first part of this course you’ll learn that we have actually been here before in America, and that we used HIGHER TAXES to work our way back to normalcy.
In the rest of the course, I’ll explain what you can do over the next several years to PREPARE and AVOID the higher taxes others will have to pay. It’ll be like having a CRYSTAL BALL when the course ends!
You do not need to understand the Tax Code or be a financial wiz. I’m good at making things easy to understand. And I’ll happily answer your questions after the course!
After I explain the basic concepts, I’ll show you a real-life example where a couple was able to reduce their projected future taxes by over $1 Million. You won’t want to miss that MASTER CLASS!
I’m far from alone in the thinking that I’ll be sharing with you. You’ll also hear from national experts like best-selling author and blogger, David McKnight, America’s IRA Expert, Ed Slott, CPA, and former Controller of the United States, the Hon. David M. Walker at various points in the course.
And the MOST IMPORTANT REASON you should take this course is THIS: The trusted advisors that SHOULD be talking with you about this AREN’T! If you use a Tax Professional, like a CPA, for your taxes or a Financial Advisor to help you with your investments, they are actually INCENTIVIZED to NOT tell you what you’ll learn in this course. And I’ll explain that in detail as well.
So, if you can’t immediately name 7 different ways to ELIMINATE taxes in retirement, this course is for you. Enroll now – I can’t wait to help YOU next! Thanks!
target_audience: Early- and Pre-Retirees with substantial savings in tax-deferred accounts (401k, IRAs, etc.)

courses.title: 初心者向け住民税 理論講座（問題1-1～問題3-2）
courses.bio: 理論サブノートの章立てに沿ってAIチューターと学ぶ住民税試験対策
objectives: 住民税の基本的な仕組みや法的構造を理解し、税理士試験に求められる理論問題に対応できる基礎力を身につけることができます。
所得割・均等割などの各種課税要素をある程度正確に説明できるようになり、法令用語の読み方にも慣れることができます。
理論暗記だけに頼らず、背景知識や制度趣旨を踏まえて整理することで、本番の応用力や記述力を高める力が養われます。
学習後は、自分の言葉で理論を説明できるようになり、試験委員が求める「正確で筋の通った記述」が書けるようになります。

紹介: #1-1 個人の納税義務者（利子割、配当割、株式等譲渡所得割、法人課税信託を除く。）
#1-2 個人住民税の非課税（均等割、所得割）及び条例による減免
#2-1 個人の均等割（非課税及び納税義務者等を除く）
#3-2 株式等に係る譲渡所得等の金額に対する課税の特例（特定中小会社が発行した株式に係る特例を除く。）

requirements: 特別な法律知識や税務経験は不要です。簿記3級程度の会計知識があればよりスムーズに学べますが、初心者でも無理なく学習できます。
courses.description: 初心者向けの住民税理論講義です。AIが生成した内容も含まれているため、必ず市販の参考書や法令集を手元に置き、照らし合わせながらご視聴ください。本講義は、受験勉強や制度理解の補助教材として位置づけています。進行は「住民税理論サブノート」の章立てに沿って行い、本コースでは問題1-1～問題3-2の範囲を扱います。重要な条文や用語を確認しつつ、背景や趣旨にも触れながら学習を進めます。予備知識の少ない方でも流れを掴めるよう、できる限り平易な説明を心がけています。
target_audience: これから住民税法の理論学習を始める初学者、独学で挫折した経験のある方等に最適です。

requirements: TurboTax Home and Business
1099s from Uber, Lyft or Sidecar
Tax Summary from Uber
Yearly Stats from Lyft
Income information from Sidecar

courses.description:
Taxes for Uber, Lyft, and Sidecar drivers are handled differently than what most full time workers are used to. Since we are now considered self employed contractors, we are now responsible for own taxes, including payroll deductions for Social Security and Medicare.
This course has many tips on taxes and goes over one of the most common tax deduction, which is mileage. It also covers instances where you want to deduct expenses, but its not recommended unless your car's depreciation is high or have more than 4 vehicles in your fleet. For most drivers, deducting your mileage on your vehicle with the proper records is the easiest way to reduce your tax liability.
Also included in this course is a detailed video on how to file your taxes with Turbotax Home and Business!
Here is the list of items it covers:
Do Lyft and Uber Drivers Pay Taxes?
What about Quarterly Estimated Taxes?
Introduction to Rideshare Taxes
Tax Deductions and Calculations for Rideshare Drivers
The 1099 Form
Taxes: The Schedule C
Taxes: IRS 1040-ES
The Schedule SE
Deduct Mileage, Lease Payments or Car Expenses?
Section 179 Deduction For Expense-Based Calculations
The Best Kept Secret in Rideshare Taxes
How to File your Taxes with Turbotax Home and Business (Video Walkthrough)
target_audience: Any rideshare drivers who plan on filing their own taxes
Any rideshare drivers who need help with their taxes

courses.title: Canadian Taxes
courses.bio: Learn about Canadian income tax, business tax and much more!
objectives: The tax system in Canada
Income tax
Property, trust taxes
Capital gains, business tax, domestic and international taxes
requirements: None
courses.description:
This course provides an in-depth understanding of the Canadian taxation system, covering key concepts, legislation, and practical applications. It is designed for individuals seeking to enhance their knowledge of tax principles, whether for personal interest, professional development, or preparation for a career in tax services.
Course Objectives:
By the end of this course, participants will be able to:
Understand the structure and functions of the Canadian tax system.
Identify and apply key principles of Canadian tax law.
Prepare personal and corporate tax returns.
Navigate and utilize resources provided by the Canada Revenue Agency (CRA).
Stay updated with recent changes and trends in tax legislation.
Course Content:
Introduction to Canadian Taxation
Overview of the Canadian tax system.
The role of the Canada Revenue Agency (CRA).
Taxpayer rights and responsibilities.
Income Tax Fundamentals
Definition of income and types of taxable income.
Employment income, business income, and investment income.
Deductions, credits, and allowances.
Personal Taxation
Filing personal income tax returns.
Understanding tax brackets and rates.
Common deductions and credits for individuals.
Tax planning strategies for individuals.
Corporate Taxation
Overview of corporate income tax.
Differences between small business and corporation taxes.
Filing corporate tax returns.
Tax planning for businesses.
Goods and Services Tax (GST) / Harmonized Sales Tax (HST)
Understanding GST/HST.
Filing and reporting requirements.
Input tax credits.
Tax Administration and Compliance
Tax audits and appeals process.
Record-keeping requirements.
Penalties and interest.
Current Issues and Trends in Taxation
Recent changes in tax legislation.
Implications of digital economy on taxation.
International tax issues affecting Canadian taxpayers.
target_audience: Anyone wanting to learn more about Canadian Taxes

courses.title: Short Course in Personal Income Tax within South Africa
courses.bio: Personal Income Tax: Income; Deductions; Salaried Employees; Tax Implication of a Natural Person; Capital Gains Tax
objectives: Demonstrate an understanding of when income received by an individual taxpayer should be taxed and when deductions are claimable.
Differentiate between fringe benefits and allowances and the inclusion in a taxpayer’s taxable income
