requirements: Learners must have digital and numeracy literacy, with a basic accounting understanding.
Equipment required is a Laptop/PC with high speed internet with access to microsoft excel.
courses.description:
As tax is both a legal requirement and social responsibility, it is critical that all individuals have a solid grasp of the principles of taxation and their related obligations. During this course, you will develop the foundational principles of personal income tax and cover cover practical issues impacting individual taxes such Airbnb/rental income, home office expenses, medical tax credits and travel allowances. Upon completing this short course, you will be empowered to manage your personal tax affairs


Key Objectives of this course:
Demonstrate an understanding of when income received by an individual taxpayer should be taxed and when deductions are claimable.
Differentiate between fringe benefits and allowances and the inclusion in a taxpayer’s taxable income.
Evaluate various options for the structuring of salary packages
Calculate the taxable income of an individual taxpayer.
Identify the various tax instruments and the structural elements of the Income Tax Act
Demonstrate an understanding of the basic mechanics of income tax Identify the different tax role players and the different tax types
Demonstrate a basic understanding of how income tax is calculated
Demonstrate an understanding of the process of submitting final tax returns
Demonstrate a basic understanding of what the Tax Administration Act is and what a tax practitioner is
target_audience: Self-employed Individuals looking to maximize tax savings within South Africa.
Salaried employees who need to understand their income tax within South Africa
Retired individuals or anyone seeking to demystify the personal income tax process.

courses.title: Taxes Made Easy-Gig Work Filing, Expenses & Deductions
courses.bio: Learn how to file gig work taxes by recognizing types of gig income and recognizing gig work expenses and deductions.
objectives: By the end of this course you will be able to complete a tax return containing income from gig work with confidence
Learn the fundamentals of reporting income and what type of gig worker you are
Learn about what expenses you can claim and deduct
Learn about tax forms such as 1099-MISC, 1099-NEC, 1099-K and 1099-B
Learn about record keeping and what supporting documents you should keep
Learn about estimated tax payments and self-employment tax
Much more

Types of Gig Workers: What Type of Gig Worker Are you?

requirements: A willingness to learn about filing gig work taxes the easy way.
courses.description:
This course is designed to help you, a self-employed independent gig worker, understand and meet your federal income tax filing obligations by recognizing types of gig income and learning what qualifies as gig work expenses and which of those gig work expenses you can deduct.


You'll learn all the fundamentals of reporting and filing a tax return for gig work. You will also learn about all the deductions you can claim for expenses you paid while completing your gig work or deductions towards a part of your home you used solely for your gig work.


You’ll learn how to determine what type of gig worker you are and you’ll learn about tax forms such as 1099-MISC, 1099-NEC, 1099-K and 1099-B, Schedule C and Schedule SE. You’ll also learn about record keeping and what supporting documents to keep to help verify your expenses and income.
This course contains  51 lectures and almost 1 hour of content. It's gig worker taxes made easy and is designed for anyone, regardless of tax experience or level of tax understanding.
By the end of this course, you'll have a good understanding of the IRS’s gig income filing definitions, rules and requirements, as well as a good understanding of qualifying gig work expenses and deductions.
target_audience: This course is for learners interested in knowing how to file a tax return containing gig work income.
This course if for learners interested in knowing what expenses and tax deductions can be claimed for gig work.

Toplam 275 Video Dersten oluşan ve SMMM - Staj Başlatma Sınavı (SGS) için eksiksiz konu anlatım setinin ikinci serisi Vergi Hukuku video kursunu sunuyoruz.
Genellikle bir (1) ders saati ortalama 40- 50 dakika uzunluğundadır. (Bazı dersler 30-35 dakika bazı dersler 60-75 dakika aralığında olabilir. Konu bütünlüğü bozulmaması için kısa ve uzun çekimler yapılmıştır.)
Derste anlatılan notlar ya da ek kaynaklar pdf olarak sisteme yüklenecektir.
Video dersler ile ilgili bir problem yaşadığınız anda bizlere sitemiz üzerinden canlı destek alanımızdan ya da yine anasayfamızda yer alan whatsapp destek hattımızdan ulaşabilirsiniz. (İster sorubankasinet ister smmmuzemcom üzerinden bizlere ulaşabilirsiniz.)
SGS Hazırlık sürecinizde kaliteli ve kapsamlı bir içeriğe sahip konu anlatım video eğitimlerimizle kısa sürede eksiklerinizi kapatabilecek ve özel ders niteliğinde 4K SGS Video Eğitim Derslerimizle sınavda başarıya daha yakın olacaksınız.
Eğitmenlerimiz 15 yılı aşkın süredir SMMM - SGS alanında Türkiye'nin belirli illerinde eğitim verdikleri için uzman ve sınav sistemine hakimdirler.
target_audience: SMMM - SGS alanında sınava hazırlanan adaylar için nitelikli bir eğitim.

courses.description:
エクセル、freee、Money Foward等のソフトを用いて確定申告をする方のために、確定申告に必要な基礎知識を提供します。
起業や副業をするためには、自分で帳簿を付けて確定申告をしなければなりません。そして、帳簿を付ける意味は単に確定申告書を作成するためだけではありません。
今話題の配当所得についても、１）申告不要、２）申告分離課税又は３）総合課税の選択で悩んでいる方のために、正しい考え方を提供します。


このコースは５つのセクションからできています。


⑴このコースの目的と対象等
このセクションでは、このコースの目的と対象等を紹介します。
このコースの目的（何をこのコースで学ぶのか）を説明し、このコースの対象（このコースは誰のために作られたのか）を説明します。そして、細川 健（ほそかわ たけし）の自己紹介をした後、このコースの制作理由、コースのゴール設定及びこのコースの受講に当たっての留意事項を説明します。そして最後に、このコースの全体像を説明します。何を勉強しているか、何処を勉強しているか分からなくなったら、このコースの全体像とセクションごとの説明に戻って、内容を確認してから前に進んでください。


⑵確定申告に必要な複式簿記等の基礎知識
このセクションでは、確定申告に必要な仕訳と帳簿の基礎知識等について説明します。
まず、仕訳の意味と考え方を説明し、発生主義と現金主義の相違について説明します。そして、貸借対照表（B／S）と損益計算書（P／L）の意義について説明し、仕訳とT字勘定の記述方法について説明します。さらに、最低限必要な帳簿について説明し、そもそも、なぜ、帳簿をつける必要があるのかを説明してこのセクションを終わります。


⑶具体的な取引の説明
このセクションでは、具体的な取引の説明を仕訳とT字勘定を用いて行います。取引を事業用預金を用いる場合の仕訳と個人預金を用いる場合で説明します。 基本的に税込価格（消費税を含む）で説明しますが、一部税込価格と税抜価格に分けて両方の仕訳を説明します。 そして、具体的な取引と仕訳の説明（売上、仕入、消耗品費、個人的に取得した建物を転用、水道光熱費等の家事按分、中古建物の取得、減価償却資産、減価償却費の家事按分、租税公課、事業主貸と事業主借、元入金、カメラマン報酬の支払と収受）を豊富な事例を用いて説明します。


⑷所得税法の具体的な計算方法の説明
このセクションでは、所得税の具体的な計算方法を８つに分けて学びます。
まず、確定申告が必要な人の条件を説明します。事業は事業所得、副業は通常は雑所得に分類され、給与は給与所得、配当は配当所得に分類されます。それぞれの所得は収入金額から必要経費や給与所得控除額・法定控除額を差し引きくことにより算定され、所得から所得控除額を差し引くことにより課税所得は算定されます。そして、申告不要、申告分離課税及び総合課税の違いを説明し、事業所得・雑所得・給与等にどれぐらいの税金がかかるのかを具体的な税金の計算方法を説明します。


⑸確定申告書（不動産所得・配当所得）の具体例
このセクションでは、国税花子の確定申告書を用いて具体的な確定申告書の作成方法を学びます。
まず、ID・パスワード方式による確定申告の方法（e-Tax）を説明し、認識番号とパスワードの設定方法を説明します。そして、国税花子の確定申告書、青色申告決算書（不動産所得用）及び添付資料（特定口座年間取引報告書）を用いて、不動産所得と配当所得の説明をします。配当所得については、セクション3の補足説明を含みます。このこのセクションを視聴することにより、不動産所得と配当所得の確定申告ができるようになります。


さあ、一緒に勉強して行きましょう。
target_audience: 現フリーランス（個人事業主）の方やこれから起業する方で、自分で帳簿を作成して事業所得又は雑所得を確定申告したい方
フリーランス（個人事業主）の方で、エクセルやfreee及びMoney Foward等のソフトを用いて事業所得を確定申告をしたい方
サラリーマンの方で、副業による収入を事業所得又は雑所得として自分で帳簿を作成して確定申告する必要のある方

courses.description:
What is GST?
Goods and Services Tax -- GST -- is a comprehensive tax levy on manufacture, sale and consumption of goods and services at a national level. Through a tax credit mechanism, this tax is collected on value-added goods and services at each stage of sale or purchase in the supply chain. The system allows the set-off of GST paid on the procurement of goods and services against the GST which is payable on the supply of goods or services. However, the end consumer bears this tax as he is the last person in the supply chain. Experts say that GST is likely to improve tax collections and boost India's economic development by breaking tax barriers between States and integrating India through a uniform tax rate.
What type of GST is proposed for India?
India is planning to implement a dual GST system. Under dual GST, a Central Goods and Services Tax (CGST) and a State Goods and Services Tax (SGST) will be levied on the taxable value of a transaction. All goods and services, barring a few exceptions, will be brought into the GST base. There will be no distinction between goods and services.
Target Audience:
CA, Accounts, Tax Practitioners, Tax Consultants, Startups, MSME's
Basic Requirement:
Need to have basic understanding of Taxation.

courses.description:
A warm welcome to the Goods and Services Tax (GST) India course by Uplatz.


The concept of Goods and Services Tax (GST) was first introduced by Prime Minister Narendra Modi (India) when the government launched GST into action on the midnight of 1 July 2017. However, GST was almost two decades in the creation since the concept was first projected under the Atal Bihari Vajpayee government. Goods and Sales Tax is a destination based tax on consumption of goods and services. It is levied at all stages right from manufacture up to final consumption with credit of taxes paid at previous stages available as setoff. In a nutshell, only value addition is taxed and weight of tax is borne by the final customer. In order to regulate inflation, essential items including food, which currently establish roughly half of the consumer inflation basket, will be taxed at zero rate.
The GST system in India is a dual GST with the Centre and States simultaneously imposing it on a common tax base. The GST levied by the Centre on intra-State supply of goods and / or services would is called the Central GST (CGST) and that levied by the States is called the State GST (SGST). Similarly, Integrated GST (IGST) is taxed and managed by Centre on every inter-state supply of goods and services. India is a federal country where both the Centre and the States have been assigned the powers to levy and collect taxes through appropriate legislation. Both the levels of Government have distinct responsibilities to perform according to the division of powers prescribed in the Constitution for which they need to raise resources. A dual GST will, therefore, is consistent with the Constitutional prerequisite of fiscal federalism.


Uplatz provides this comprehensive course on GST (India) covering all topics related to Goods and Services Tax. This GST course will help you understand the complexities of GST rules, regulations, supply, processes, charges, exemptions, appeals, and settlements. The GST training includes practical scenarios and the actual implementation of GST from both the taxpayer's angle and from the government's point of view. This GST course will equip you skills to become a Corporate Tax Consultant with mastery over the most important business tax in India i.e. GST.
This GST course will also help you to prepare for CA, CS, and other accountancy exams.

courses.title: Learn Basic Canadian Personal Income Tax in Less Than 1 Hour
courses.bio: Fundamentals of personal income tax in Canada
objectives: Basic personal income tax
Filing a personal tax return
Online resources to access tax information
requirements: N/A
courses.description:
Hello Canada!
Tax season is upon us.
Many of us will try to do it online or pay a professional to file them.


The truth is for most of us personal income tax can be straightforward. The most important aspect is to have a basic knowledge of the tax system as well knowing where to find and report that information


As a former CRA employee, I have gathered valuable tax experience.
And now as a CPA, I am on a journey of helping Canadians navigate the ever changing economy. I have developed a simple course to make taxes a less daunting experience.


It is my hope that the content developed is easily understood and digested by my fellow Canadians. Feedback is always welcome on how to make the content easier to understand.
This course will also provide exclusive access to my very own private Facebook group where we can engage in tax related matters.
I am confident that you will harness the value behind this course and become tax ready.
This is for the 2019 Tax season and has not been updated to reflect 2020 changes.
If you want more information, make sure to write to me.
Learn more about:
- Income
-Deductions
- Credits


How to file with ease if your tax situation is fairly simple. I also show you how to access, easy to understand information regarding your taxes.
Update Feb 2021: I will be creating a new video on new items for the 2020 tax season. Make sure you watch it.
target_audience: Canadians wanting to understand more about taxes

courses.title: Travel and Tax
courses.bio: Understanding how it works and how to calculate allowances
objectives: Travel and Subsistence Allowance
Travel Reimbursement
Private use of company owned vehicle – Tax and VAT implications
Use of your own vehicle
Away from your usual place of work for more than 24 hours
Flights, Accommodation and Car Rental
requirements: No prerequistes required
courses.description:
*This course relates to South African Taxes only*


With life starting to return to normal post pandemic, it is the perfect opportunity to discuss travel and accommodation and what it means for the taxpayer and the company.
During this session a variety of travel scenarios will be discussed for example how to go about claiming expenses associated with travel, what the deductions are, what are the allowance guidelines set out by SARS, the impact they have on your VAT and TAX, what the implications are for your PAYE and company tax as well as, how to determine if travel expenses can be allocated as a business expense or not.


TOPICS DISCUSSED:
Travel Allowance – how it works
Travel Allowance – how to calculate a reasonable allowance
Subsistence Allowance
Travel Reimbursement
Private use of company owned vehicle – Tax and VAT implications
Use of your own vehicle
Away from your usual place of work for more than 24 hours
Flights, Accommodation and Car Rental
Determining the value of a vehicle
Book Value VS Open Market Value – know the difference


All Included:
Video presented course
Downloadable course material
Certificate of training
Optional assessment
SAIT Accredited - 4 verifiable CPD points


About the Presenter:
Ruzel van Jaarsveld
Ruzel has over 26 years financial and bookkeeping experience, working with many industries and corporate environments, with extensive knowledge and practical application of trial balance, payroll, VAT, PAYE returns, Inventory control, Management Accounts, E-filing and Procedures of Importing and Exporting.
Ruzel is a seasoned appointed facilitator with Biz Facility, and for numerous years has been presenting various national practical financial workshops to business owners and corporate financial staff.
target_audience: Employees, Managers, Financial Staff and Individuals

courses.title: Reforma Tributária sem crise
courses.bio: Se prepare para o futuro da área fiscal e tributária
objectives: Conhecer os novos tributos e todas suas regras
Entender como ficará a transição da Reforma até 2032
Compreender e calcular impactos para as diferentes áreas e setores
Se preparar para os novos comportamentos exigidos do profissional fiscal do futuro
requirements: Como o curso trará os conceitos-base da Reforma desde o seu princípio, não é necessário um conhecimento prévio, mas o aprendizado terá maior aderência se o aluno atuar, direta ou indiretamente, com impostos no seu dia-a-dia.
courses.description:
A área fiscal e tributária passará nos próximos anos pela sua maior mudança já vista em décadas. Se hoje trabalhar com tributos já é complicado, a partir de 2026 isso ficará ainda mais complexo. Além disso, o mercado já não olha mais para o profissional especialista nos tributos atuais - agora, é obrigatório que o profissional tributário já esteja 100% por dentro dos novos tributos que estão por vir. Por isso criei o curso Reforma Tributária sem Crise, para ajudar profissionais dessa área que sou apaixonado a se atualizarem de forma dinâmica e sem muitos rodeios, trazendo o que existe de mais atualizado sobre IBS, CBS, IS e tudo o que eles trazem de mudanças para sua implementação.
No curso vou abordar desde o aspecto introdutório da reforma, até abordarmos de fato as legislações que trouxeram os novos tributos, discutir sobre regimes e tributações diferenciados e deixei ao final um módulo bastante especial, em que trago tópicos relacionados a como o profissional fiscal e tributário deve lidar com a Reforma para transforma-la em um agente de crescimento da carreira, como que o profissional pode se tornar um profissional mais estratégico, dentre outros tópicos. A ideia não é trazer tão somente um curso teórico, mas sim um curso que demonstre claramente como o profissional deve lidar com a Reforma Tributária e oferecer ferramentas para que essa transição seja, ao menos, um pouco mais tranquila.
O curso terá publicações de aulas semanais, de 21/09 até 27/10, totalizando quase 30 aulas e mais de 4 horas de conteúdo!
Espero que eu seja um amigo nessa sua jornada em busca de conhecimento e capacitação. Conte comigo nessa caminhada!
target_audience: Profissionais fiscais, tributários e contábeis que buscam estar atualizados com a Reforma Tributária
Advogados e consultores que atuam com tributos
Empreendedores que querem conhecer as mudanças propostas pela Reforma Tributária

courses.title: Einkommensteuererklärung selbst erstellen
courses.bio: Steuererklärung selbst erstellen für Arbeitnehmer und Studenten - Steuern sparen durch Werbungskosten und mehr

Einkommensteuererklärung selbst erstelle: Anlage Sonderausgaben - Spenden und mehr absetzen
Anlage Außergewöhnliche Belastungen - Krankheitskosten und mehr absetzen
Anlage N - Einkünfte aus nichtselbständiger Arbeit, Werbungskosten
Anlage KAP - Einkünfte aus Kapitalvermögen, Sparerpauschbetrag

requirements: keine Vorkenntnisse erforderlich
courses.description:
Möchtest du lernen, wie du deine Einkommensteuererklärung ganz einfach selbst erstellen kannst? In diesem Kurs erfährst du, wie du deine Steuererklärung als Arbeitnehmer oder Student korrekt ausfüllen kannst und dabei sogar Steuern sparen kannst.
In diesem Kurs gehen wir speziell auf die Verwendung von Papiervordrucken ein. Du wirst Schritt für Schritt durch die verschiedenen Anlagen geführt, die für deine Einkommensteuererklärung relevant sind. Wir behandeln den Hauptvordruck sowie die Anlagen Vorsorgeaufwand, Sonderausgaben, AV (Riester-Rente), Außergewöhnliche Belastungen, Haushaltsnahe Aufwendungen, Kind, N (nichtselbständige Arbeit) und KAP (Kapitaleinkünfte).
Mein Ziel ist es, dir eine umfassende Ausfüllhilfe zu bieten, damit du den Prozess der Steuererklärung verstehst und erfolgreich abschließen kannst. Wir besprechen wichtige Begriffe und Konzepte, die du kennen musst, um deine Steuern optimal zu gestalten. Insbesondere zeige ich dir, wie du Werbungskosten nutzen kannst, um Steuern zu sparen und dein zu versteuerndes Einkommen zu optimieren.
Dieser Kurs ist für Anfänger konzipiert und erfordert keine Vorkenntnisse im Bereich der Steuererklärung. Egal, ob du zum ersten Mal eine Steuererklärung abgeben möchtest oder bereits Erfahrung gesammelt hast und deine Kenntnisse auffrischen möchtest, dieser Kurs ist für dich geeignet.
Was wirst du lernen?
Verständnis der verschiedenen Anlagen für die Einkommensteuererklärung
Schritt-für-Schritt-Anleitung zum Ausfüllen der Papiervordrucke
Optimierung deiner Steuererklärung durch Werbungskosten und mehr
Tipps und Tricks, um Steuern zu sparen
Vermeidung häufiger Fehler bei der Steuererklärung
Nach Abschluss dieses Kurses wirst du in der Lage sein, deine Einkommensteuererklärung eigenständig zu erstellen und dabei von den Möglichkeiten der Steueroptimierung zu profitieren. Spare bares Geld und erlange ein besseres Verständnis für deine persönlichen Finanzen.
Worauf wartest du noch? Melde dich jetzt an und beginne noch heute damit, deine Einkommensteuererklärung selbst in die Hand zu nehmen!

courses.description:
Calma, eu já fui aluno, tentei estudar isso na faculdade e não consegui devido a complexidade e imaturidade, por isso estou aqui tentando repassar tudo que aprendi no MBA, de uma maneira lógica, didática e com uma linguagem simples."
Olá você, seja bem vindo ao curso 2 em 1 - ISS + PIS e COFINS. Sou Antônio Marteson, Contador e especialista em Direito Tributário com mais de 4 mil alunos aqui na Udemy em meus perfis de instrutor. Fico muito feliz por você ter chegado até aqui, tenho certeza que irá obter muito conhecimento, pelo menos eu farei de tudo para isso.
Deixa eu falar brevemente sobre o PIS e COFINS.
Com toda certeza você já deve ter ouvido falar em PIS e COFINS, e deve também ter ouvido falar que suas legislações são bem complexas. Pois é, quem falou isso estava certo, as normas referentes ao PIS e a COFINS são as mais delicadas e complicadas do direito tributário no Brasil. Eu sei também que você já deve ter tentando iniciar os estudos sobre esse assunto, mas assim como eu na época da faculdade, desistiu porque sentiu que não iria aprender. Calma, eu já fui aluno, tentei estudar isso na faculdade e não consegui devido a complexidade e imaturidade, por isso estou aqui tentando repassar tudo que aprendi no MBA, de uma maneira lógica, didática e com uma linguagem simples.
Em seguida, após estudarmos o PIS e COFINS, iremos estudar o ISS - Imposto sobre serviços.


Vantagens de fazer esse curso online.
Tem certificado. Após o fim do curso você pode baixar.
Acesso vitalício. O curso é seu para sempre.
Tira dúvidas com o instrutor. Pode me fazer perguntas.
30 dias para solicitar reembolso.
Conteúdo de ótima qualidade, caso não gosto, solicite reembolso sem nenhum problema.
Você acessa quando e onde quiser
Metodologia de ensino.
Eu apresento a tela do meu computador, mostro os slides, faço as leituras, explicações, comentários e exemplos práticos de como acontece na realidade.
Eu ensino todo o curso do modo lógico e estruturado, ou seja, o ideal é que você assista aula por aula, sem pular, a não ser que já domine todo o conteúdo daquela aula.


Vamos juntos nessa empreitada, vamos buscar conhecimento juntos. Conhecer é o que liberta o ser humano. Estou esperando você, vem comigo.

"Explore a vastidão do conhecimento em Tributação Nacional e posicione-se à frente no mercado ao dominar a intricada 'burocracia' tributária. Tornar-se um especialista na teoria é essencial em um mundo onde a maioria compreende apenas parcialmente a prática. Não se trata apenas de calcular e decifrar impostos e tributos, mas também de compreender o 'porquê' por trás de cada tributo, desde as questões legais relacionadas à criação da lei até sua forma constitucional de existência.
"Compreenda, coloque em prática e deixe-se envolver pelo fascinante sistema tributário nacional. Afinal, profissionais que combinam sólidos conhecimentos teóricos com a aplicação diária estão mais bem preparados para enfrentar desafios quando verdadeiramente postos à prova.
Sinta-se bem-vindo ao dinâmico universo do Sistema Tributário Nacional!"

requirements: Conhecimento básico em informática
courses.description:
Um novo Curso SAP J1btax usando a versão S/4 Hana no Gui, aulas novas e conteúdo atualizado feito de forma teórica e prática pra você aprender da melhor forma possivel.
Aprenda de forma rápida e prática como ser um Usuário Chave no maior sistema de gestão do mundo, o sistema SAP hoje faz parte de mais do que 70% das grandes empresas no brasil e no mundo, são mais de 190 paises que trabalham com SAP, e mais de 320.000 clientes no mundo.
E um dos desafios de toda empresa é manter seu sistema rodando corretamente para emitir notas fiscais e adquirir mercadorias dos fornecedores, e pra isso acontecer é necessário a parametrização da J1btax, que nada mais é do que tabelas e grupos para configurar o funcionamento dos impostos no sistema SAP, e posteriormente dar entrada nas notas fiscais, e também emitir corretamente as notas fiscais de vendas de mercadorias e prestação de serviços, garantindo a correta aplicação de processos.


Hoje em dia é muito dificil um profissional que possua o conhecimento na J1btax. e por isso esse profissional chega a ganhar salarios na faixa de R$ 12.000,00 no brasil.


Geralmente quem atua com a J1btax são profissionais da área fiscal, tributária ou de T.I. Pois para saber parametrizar corretamente todos os impostos no SAP é necessário um conhecimento fiscal e de sistema, e pensando nisso eu trouxe pra vocês um curso completo que ensina como Parametrizar a J1btax, criar CFOP, NCM, Domicilio Fiscal, criar regras de determinação de impostos e muito mais conhecimento pra você se tornar um Usuário chave no sistema SAP.


Aprenda neste curso

Levy of tax

courses.title: Deceased Taxpayers - Preparation of Final Tax Return
courses.bio: Canadian Tax Preparation
objectives: Preparation of Canadian Final Tax Return
Identify the Importance of a Will
Identify the deductions available on Final Tax Return
Identify the deemed disposition income inclusions on death
requirements: No requirements needed
courses.description:
The death of an individual in Canada gives rise to numerous tax consequences and special filing requirements. Once this course is completed, students will be able to understand the importance of having a Will, understand the tax implications of the death of an individual, identify the tax-saving solutions and strategies that can be implemented to save substantial amounts of tax. If you are a tax advisor then this course will provide you with valuable knowledge in your education.
The course is split up in 6 sections which include:
An introduction
The Importance of a Will
Income Inclusions and Special Elections
Capital Property and how it is treated on the Final Deceased Return
Other Property and how it is treated on the Final Deceased Return
Deductions available
By the end of the course you will be able to prepare the final deceased return for a Canadian tax payer and be able to identify the importance of a Will. This course is targeted to Canadian accountants who are looking to expand their tax knowledge in relation to the death of a taxpayer.


About the Instructor:  I am a tax specialist that services clients all over Ontario. I have experience providing both corporate and personal tax planning strategies for family owned businesses, entrepreneurs and large corporations.
Some of my specializations include:
o Providing advice on how to structure certain transactions to ensure tax minimization;
o Estate planning;
o Implementing creditor proofing strategies.
I have a diverse client base of owner-managed businesses and also work with professional accountants who need assistance with tax planning strategies.
target_audience: Canadian Accountants who are looking to gain knowledge on deceased returns.

courses.title: Residential Status
courses.bio: Learn Resident and Tax Liability In Advance
objectives: Meaning of Residential Status
Types of Resident
Types of Person
Residential status of an Individual Section 6(1)
Conditions : Basic Condition and Additional Condition
Ordinarily Resident, Not - Ordinarily Resident, Non Resident
Residential status of HUF
requirements: Basic Accounting Knowledge
courses.description:
Introduction of Residential Status
Residential Status Contents :
1. How to be an Indian citizen:  By birth Or By Agreement
2. Income shall be taxed or not depends upon the residential status
3. Residential status is determined separately for each previous year
4. Citizenship and residential status of a country are two separate concept
Types of Person : Like Individual, Hindu Undivided Family, Company, Firm etc
Residential status of an Individual Section 6(1)
1) Basic Conditions :
(i) If the individual stayed in India for a period of 182 days or more during relevant previous year.
(ii) If he stayed in India for a period of 60 days or more during relevant previous year and 365 days or more during 4 years immediately preceding the previous year.
2) Additional Condition Section 6(6) :
(i) He has been resident in India in at least two years out of 10 previous years immediately preceding the relevant Previous Year.
(ii) He has been in India for 730 days or more during 7 years immediately preceding the relevant Previous Year.
Types of Resident :
1. Ordinarily Resident : If he satisfies one of the basic condition and both the additional condition.
2. Not Ordinarily Resident : If he satisfies one of the basic conditions but not both the additional condition.
3. Non Resident : If any one of the basic condition are not satisfies.
Residential status of HUF
(1) Resident in India :- If control and management of the affairs is wholly or partly situated in India during relevant previous year.
(a) Resident and ordinarily resident in India:- If “Karta” of H.U.F. satisfies both the “Additional Condition” during relevant previous year.
(b) Resident but not ordinarily resident in India:- If “Karta” of H.U.F. does not satisfy both the “Additional Condition” during relevant previous year.
(2) Non Resident in India :- If control and management of affairs is wholly or partially situated outside India during relevant previous year.
Residential status of Firm, Local Authority, AOP, BOI, and AJP
(1) Resident in India :- If control and management of affairs is wholly or partly situated in India during relevant previous year.
(2) Non Resident in India :- If control and management of affairs is wholly situated outside India.
Residential status of Company
(1) Indian Company:- It is always resident in India.
(2) Foreign Company :- (i) Resident in India:- If control and management of its affairs is situated wholly in India during relevant previous year.
(ii) Non Resident in India :- If control and management of its affairs is situated wholly or partly outside India.
Types of Company
Incidence of Tax according to Residential Status Section 5

courses.description:
Note: This course is designed for Indian Students pursuing CA / CMA / CS Professional Courses. This course is structured following the syllabus prescribed for professional examinations of above courses. Hence, Non Indian students, please do not take this course.

Welcome to this course Basics of Indian Customs Act A Complete Study.
In this course, you will learn about legal provisions prescribed under Indian Customs Act, 1962 and it will help you to understand the act with lots of examples and case studies.
Initially only few topics are published. However, over a period of time, following topics also proposed to be included in the course. Hence, go through the course curriculum before purchasing and make your decision to buy only after ensuring, topics you require are covered in this course.
Proposed topics:
a) Levy & Exemptions from Customs Duty
b) Types of Duty
c) Classification of Imported & Exported Goods
d) Valuation under Customs Act
e) Importation, Exportation & Transportation of Goods
f) Warehousing
g) Duty Drawback
h) Demand and Recovery
i) Refund

courses.title: Crypto Steuern: Steuererklärung für Kryptowährung erstellen
courses.bio: CoinTracking: Portfolio-Tracking, Bilanzen erstellen, Steuerfreie Coins erkennen, PnL versteuern, inkl. Steuer-Formulare
objectives: Steuern auf Kryptowährungen einreichen
Steuerpflichtige und nicht steuerpflichtige Ereignisse
Besteuerungsmethoden richtig erkennen

Durchschnittseinkaufspreise ermitteln (DCA)
CoinTracking Account erstellen und einrichten

Einführung: Tipps: So arbeitest du mit diesem Kurs am besten
Die Steuererklärung: Die Steuererklärung von A bis Z (inkl. Formblatt)
CoinTracking Service, wenn es mal schwerer wird
Fazit und Ressourcen (Handout): So einfach kann das Thema Steuern sein :-)

requirements: Anfänger und Fortgeschrittene
courses.description:
Bereit, den Sprung in die Welt der Kryptowährungen zu wagen und gleichzeitig sicherzustellen, dass du deinen steuerlichen Verpflichtungen nachkommst? Dieser Kurs bietet dir einen umfassenden Einblick in die Besteuerung von Kapitalgewinnen aus Kryptowährungen, Coin-to-Coin-Transaktionen und vieles mehr. Du lernst, wie du Steuerformulare mit CoinTracking erstellst und dich auf die steuerliche Behandlung von Krypto-Investitionen vorbereitest.
Lernziele:
Wie du Investitionen in Crypto-Assets (auch Krypto oder Kryptowährung genannt) steuerlich behandelst
Was sind steuerpflichtige Ereignisse in Bezug auf alle Kryptowährungen?
Wie du die Gewinne aus Kryptowährungen in deiner Steuererklärung angibst
Behalte dein Portfolio im Blick (Bilanzen, Durchschnitts-Einkaufspreise, etc.)
Teil 1: Grundlagen zur Steuer
Erlerne die Grundlagen der Steuerpflicht - was muss versteuert werden und was nicht? Dies ist der Schlüssel zu einem soliden Verständnis der steuerlichen Behandlung von Kryptowährungen.
Was muss versteuer werden? Was nicht?
Teil 2: Technische Grundlagen (CoinTracking)
Lerne, wie du CoinTracking einrichtest und mit deiner Börse verknüpfst. Erfahre, wie du Coins manuell, per API und CSV einträgst, um deine Investitionen effektiv zu verwalten.
CoinTracking einrichten und mit deiner Börse verknüpfen
Coins manuell, per API und CSV eintragen
Teil 3: Reporting - Das Portfolio im Überblick
Erhalte einen vollständigen Überblick über alle deine Trades, erstelle Bilanzen, tracke Gewinne und Verluste, finde steuerfreie Coins und erkenne Fehler. Du lernst auch, Durchschnittspreise zu ermitteln (DCA) und deine Investments effizient zu verwalten.
Alle Trades im Überblick
Bilanzen erstellen
Gewinne und Verluste tracken
Steuerfreie Coins finden
Durchschnittspreise ermitteln (DCA)
Fehler erkennen
Teil 4: Die Steuererklärung
In diesem Abschnitt lernst du, wie du deine Steuererklärung erstellst, die verschiedenen Besteuerungsarten verstehst und Formulare für das Finanzamt exportierst. Damit bist du gut vorbereitet, um deine Krypto-Investitionen steuerlich korrekt zu behandeln.
Erstellung der Steuererklärung
Besteuerungsarten
Formulare für das Finanzamt exportieren
Mache den ersten Schritt in eine sichere und informierte Krypto-Investition.
target_audience: Alle, die mit Cryptowährung handeln (und versteuern müssen)
Alle, die ihr Portfolio im Blick behalten möchten

objectives: Income tax rules (including capital gains tax) governing the taxation between a donor, trust, and beneficiary for various trust types

courses.description:
*Please note that this course is based on South African Tax*


This training seminar will provide an in-depth overview of the taxation of trusts in South Africa, focusing on key legal and regulatory aspects.
Participants will gain an understanding of the different types of trusts, their tax obligations, and how income, capital gains, and distributions are taxed under South African law.
The seminar will also cover recent developments in trust taxation, including compliance requirements and strategies for effective tax planning. By the end of the session, attendees will be equipped with practical knowledge to navigate the complexities of trust taxation in South Africa.



Topics Discussed:

Income tax rules (including capital gains tax) governing the taxation between a donor, trust, and beneficiary for various trust types
Rules governing loans granted to trusts
Section 7C and anti-avoidance rules
Compulsory documentation required for trust tax returns
New IT3t reporting – new distribution reporting required for trusts on E-FILING


All Included:

Recording of the session
Downloadable course material
Certificate of training


About the Presenter
Galanies Vonofakidis


Galanies presently serves as the Tax Team Manager at Finsolve Accounting and Taxation Solutions in Durbanville. She is currently pursuing her B-Compt in Financial Accounting at UNISA, with a cumulative experience of three years in the accounting industry.
Galanies is proficient in bookkeeping, completion of VAT returns, generation of management reports, and payroll management. She is presently engaged in a taxation role and is enthusiastic about sharing her knowledge through upcoming webinars!

In this session, we will explore how Capital Gains Tax applies when an individual passes away, specifically focusing on the taxation of assets within the deceased estate and in the year of death for the individual taxpayer. We will cover key concepts such as the valuation of assets, the disposal of assets by the executor, and the tax implications for beneficiaries.
By the end of the seminar, you should have a clear understanding of how to navigate CGT obligations in the context of deceased estates.

Bequeathing assets to your spouse vs other heirs
Rebates and annual exclusions available in the year of death
Tax Treatment of Capital Gains in Late Estates

Si tratta di una possibilità lavorativa molto interessante e stimolante, spesso sottovalutata, che vale la pena conoscere se si è in cerca di un lavoro per cui non sono richiesti lunghi tempi formazione, né per cui è strettamente necessaria una laurea universitaria. Possiamo dire che l’operatore CAF si occupa di fornire l’assistenza fiscale a dipendenti e pensionati, dunque si tratta di un professionista che offre un servizio fiscale alle persone fisiche, andando a interfacciarsi con l’amministrazione finanziaria nel suo complesso.

courses.title: Grundlagen Steuern - Teil 2
courses.bio: Eine weiterführende Einführung in die Grundlagen der Steuer: Verstehen Sie das komplexe System der Steuern
objectives: Kennenlernen der Bücher der Finanzbuchhaltung
Erklären der Kontokorrekturbuchhaltung
Verstehen der Kontenklassen anhand von Rechnungskreis I und II
Verstehen und definieren der Handels- und Steuerbilanz – Bilanzierung

6. Handels- und Steuerbilanz: 1.6.1 Handels- und Steuerbilanz - Bilanzierung - Zum Nachlesen

requirements: Dieser Kurs ist für Beginner geeignet. Es wird empfohlen den Grundlagen Steuern - Teil 1 Kurs vorher abzuschließen..
courses.description:
Dieser Kurs bietet eine weiterführende Einführung in die Grundlagen der Steuern und eignet sich hervorragend für alle, die ihr Verständnis für das komplexe Steuersystem vertiefen möchten. In Teil 2 des Kurses werden die Bücher der Finanzbuchhaltung, die Kontokorrekturbuchhaltung, die Kontenrahmen und Kontenpläne, sowie die Grundzüge der Handels- und Steuerbilanz erklärt. Anhand von einfachen Beispielen und Übungen lernen die Teilnehmer wie Sie am besten das neue Wissen anwenden können.


Der Kurs ist sowohl für Einzelpersonen als auch kleine Unternehmen geeignet, die ihre Steuerkenntnisse verbessern möchten.


Abschnitt 1:
1. Kennenlernen der Bücher der Finanzbuchhaltung
2. Unterscheiden zwischen den Büchern: Grundbuch, Hauptbuch, Nebenbuch
3. Erklären der Kontokorrekturbuchhaltung


Abschnitt 2:
1. Wiedergeben der Definitionen von Kontenrahmen und Kontenplan
2. Verstehen der Kontenklassen anhand von Rechnungskreis I und II
3. Unterscheiden zwischen Abschlussgliederungsprinzip und Prozessgliederungsprinzip


Abschnitt 3
1. Verstehen und definieren der Handels- und Steuerbilanz – Bilanzierung
2. Beschreiben der Aufgaben des Bilanzrechts


Dieser Kurs bietet eine solide Grundlage, um endlich zu verstehen, wie das komplexe Steuersystem funktioniert. Durch das Erlernen grundlegender Buchhaltungspraktiken werden Sie in der Lage sein, Ihre Finanzen effektiver zu verwalten. Erweitern Sie Ihr Wissen über Steuern und Buchhaltung, um Ihre persönlichen oder geschäftlichen Finanzen erfolgreich zu managen.
Machen Sie sich bereit, Ihre Steuerkenntnisse auf ein neues Level zu bringen und Ihre finanzielle Zukunft zu sichern!
target_audience: Schüler die Schulfächer wie Wirtschaft haben
Studenten, die Bachelorstudiengänge wie: Wirtschaftsinformatik, Betriebswirtschaft belegen
Alle, die die Grundzüge der Buchführung und Steuern erlernen möchten

requirements: Connaissance générale en comptabilité
courses.description:
Approfondissez votre connaissance fiscale grâce à notre formation spécialement conçue pour démystifier le processus de calcul du résultat fiscal et les nuances entourant l'impôt sur les sociétés (IS) en France. Ce cours s'adresse tant aux nouveaux venus dans le domaine qu'aux professionnels expérimentés cherchant à rafraîchir et à actualiser leurs connaissances.
Au cours de cette formation, nous aborderons une série de questions centrales, toutes ancrées dans les réalités pratiques auxquelles sont confrontées les entreprises françaises au quotidien. Nous décomposerons les modalités de calcul détaillées et offrirons des éclaircissements cruciaux sur les imprimés fiscaux principaux liés à l'IS, facilitant ainsi le processus de déclaration fiscale et aidant à éviter des erreurs courantes.
Pour garantir que vous avez accès aux ressources les plus pertinentes et à jour, nous avons pris soin de sélectionner une documentation adéquate et fiable depuis le site de la DGFP, où la documentation fiscale BOI est librement accessible. Cela vous assure un apprentissage aligné sur les directives actuelles et pertinentes en vigueur.
Veuillez noter que, bien que centrée sur les aspects pratiques de la fiscalité directe, cette formation n'abordera pas le régime de l'intégration fiscale (pour les groupes fiscaux). Cependant, vous obtiendrez une compréhension solide et fondamentale des concepts essentiels à la maîtrise de l'IS.
Cette formation ne se limite pas à l'apprentissage théorique, elle vise également à faciliter une application pratique efficace à travers des exemples de cas réels et des simulations pour une expérience d'apprentissage immersive.
En choisissant notre formation, vous mettez toutes les chances de votre côté pour naviguer avec confiance dans le paysage complexe de l'impôt sur les sociétés en France. Rejoignez-nous pour un voyage éducatif enrichissant.
Bonne formation !
target_audience: Etudiants, Auditeurs, Financiers, chefs ou cadres d'entreprises

courses.title: Automatización formato 2516 anexo formulario 110 ::: Dian
courses.bio: Automatización de anexos de estados financieros, impuesto diferido, activos fijos ingresos y facturación entre otros.
objectives: Formulación de hojas contables y fiscales: Aprender a estructurar y diligenciar las hojas H2 ESF y H3 ERI, utilizando el anexo de cifras contables y fiscales.
Diligenciamiento de información clave: Dominar el registro de datos en las hojas de impuesto diferido, activos fijos, ingresos y facturación.
Validación y conciliación contable-fiscal: Aplicar métodos de verificación para comprobar que la información contable ingresada en la conciliación fiscal.
Corrección de errores en el prevalidador: Identificar y solucionar las diferencias y errores más comunes que pueden presentarse al generar el formato XML .
En este curso aprenderás a formular los anexos necesarios, para elaborar la conciliacion fiscal.

Introducción: Estado de situación financiera Hoja H2 - ESF
Estado de resultado integral Hoja H3 - ERI
Ingresos y facturación, formulario 110 estados financieros y otros

requirements: Para aprovechar al máximo el curso, se recomienda tener conocimientos básicos en contabilidad, normatividad fiscal y manejo de Excel, especialmente en el uso de fórmulas en excel. Aunque está dirigido principalmente a estudiantes y profesionales del área financiera, cualquier persona interesada en la conciliación fiscal puede participar, siempre que tenga nociones sobre estados financieros, declaración de renta y disposición para aprender.
La capacitación del personal asegura la adopción exitosa de la nueva herramienta y evita resistencias al cambio.
courses.description:
En este curso aprenderás a formular las hojas H2 ESF y H3 ERI a partir del anexo que contiene las cifras contables equivalentes a los estados financieros de la entidad, así como las cifras fiscales correspondientes a la información reportada en cada renglón de la declaración de renta.
También aprenderás a diligenciar las hojas de impuesto diferido, activos fijos, ingresos y facturación. Además, se incluyen dos anexos para validar que la información contable registrada en la conciliación fiscal coincida con los rubros de los estados financieros de la entidad. En caso de presentarse diferencias, será necesario identificarlas y justificarlas.
Por último, conocerás cómo validar las principales diferencias y errores que puede generar el prevalidador de la conciliación fiscal al momento de generar el formato XML.


Objetivos del curso
Formulación de hojas contables y fiscales: Aprender a estructurar y diligenciar las hojas H2 ESF y H3 ERI, utilizando el anexo de cifras contables y fiscales para garantizar su correcta correspondencia con los estados financieros y la declaración de renta.
Diligenciamiento de información clave: Dominar el registro de datos en las hojas de impuesto diferido, activos fijos, ingresos y facturación, asegurando su coherencia con la conciliación fiscal de la entidad.
Validación y conciliación contable-fiscal: Aplicar métodos de verificación para comprobar que la información contable ingresada en la conciliación fiscal coincida con los estados financieros, identificando y justificando posibles diferencias.
Corrección de errores en el prevalidador: Identificar y solucionar las diferencias y errores más comunes que pueden presentarse al generar el formato XML en el prevalidador de la conciliación fiscal.
target_audience: Este curso está dirigido a aquellos profesionales que trabajen en el área de impuestos y a los que estén dispuestos a aprender nuevas habilidades como la formulación del anexo de conciliación fiscal.

courses.title: Transfer Pricing Fundamentals
courses.bio: Understand the basics of the arm's length principle and international transfer pricing rules.
objectives: Transfer Pricing
Fundamental sources
What is "multinational enterprise"
What are "intragroup transactions"
What is the "arm's length principle"
What companies are "associated enterprises"
Which transactions are controlled
Comparability and five OECD comparability factors
Why we need functional analysis
What is entity characterization
Risk analysis framework
Transfer pricing methods
Transfer pricing documentation

Module 1: Introduction to Transfer Prici: Fundamental Sources of Transfer Pricing Rules
Module 3: Functional Analysis: Why Functions, Assets and Risks (FARs) are Important?
Functional Analysis and Transfer Pricing Methods
Module 5: Transfer Pricing Compliance: Transfer Pricing Documentation: Local File, Master File, CbCR

requirements: Nothing specific - but a very basic understanding of finance/tax is helpful
courses.description:
You probably heard about multinationals' tax avoidance, tax heavens and cross-border profit-shifting. In the last decade, many multinationals were accused of tax dodging - often, using something called "transfer pricing". But is transfer pricing bad? What is it, actually?
The course gives an overview of international transfer pricing rules and principles and covers the following topics:
1) What is transfer pricing, associated enterprises and controlled transactions?
2) Why is it relevant from a tax perspective?
3) How multinationals can use transfer pricing for tax avoidance?
4) What are transfer pricing rules?
5) What is the arm's length principle and where it comes from?
6) What is comparability?
7) What is a functional analysis and why is it needed?
8) What are five OECD transfer pricing methods and when are they used?
9) What is transfer pricing documentation?
The course will be useful for every finance, accounting and tax professional who wants to understand what transfer pricing is about and where modern transfer pricing rules come from. If you need to deal with transfer pricing or intragroup transactions, review the transfer pricing documentation or policies, cooperate with consultants - this course is for you!
The course will be especially useful for someone preparing for a career in transfer pricing or international tax.
The course is not country-specific, as the principles explained in the course are universal around the world.
target_audience: Finance and business professionals interested in transfer pricing and international tax
Someone who has to deal with transfer pricing and needs a basic understanding of key transfer pricing concepts
Finance and accounting folks dealing with intragroup transactions
International tax specialists considering move to transfer pricing field

الفئات المعفاة من ضريبة الشركات في الإمارات

احتساب الدخل الخاضع للضريبة وتسهيلات الأعمال الصغيرة
النفقات القابلة للخصم وغير القابلة للخصم بموجب قانون ضريبة الشركات
المعاملات بين الأطراف المرتبطة والأشخاص المتصلين

مثال عملي على كيفية حساب ضريبة الشركات: مثال عن كيفية حساب الدخل الخاضع للضريبة من خلال تعديل صافي الربح المحاسبي
مثال عملي بسيط عن كيفية حساب ضريبة الشركات
كيفية تقديم الإقرار الضريبي ودفع الضرائب: شرح كيفية تقديم الإقرار الضريبي من خلال منصة إمارات تاكس

requirements: لا توجد متطلبات مسبقة صارمة للالتحاق بالدورة، وهي مصممة بشكل مناسب لتناسب المبتدئين الذين يرغبون في تعلم ضريبة الشركات من الصفر، حيث يبدأ المحتوى من شرح المبادئ الأساسية وصولاً إلى التطبيق العملي، مما يجعلها فرصة ممتازة لأي شخص يريد تطوير مهاراته في هذا المجال.
courses.description:
ما ستتعلمه:
فهم شامل لقانون ضريبة الشركات في الإمارات، بما في ذلك مبادئ وأساسيات القانون والتزامات المكلفين بالضريبة.
القدرة على حساب ضريبة الشركات بدقة باستخدام أمثلة واقعية توضح كيفية تطبيق النسب والمعايير المختلفة.
اكتساب المهارات اللازمة لتقديم الإقرار الضريبي الإلكتروني عبر منصة إمارات تاكس بطريقة صحيحة وفعّالة.
تطوير الوعي بالمتطلبات الرقابية والالتزامات القانونية المتعلقة بضريبة الشركات، مما يعزز الامتثال ويقلل من المخاطر القانونية.
هل توجد أي متطلبات للدورة أو أي متطلبات أساسية؟
لا توجد متطلبات مسبقة صارمة للالتحاق بالدورة، وهي مصممة بشكل مناسب لتناسب المبتدئين الذين يرغبون في تعلم ضريبة الشركات من الصفر، حيث يبدأ المحتوى من شرح المبادئ الأساسية وصولاً إلى التطبيق العملي، مما يجعلها فرصة ممتازة لأي شخص يريد تطوير مهاراته في هذا المجال.
لمَن هذا الدورة:
أصحاب الأعمال وأصحاب الشركات الصغيرة والمتوسطة الذين يريدون فهم كيفية حساب وتقديم ضريبة الشركات بشكل صحيح وفقاً للقانون الإماراتي. المحاسبون والمستشارون الماليون والراغبون في تحديث معلوماتهم ومعارفهم حول النظام الضريبي الجديد وضريبة الشركات في الإمارات. الموظفون في الإدارات المالية والضرائب في الشركات والمنشآت العاملة في الإمارات، الذين يحتاجون إلى معرفة عملية لتطبيق القانون والامتثال للمتطلبات الضريبية. الطلاب والخريجون الجدد من كليات الاقتصاد والعلوم المالية الذين يرغبون في اكتساب معرفة عملية متخصصة تتيح لهم فهم ضريبة الشركات وآليات تقديم الإقرارات الضريبية على المنصة الرسمية. المهتمون بالاستثمار أو العمل في الإمارات ويحتاجون إلى فهم البيئة الضريبية والشروط والالتزامات المتعلقة بضريبة الشركات في الدولة.
target_audience: أصحاب الأعمال وأصحاب الشركات الصغيرة والمتوسطة الذين يريدون فهم كيفية حساب وتقديم ضريبة الشركات بشكل صحيح وفقاً للقانون الإماراتي. المحاسبون والمستشارون الماليون والراغبون في تحديث معلوماتهم ومعارفهم حول النظام الضريبي الجديد وضريبة الشركات في الإمارات. الموظفون في الإدارات المالية والضرائب في الشركات والمنشآت العاملة في الإمارات، الذين يحتاجون إلى معرفة عملية لتطبيق القانون والامتثال للمتطلبات الضريبية. الطلاب والخريجون الجدد من كليات الاقتصاد والعلوم المالية الذين يرغبون في اكتساب معرفة عملية متخصصة تتيح لهم فهم ضريبة الشركات وآليات تقديم الإقرارات الضريبية على المنصة الرسمية. المهتمون بالاستثمار أو العمل في الإمارات ويحتاجون إلى فهم البيئة الضريبية والشروط والالتزامات المتعلقة بضريبة الشركات في الدولة.

courses.title: Fringe Benefits and Tax
courses.bio: Unpack some of the most common Fringe Benefits and how it should be applied when calculating tax
objectives: Right of use of a motor vehicle
Residential accommodation
Free/cheap assets
Residential accommodation
Medical expenses
Insurance policies
requirements: No prior experience needed.
Little to no experience on Tax.
Please note that this course relates to South African tax only
courses.description:
***Please note that this course relates to South African tax only***


Most employers offer their employees competitive wages and salaries in a generally major way. But in order to literally hire and actually retain the sort of the best talent, employers usually specifically include generally other perks in their contracts, kind of contrary to popular belief. While these benefits for all intents and purposes do not increase the employees bank account balance, they can generally make the compensation package actually much fairly more attractive, or so they literally thought.
This course unpacks some of the most basically common fringe benefits and how it should for all intents and purposes be applied when calculating tax, or so they generally thought.


TOPICS DISCUSSED:
Free/cheap assets
Right of use of an asset
Right of use of a motor vehicle
Meals, refreshments
Residential accommodation
Free or cheap services
Benefits in respect of loans
Benefit funds
Medical expenses
Insurance policies
Retirement funds
Payment of employees’ debt
Allowances
Transport allowance
Travel allowance
Subsistence allowance


All Included:
Video presented course
Downloadable course material
Certificate of training
Optional assessment
SAIT Accredited - 4 verifiable CPD points


About the presenter:
Ruzel van Jaarsveld
She has over 23 years financial and bookkeeping experience, working with many industries and corporate environments, with extensive knowledge and practical application of trial balance, payroll, VAT, PAYE returns, Inventory control, Management Accounts, E-filing and Procedures of Importing and Exporting.
She is a seasoned appointed facilitator with Biz Facility, and for numerous years has been presenting various national practical financial workshops to business owners and corporate financial staff.

courses.title: UAE Corporate Tax Law Masterclass
courses.bio: Everything You Need to Know About UAE Corporate Tax
objectives: Understand the key definitions and general provisions of UAE corporate tax laws and regulations.
Identify the types of entities that are exempt from corporate tax under UAE tax law, such as government entities, extractive businesses and exempt activities.
Determine the qualifying criteria for free zone persons and understand the election process for being subject to corporate tax in the UAE.
Calculate taxable income under UAE tax law, including the general rules for determining taxable income and the relief available for small businesses.
Understand the various types of exempt income under UAE tax law, including participation exemption and foreign permanent establishment exemption.
Identify the different reliefs available under UAE tax law, such as transfers within a qualifying group and business restructuring relief.
Understand the types of deductible expenditure under UAE tax law, including interest expenditure and entertainment expenditure.
Comprehend the arm's length principle and its application in transactions with related parties and connected persons.
Understand the concept of tax loss relief, including the transfer of tax losses and the limitations on carrying forward tax losses.
Understand the tax group provisions under UAE tax law, including the calculation of taxable income for a tax group.
Calculate corporate tax payable under UAE tax law, including the rules for withholding tax and foreign tax credit.
Know the procedures for tax registration, deregistration, and filing of tax returns under UAE tax law.
Understand the penalties for violating UAE tax law, including the assessment of corporate tax and penalties.
Understand the transitional rules under UAE tax law, including the application of the decree-law to tax periods.

Overview: Introduction and Overview of UAE Corporate Tax Law
Exempt Persons: Who are exempted from UAE Corporate Tax - An Overview
Taxable Person and Corporate Tax Base: Basis of Taxation for Resident and Non-Resident Taxable Persons
Permanent Establishment & How it can trigger the CT for Non-residents
Free Zone Persons and Their Taxation: Qualify Free Zone Person & It's Taxation
Free Zone Taxation - Updated With Cabinet Decisions

requirements: This course is designed for anyone who is interested in understanding the complex landscape of corporate tax in the UAE, regardless of their prior knowledge or experience. No prior tax knowledge or experience is required, as this course covers the fundamentals of UAE corporate tax laws and regulations, with a focus on practical applications and examples to help learners effectively navigate the requirements and complexities of corporate tax in the UAE. Whether you are a business owner, entrepreneur, manager, accountant, or anyone else interested in understanding corporate tax in the UAE, this course is designed to provide a solid foundation of knowledge and skills to help you stay compliant with UAE tax laws, optimize your tax position, and achieve financial success for your business.
No previous tax law knowledge is required.
courses.description:
Welcome to the UAE Corporate Tax Law Masterclass! In this course, you will learn everything you need to know about corporate taxation in the United Arab Emirates. As an expert in the field, I will guide you through the complexities of UAE corporate tax law and provide you with practical tips and strategies for tax planning and compliance.


Course Structure:
The course covers the following key areas of the UAE Corporate Tax Law:


Introduction and Overview of UAE Corporate Tax Law
Who are exempted from UAE Corporate Tax - An Overview
Taxable Person - Resident & Non-Resident
Basis of Taxation for Resident and Non-Resident Taxable Persons
Permanent Establishment & How it can trigger the CT for Non-residents
Taxation of Partnerships & Family Foundations
Tax Grouping
Qualify Free Zone Person & It's Taxation
Exempt Income and its Impact
Tax Relief
Deductible Expenses
Transactions with Related Parties
Tax Loss Provisions
Calculation of Tax Payable
Tax Return and Record-keeping


Who is this course for?


This course is designed for business owners, entrepreneurs, accountants, tax professionals, and anyone else who wants to gain a comprehensive understanding of corporate tax law in the UAE. No prior knowledge of UAE tax law is required.


Why take this course?


By the end of this course, you will have the knowledge and skills needed to confidently navigate the complex corporate tax landscape
target_audience: This course is intended for a wide range of learners, including business owners, entrepreneurs, managers, accountants, and anyone else interested in understanding corporate tax in the UAE. Whether you are just starting out in business or have years of experience, this course is designed to provide valuable insights and practical knowledge that can help you stay compliant with UAE tax laws, optimize your tax position, and achieve financial success for your business. If you are a business owner or entrepreneur, this course can help you gain a deeper understanding of the requirements and complexities of corporate tax in the UAE, and provide you with practical strategies for managing your tax liabilities and maximizing your profits. If you are a manager or accountant, this course can help you develop the skills and knowledge needed to effectively advise your clients or organization on corporate tax matters. Overall, this course is ideal for anyone who is interested in gaining a comprehensive understanding of UAE corporate tax laws and regulations, and learning how to navigate the landscape of corporate tax in the UAE with confidence and ease. Whether you are a novice or an experienced professional, this course provides valuable insights and practical knowledge that can help you achieve your goals and succeed in the highly competitive business environment of the UAE.
Anyone who wants to understand the UAE Corporate Tax.

courses.bio: Se prepare e transforme a entrega do IRPF 2025 em fonte de renda.
objectives: Conhecer os passos e detalhes para entrega do Imposto de Renda 2025
Declarar imposto de renda de produtos digitais (influencers, uber, ifood, etc)
Transformar o Imposto de Renda 2025 como uma fonte de segunda renda
Encontrar oportunidades para reduzir o montante de IR a recolher de forma correta
requirements: Não é necessário ser formado em contabilidade ou tributos. Como o curso irá apoiar do básico ao avançado nos conhecimentos de imposto de renda, qualquer um interessado no assunto e que quer se aprofundar para ter uma fonte de segunda renda ou simplesmente entregar sua própria declaração poderá acompanhar esse curso
courses.description:
A declaração do Imposto de Renda de 2025 está chegando! E além dos desafios já existentes estamos vivendo novas relações econômicas e novas fontes de renda, que fazem com que o profissional que irá entregar a declaração esteja preparado e, com isso, consiga atender às novas demandas de seus clientes - Esse é um dos públicos desse curso. Além disso, também quero ajudar com uma didática simples mas com conteúdos completos pessoas que querem se aprofundar no Imposto de Renda e entregar suas próprias declarações, se livrando de riscos de cair na malha fina!


Dividi esse curso em 3 módulos: o primeiro, introdutório, apresento o curso e dou algumas dicas em como aproveitar da melhor forma o conteúdo. No segundo módulo, vamos de fato para a prática - vamos explorar os detalhes que influenciam a entrega do imposto de renda, inclusive considerando novas relações de trabalho e renda e como elas devem ser declaradas no IRPF. No terceiro módulo, foco em ajudar quem vai utilizar a entrega do imposto de renda como fonte de segunda renda, abordando tópicos como contrato, formação de preço e captação de clientes.


Com minha uma década de experiência na área e mais de 5 anos ministrando cursos tributários, espero ser um amigo nessa jornada de entrega do IRPF 2025. Conte comigo!

courses.description:
Self-Employment Tax Mastery: A Complete Guide for Entrepreneurs
Are you self-employed and unsure how to handle your taxes? My Self-Employment Tax Mastery course is designed to help freelancers, small business owners, and independent contractors understand the tax system and avoid costly mistakes. Whether you're just starting out or looking to optimize your tax strategy, this PowerPoint course provides clear, practical guidance to help you stay compliant and maximize your deductions.
What You’ll Learn:
Understanding Self-Employment Taxes – Learn what self-employment tax is, how it differs from traditional employment taxes, and why it’s important to plan ahead.
How to Calculate & Pay Estimated Taxes – Discover how to estimate and pay your quarterly taxes to avoid penalties and unexpected tax bills.
Maximizing Deductions & Write-Offs – Learn which expenses you can legally deduct, including home office costs, business supplies, travel, and vehicle expenses, so you can reduce your taxable income.
Keeping Accurate Records & Bookkeeping Tips – Master the essentials of tracking income, organizing receipts, and using bookkeeping software to simplify tax time.
Filing Your Taxes as a Self-Employed Individual – Get step-by-step guidance on filling out Schedule C and other IRS forms correctly to ensure compliance and avoid audits.
Tax Strategies for Long-Term Financial Success – Learn how to plan for tax season year-round, take advantage of retirement savings options, and set yourself up for financial security as a self-employed professional.
Who Should Take This Course?
Freelancers, contractors, and gig workers looking to simplify their taxes
Small business owners and entrepreneurs who want to maximize deductions
Anyone considering self-employment who needs a solid tax strategy from day one
Taxes don’t have to be overwhelming! With this course, you’ll gain confidence, clarity, and the tools to manage your taxes effectively and keep more of your hard-earned money.
Take control of your taxes today and build a financially secure future!

courses.title: Basics of GST and Input Tax adjustment in GST
courses.bio: Intra and Inter State Supply, Goods subject to GST , IGST, CGST and SGST adjustment in GST with examples
objectives: input tax adjustment in GST

Rates of GST and person who liable to pay GST Tax
adjustment of Input cgst, sgst and igst against of output cgst, sgst,and igst

requirements: must know about GST on sale and purchase of goods
courses.description:
this course cover details discussion of adjustment of input CGST, SGST and IGST against of Output CGST, SGST and IGST
As per old rules, following was the priority of set-off of ITC was as below:
For CGST Output – First set off thru ITC of CGST, then IGST
For SGST Output – First set off thru ITC of SGST, then IGST
For IGST Output – First set off thru ITC of IGST, then CGST & then SGST
As per CGST (Amendment) Act 2018, the priority of set-off of ITC is as below:
For CGST Output- First set off thru ITC of IGST, then CGST
For SGST Output – First set off thru ITC of IGST, then SGST
For IGST Output – First set off thru ITC of IGST, then CGST & then SGST
Following new sections have been inserted thru CGST (Amendment) Act 2018:
As per Section 49A
Notwithstanding anything contained in section 49, the input tax credit on account of central tax, State tax or Union territory tax shall be utilised towards payment of integrated tax, central tax, State tax or Union territory tax, as the case may be, only after the input tax credit available on account of integrated tax has first been utilised fully towards such payment.


As per Section 49B,
Notwithstanding anything contained in this Chapter and subject to the provisions of clause (e) and clause (f) of sub-section (5) of section 49, the Government may, on the recommendations of the Council, prescribe the order and manner of utilization of the input tax credit on account of integrated tax, central tax, State tax or Union territory tax, as the case may be, towards payment of any such tax.

courses.description:
Sistem inti administrasi perpajakan yang baru telah diluncurkan secara resmi oleh Presiden Prabowo Subianto pada 31 Desember 2024. Sistem yang diberi nama Coretax DJP melayani seluruh administrasi perpajakan mulai dari registrasi, penyampaian SPT, pembayaran, dan layanan sejak masa Januari 2025 dan seterusnya.
Untuk mengakses layanan perpajakan pada Coretax DJP, wajib pajak dapat melakukan langkah-langkah sebagai berikut:
1. Bagi WP dengan Akun DJP Online
Wajib pajak yang telah terdaftar pada layanan elektronik DJP (DJPOnline) dapat langsung menggunakan Coretax dengan cara melakukan set ulang kata sandi melalui menu Lupa Kata Sandi.
2. Bagi WP tanpa Akun DJP Online
Bagi wajib pajak yang sudah memiliki NPWP tetapi belum pernah menggunakan layanan DJP Online tetap dapat mengakses Coretax DJP dengan cara mengajukan permintaan aktivasi melalui menu Aktivasi Akun Wajib Pajak.
3. Bagi WP Baru
Bagi mereka yang belum memiliki NPWP dan bermaksud mendaftarkan diri sebagai wajib pajak, maka dapat menggunakan Coretax untuk melakukan pendaftaran NPWP. Registrasi dapat dengan mudah dilakukan yaitu melalui menu Daftar di Sini.
Coretax merupakan sistem administrasi layanan Direktorat Jenderal Pajak yang memberikan kemudahan bagi pengguna. Pembangunan Coretax merupakan bagian dari Proyek Pembaruan Sistem Inti Administrasi Perpajakan (PSIAP) yang diatur dalam Peraturan Presiden Nomor 40 Tahun 2018. Pembaruan Sistem Inti Administrasi Perpajakan (PSIAP) merupakan proyek rancang ulang proses bisnis administrasi perpajakan melalui pembangunan sistem informasi yang berbasis COTS (Commercial Off-the-Shelf) disertai dengan pembenahan basis data perpajakan.
Tujuan utama dari pembangunan Coretax adalah untuk memodernisasi sistem administrasi perpajakan yang ada saat ini. Coretax mengintegrasikan seluruh proses bisnis inti administrasi perpajakan, mulai dari pendaftaran wajib pajak, pelaporan SPT, pembayaran pajak, hingga pemeriksaan dan penagihan pajak.
Yang akan kita bahas disini adalah :
1. PENGISIAN LAMPIRAN 1A PADA HARTA DI AKHIR TAHUN PAJAK,
2. PENGISIAN LAMPIRAN 1B PADA UTANG DI AKHIR TAHUN PAJAK,
3. PENGISIAN LAMPIRAN 1C PADA DAFTAR TANGGUNGAN,
4. CARA PENGISIAN LAMPIRAN 1C PADA DAFTAR TANGGUNGAN,
5. PENGISIAN LAMPIRAN 1D PADA PENGHASILAN NETO DARI PEKERJAAN,
6. PENGISIAN LAMPIRAN 1E PADA BUKTI PEMOTONGAN.

Description: Our Comprehensive GST Course is designed to equip B. Com, M. Com, BBA, BAF, and MBA students with the essential skills needed to excel in the domain of Goods and Services Tax (GST). In this course, students will delve into the intricacies of GST calculations, learn the nuances of filing GSTR-1 and GSTR-3B returns, master the art of reconciling GSTR-2B with books of accounts, and understand the process of paying GST challans.
Throughout the course, students will receive comprehensive instruction and hands-on training on various aspects of GST compliance. They will gain practical insights into determining GST liability, identifying input tax credits, and navigating the complexities of GST regulations.

By the end of this course, students will emerge as proficient GST professionals, equipped with the knowledge and skills to handle GST-related tasks with confidence and accuracy. Whether aspiring to pursue a career in taxation or seeking to enhance their existing skill set, this course offers a valuable opportunity for students to upskill and stay ahead in today's competitive business landscape.

requirements: Basic Understanding of the Indian Tax System
courses.description:
Do you find it difficult to understand the Income Tax laws?
Or are you struggling with filing your own income tax return?
Many a time we hear people saying that they don’t understand tax, they are not aware of when tax is to be deducted (TDS), they find it difficult to apply for their own PAN number or they find it difficult to file their return of income.
So friends, to simplify all your problems and give you an excellent clarity of all concepts and sections, we have made this course on “Income Tax” presented by Direct and Corporate Tax expert CA Natasha Shah.
Income tax is a direct tax levied by the government on income generated by businesses and individuals. At present this law is governed by the Income Tax Act, 1961 which came into force from 1st April 1962 and there are various Income Tax Rules, Notifications, Circulars that are also to be followed.
Income tax is a tax charged on the annual income earned by an individual. The amount of tax paid will depend on how much money you earn as income over a financial year. One can proceed with Income tax payment, TDS/TCS payment, and Non-TDS/TCS payments online. All taxpayers must fill in the relevant details to make these payments. The entire process becomes simple and quick.
Income tax for FY 2020-21 applies to all residents whose annual income exceeds Rs.2.5 lakh p.a. The highest amount of tax an individual could pay is 30% of their income plus cess at 4% if their income is more than Rs.10 lakh p.a


Benefits of taking this course
Get a comprehensive understanding of Income Tax Preparation.
File your own return of income or assist your tax consultant in filing the return of income of your businesses.
You will be able to apply for a PAN number or make corrections/changes in PAN.
Avoid late payment fees and interest on default by gaining knowledge of various due dates, advance tax, and TDS provisions.
Strengthen your resume with Income Tax knowledge.
Increase the job opportunities for newly passed out graduates and also for all others with knowledge of Direct tax.
On completion of this course, you will get a good understanding of the theoretical as well as the practical angle of Income Tax.
So, hurry up and enroll now!!
target_audience: Any individual from Commerce / Non-Commerce background
Basically, anyone who want to have knowledge of Income Tax and its practical aspects.

courses.bio: 「節税のための法人化」には落とし穴がたくさんあります。後悔をせずに会社設立をするには事前準備と、法人化した後のフォローが大切です。

requirements: 特別な知識は必要ありません。
courses.description:
法人を設立する目的は人それぞれです。ただ、設立の手続きをしたからといって、目的が実現するわけではありません。
とくに節税を目的とした法人化は、慎重に考える必要があります。個人事業とは税金や社会保険のしくみが大きく変わるからです。そこにはメリットとともに、デメリットも存在します。
講師である私は、東京国税局を退職後、1年間の個人事業を経て、法人化をしました。専門家の力は借りず、すべて自分だけで手続きをしました。
今回のコースでは、国税職員時代に培った知識と、その後に自ら体験して学んだノウハウを公開します。




【注意事項】
・本コースは、とくに説明がない限り、2021年11月時点の税法等に基づいています。ご視聴をいただく時点で変更がある可能性がありますので、ご注意ください。


・本コースのデータや数値等はわかりやすさを重視し、一部簡略化を行っています。


・Q&Aにていただいたご意見は、今後のコース作成の参考とさせていただきますが、税理士法の規定により個別の回答をすることはできませんので、ご了承ください。
target_audience: これから会社設立を考えている人
フリーランスや個人事業主から法人化をする人

courses.title: 租税法修士論文の基本問題
courses.bio: 法人税法第22条第２項の無償取引

租税法修士論文の基本問題－法人税法第22条第２項の無償譲渡－: 法人税法第22条第１項及び第２項の規定の確認

requirements: 租税法に興味があること
courses.description:
法人税法第22条第２項は租税法、法人税法の根幹的規定です。このコースでは法人税法上の無償による資産の譲渡を取り上げます。
租税法、法人税法に興味のある一般の方々はもちろんですが、特に、１）企業の経理担当者、２）税理士、３）弁護士、公認会計士、４）会計・租税法の研究者、５）特に租税法修士論文の作成を志す大学生、大学院生にこのコースを観てほしいと思います。
１）企業の経理担当者の方々であれば、このコースを受けることにより、会計と税務の考え方の違いの基礎が確実に身に付きます。
２）税理士の方々であれば、このコースを受ければ、税務調査で問題になりやすい低額譲渡の正しい考え方、仕訳の認識の仕方が分かります。租税法、法人税法の根幹的規定である法人税法第22条第２項をしっかりと再確認してください。
３）弁護士、公認会計士の方々であれば、このコースにより、会計と税務の相違、法人税法の根幹的規定に係る基礎知識をしっかりと確認してください。
４）会計・租税法の研究者であれは、とりわけ、修士論文の作成指導をしている研究者の方々であれば、このビデオにより法人税法第22条第２項の正しい考え方を確認してください。そうすれば、修士論文を作成している学生が何処でつまずいているのか、なぜ、つまずいたまま同じところをグルグル回り続けているかが理解できるでしょう。しっかりと、法人税法第22条第２項に係る基礎的な考え方を再確認すると同時に、学生を教えるための教材として活用してください。
５）このコースは、とりわけ、租税法修士論文の執筆を志す大学生、大学院生、租税法修士論文を執筆中の大学院生に観て欲しいと思います。いうまでもありませんが、法人税法第22条第２項は法人税法の根幹をなす規定です。しっかりと頭に入れましょう。ピンとこない方々は設例の数値を変えて、何度でも仕訳を確認してください。特に無償取引をテーマに選択した方々は、何度でもこのビデオを見ていただきたいと思います。
定額譲渡（通常の取引）
＜内国法人Aの仕訳＞
（借方）現金 １００（貸方）土地 ５０
土地譲渡益 ５０
＜内国法人Bの仕訳＞
（借方）土地 １００（貸方）現金 １００
取得価額５０ 時価１００＝取引価額100、定額取引（通常の取引）の仕訳は上記のようになります。
取引価額６０、零、１２０の場合はどうなるでしょうか。低額取引、無償取引及び高額取引をそれぞれ見て行きましょう。
target_audience: 租税法、法人税法に興味のある一般の方々はもちろんですが、特に、１）企業の経理担当者、２）税理士、３）弁護士、公認会計士、４）会計・租税法の研究者、５）特に租税法修士論文の作成を志す大学生、大学院生にこのコースを観てほしいと思います。
５）租税法修士論文の作成を志す大学生・大学院生、租税法修士論文を執筆中の大学院生

courses.title: Fiscalité appliquée dans la zone d'accélération industrielle
courses.bio: Maîtriser la fiscalité des zones d'accélération industrielle et optimiser les avantages fiscaux

Introduction: À savoir avant de suivre ce cours
Partie 01 : Fondements des zones d'accél: Introduction et le cadre légal des zones d'accélération industrielle
Avantages accordés aux zones d'accélération industrielle
Partie 03 : Interrogations Fiscales et P: Questions posées à l'Administration fiscale à propos des zones franches d’export
Focus sur les nouveautés de la loi de finances 2024
Partie 04 : Etudes de cas: Cas 04 : Accord préalable en matière de prix de transfert

requirements: Aucun prérequis
courses.description:
Ce cours a pour but de fournir aux participants une compréhension approfondie de la fiscalité appliquée dans les zones d'accélération industrielle. Les entreprises opérant dans ces zones bénéficient de divers avantages fiscaux et incitations, ce qui en fait un sujet d'intérêt crucial pour les professionnels de la finance et les fiscalistes.
Le public cible de ce cours comprend les professionnels de la finance, les responsables fiscaux d'entreprises opérant dans les zones franches, les cadres fiscalistes, les consultants en fiscalité, ainsi que toute personne impliquée dans les opérations fiscales des entreprises dans les zones d'accélération industrielle. Les participants apprendront à maîtriser les incitations fiscales offertes, à comprendre et à analyser les questions fiscales spécifiques aux zones franches, et à appliquer les dispositions fiscales pertinentes pour optimiser les avantages fiscaux.
Le cours couvre plusieurs aspects essentiels de la fiscalité dans les zones d'accélération industrielle, y compris le cadre légal, les avantages fiscaux, et les stratégies d'optimisation fiscale. Les participants acquerront des compétences pratiques pour naviguer dans le paysage fiscal complexe des  zones d'accélération industrielle et pour maximiser les avantages pour leurs entreprises ou clients.
Grâce à une combinaison de théorie et de cas pratiques, ce cours vise à doter les participants des connaissances nécessaires pour non seulement comprendre les régulations fiscales en vigueur dans les  zones d'accélération industrielle, mais aussi pour les appliquer de manière stratégique.

Que vous soyez un professionnel de la finance cherchant à approfondir vos connaissances ou un fiscaliste souhaitant optimiser les opérations fiscales de vos clients, ce cours vous fournira les outils et les compétences nécessaires pour exceller dans ce domaine spécialisé.
target_audience: Responsables d'entreprise opérant dans les zones d'accélération industrielle

About the Course
Welcome to our course "Tax Planning for Professionals"! This course has been designed exclusively for Professionals who want to learn about the various aspects of tax planning and how to make the most of it.
In this course, you will learn about the different heads of income, including salary, business, profession, and capital gains, and how to compute income tax from them. You will also learn about setting off losses, clubbing provisions, and other important concepts related to tax planning.

Why this course?
Tax planning is an essential part of financial management for professionals, and this course will provide you with the knowledge and skills needed to manage your taxes efficiently. By taking this course, you will be able to make informed decisions about your financial future, maximize your tax savings, and ensure compliance with the latest tax regulations.
The course is taught by expert instructors who have years of experience in tax planning and related fields. The course materials are designed to be easily understandable, and you can learn at your own pace through a mix of video lectures, interactive quizzes, and assignments.
So, if you are a professional looking to improve your tax planning skills, then this course is for you. Enroll today and start your journey towards financial success!

Who should take this course?
This course is exclusively made for Professionals, Freelancers and Consultants

courses.description:
Home sale tax consequences including discussion of eligibility of exclusions, calculating the gain or loss on a sale, & entering the data into tax forms.
We will include reference material and PDF files that can be downloaded and used without an internet connection. The course will also include Excel worksheets to help with gain and loss calculations and provide examples
The material will discuss the calculation of gain or loss on the sale of a home. We will give an example of a closing statement and how to pull information from it to calculate the gain or loss on a sale. Excel worksheets and example calculations will be provided. We will use the example problem as a reference point when we move forward in the course, zooming into parts of the calculation when applicable.
We will enter the information for the sale of the home into actual tax forms so we can see the effect on schedule D (Capital Gains and Losses) but also the effect on the rest of the tax return including the Form 1040.
The course will discuss the basis calculation including different scenarios that can complicate the calculation like the home being destroyed, condemned, received in a divorce, received as a gift, or inherited.
