courses.title: Master Indian Income Tax Preparation: Basics of Income Tax
courses.bio: Master Income Tax India: Tax Framework, Taxes Computation, Taxation Strategies & Tax Planning for Income Tax Preparation
objectives: Gain tax law insights: Understand tax frameworks, types, Income Tax Act, and Finance Act. Apply knowledge to practical scenarios
Master income tax concepts: Comprehend definitions, total income computation, tax rates, and implications for different entities
Calculate taxes accurately: Learn to compute income tax liability, consider alternate slabs, surcharges, rebates, and rounding off
Problem-solving & analysis: Apply knowledge to solve practical tax problems, analyze case studies, and navigate tax planning and judicial decisions

Computation of Tax: Tax Rate of Cooperative Society, Firm, and LLP
Additional Aspects of Income Tax: Maximum Marginal Rate, Tax Planning, Avoidance & Evasion

requirements: No experience needed. You will learn everything you need to know
For taking this you'll need Calculator, Pen, Notebook & Internet Connection
courses.description:
Welcome to our comprehensive course on Master the Basics of Income Tax India. This course is designed to provide you with a thorough understanding of income tax regulations and equip you with the necessary skills to navigate the complexities of taxes and taxation systems effectively.
Starting with an introductory message from the educator, we will explore the framework of tax laws, including an in-depth analysis of different types of taxes and their implications. You will gain insights into the Income Tax Act, rules, notifications, and the recent updates brought about by the Finance Act.
Understanding the significance of circulars and judicial decisions is crucial, and we will delve into their impact on Income Tax matters. We will also address the constitutional validity of income tax, shedding light on its legal foundations.
To grasp the practical aspects, we will discuss the concepts of previous year and assessment year, clarifying their distinctions. Furthermore, we will examine the definition of a person in the context of income tax and explore the roles of an assessee, deemed assessee, and the geographical scope of taxation within India.
Analyzing income for income tax purposes is essential, and we will cover the key considerations and relevant provisions. Additionally, we will focus on the unique aspects of taxation concerning Hindu Undivided Families.
Computation of total income will be thoroughly explained, including the tax rate slab for the Assessment Year 2024-25. We will also delve into the alternative tax slab provided under Section 115BAC, as well as specific tax rates applicable to cooperative societies, firms, LLPs, and domestic companies. The alternate tax provisions of Company 115BAA and 115BAB will also be covered.
Understanding surcharges, rebates, and rounding off calculations is crucial, and we will provide detailed insights into these elements. Through tax calculation illustrations, you will gain practical knowledge and learn how to apply the principles effectively.
We will explore marginal relief, income taxable in the current previous year, and address topics such as cash credit, unexplained money, investments, expenditures, and the concept of Hundi. Distinguishing between various elements will be highlighted, and you will gain a deeper understanding of maximum marginal rates, tax planning, avoidance, and evasion.
To reinforce your learning, we have included multiple-choice questions (MCQs) to test your knowledge and practical problems to enhance your problem-solving skills. This course will equip you with the expertise to navigate income tax laws confidently.
Whether you are a professional, entrepreneur, or a curious learner, this course offers valuable insights into income tax laws and computation. Join us now and embark on this educational journey to enhance your understanding and proficiency in income tax matters. This course is perfect for your Income Tax Preparation.
target_audience: Individuals seeking a comprehensive understanding of tax laws and income tax computation
Professionals working in finance, accounting, or tax-related roles. Business owners and entrepreneurs who need to navigate income tax obligations
Students or learners interested in gaining knowledge about income tax laws and their practical application
Anyone who wants to enhance their understanding of income tax and its implications for individuals and entities

courses.title: Steuern Masterkurs: Teil 1 - Grundlagen der Steuern
courses.bio: Lerne die Grundlagen des deutschen Steuer(rechts) kennen
objectives: Die Teilnehmer werden die Grundlagen des deutschen Steuerrechts kennenlernen.
Dein Vermögen zu maximieren
Dein Einkommen zu maximieren
Den höchsten Ausgabenposten Steuer kennenlernen
Die Einkommensteuer genau verstehen
Du lernst genau, wie du deine Steuerlast senken kannst

Die Grundlagen: Was sind Steuern? Wer darf sie erheben?
Die Einkommensteuer: Abgrenzung Einkünfte aus selbstständiger Arbeit und Gewerbebetrieb

requirements: Es gibt keine spezifischen Voraussetzungen für diesen Kurs.
courses.description:
Das erwartet Sie: nie wieder Bammel vor der Steuererklärung!

Würdest du gerne die Grundlagen des deutschen Steuerrechts verstehen? Oder möchtest du dich weiter vom Finanzamt gängeln lassen, ohne zu wissen, welche Kosten du beispielsweise als Werbungskosten absetzen kannst? Dann ist dieser Kurs genau das richtige für dich.
Was ist denn der größte Ausgaben-Posten für die meisten Menschen? Ist es die Miete? Nein... Ist es das Auto? Nein... Es sind die Steuern! Wir sollten Steuern verstehen, um unser Einkommen und unser Vermögen zu maximieren.
In diesem Kurs zeige ich dir Schritt für Schritt die wesentlichen Grundlagen des deutschen Steuerrechts und der verschiedenen Steuerarten. Du lernst im ersten Teil des Steuerrechts Masterkurses die Grundlagen des deutschen Steuerrechts, die Unterschiede zwischen Steuern, Beiträgen und Gebühren sowie die Einkommensteuer und vieles mehr kennen.
Was genau wirst du im Detail hier in diesem Kurs lernen?
1. Die Grundlagen des deutschen Steuerrechtes - Weißt du eigentlich genau, warum Steuer erhoben werden? Hier lernst du genau kennen, was die Unterschiede zwischen Steuern, Gebühren und Beiträge sind und worauf es hier genau ankommt. Des Weiteren wirst du hier die Fachbegriffe wie Steuerschuldner, Steuerpflichtiger, Steuergläubiger usw. kennenlernen. Dieses Kapitel wird dir die Grundlagen beibringen.


2. Die Abgabenordnung - Die Abgabenordnung ist das Grundgesetz des Steuerrechtes. Hier werden viele verschiedene Fristen aufgezeigt und erklärt. Du lernst hier beispielsweise kennen, was genau ein Ermittlungs- oder Festsetzungsverfahren ist. Diese Verfahren und auch noch weitere sind essentiell um zu verstehen, wie ein Steuerbescheid oder ein sonstiger Verwaltungsakt entsteht.


3. Die Einkommensteuer - Der Teil 1 des Steuerrecht Masterkurses befasst sich auch mit der ersten Steuerart, die uns im Alltagsleben als Arbeitnehmer betrifft - Die Einkommensteuer -. Hier wirst du lernen, was die sogenannten 7 Einkunftsarten sind und was diese 7 Einkunftsarten ausmacht. Du lernst die Unterschiede zwischen Gewinneinkünften und Überschusseinkünften kennen, sodass du diese auseinander halten kannst. Auch deine möglichen steuerlichen Verluste bleiben in diesem Kapitel nicht außer Acht.


Nachdem du diesen Kurs abgeschlossen hast, wirst du in meinem 2. Teil des Steuerrecht Masterkurses folgende Steuerarten kennenlernen:
1. Die Umsatzsteuer
2. Die Gewerbesteuer
3. Die Körperschaftssteuer
4. Die Kapitalertragssteuer


Im 2. Teil des Steuerrecht Masterkurses wirst du die komplette Erbschaftssteuer kennenlernen, die als komplexeste Steuerart gilt.


PS: Dieser Kurs beinhaltet keine individuelle Steuerberatung. Ein individuelle Steuerberatung kann nur ein Steuerberater mit einem abgeschlossen Examen durchführen. Hier lernen Sie nur, wie etwas funktioniert, sodass Sie eigene Schlüsse aus dem Kurs ziehen müssen. Steuerberatung ist eine individuelle Leistung, sodass nur ein Steuerberater Ihnen genau Auskunft in Ihren speziellen Fall geben kann. Bitte prüfen Sie den Inhalt auf Aktualität und Richtigkeit. Ich übernehme keine Haftung für etwaige Fehler, die jeden mal passieren können. Dieser Kurs dient nur der Wissensübermittlung.
target_audience: Meine Zielgruppe sind Menschen, die sich gerne mit dem Thema des Steuerrechts weiterentwickeln möchten.

courses.description:
Learn how to quickly and easily complete your personal tax returns online in a short period of time. Get the biggest refund ever by doing your Federal Tax Returns on your own with the knowledge you will gain in this course. Save yourself time and money by doing it yourself. Most software you use will have an audit review built in which will save you from having hassles with the IRS.
This course will go over many essential points that will help you to be successful once you finish the course. These are just a few of the points and topics that will be covered:
You will learn how to get the maximum refund.
Increase the amount of expenses you can deduct.
Get the most deductions in order to lower your tax burden.
You will save on tax preparation expenses.
Identify what are the best tax preparation websites to prepare your tax returns on.
Reduce your probability of having common errors by more than 20% by going from physical to online tax returns.
How to complete tax form 1040EZ (U.S. Federal income tax return)
How to complete tax form 1040X (Tax amendment form) in case you need to make corrections or if a tax document arrived late in the mail and you didn't include those numbers in your tax return.
Add dependents to increase your refund.
Add more expenses to lower your tax payments.
Contribute to an IRA to reduce the amount of taxes you pay.
E-file safely and securely
How incorporating can greatly reduce your tax burden by allowing you to deduct more expenses.
In this course, you will also learn industry secrets to increase your refund by doing additional things such as:
Make any purchases before December 31st for things you will need the following year if you are self employed and want to deduct these expenses.
Include any tax credits for energy savings.
Make your January mortgage payment in December so you can increase your mortgage interest payments and which will increase your mortgage interest deduction.
If you work from home, add any expenses you have before December 31st, when preparing this space for work purposes such as furniture, tile, paint, etc.
In the first section of this course you will learn what it means to E-file as well as understanding what tax deadlines are and why you should file your tax returns online instead of through the mail.
The second and third sections of this course will go over many hugely important topics. You will learn what tax forms are needed and how to complete them. You will also, learn how to go over every step of the process by watching a live example of tax returns being completed so that you are prepared to do them yourself when it's time.
Your instructor
Joe Correa is the founder and CEO of several businesses and has successfully taught others how to successfully run a business through his courses as well as prepare tax returns. The first and most important step of the process is to find someone who has already done this many times and can teach you the process in an easy and practical way.
Please contact me if have any questions. Remember this course has a 30 day money back guarantee so their is zero risk on your part. Don't forget that you will receive your certificate of completion when you finish this course.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to learn how to do their own personal tax returns
Anyone who wants to increase their tax refund

courses.description:
¿Sabías que cada año miles de trabajadores en México dejan de recuperar dinero porque no presentan su declaración anual? Si eres asalariado y quieres aprender cómo funciona el ISR, este curso es para ti. Aquí descubrirás paso a paso cómo presentar tu declaración, cómo revisar tu información en el portal del SAT y cómo solicitar tu devolución automática o manual.
Iniciaremos explicando de manera sencilla qué es el ISR y quiénes deben declarar. Después conocerás las deducciones personales más importantes, como gastos médicos, colegiaturas, seguros o intereses hipotecarios, y cómo aprovecharlas para aumentar tu saldo a favor. También aprenderás a identificar los usos correctos de CFDI y a revisar que tus facturas sean válidas.
Te mostraré con ejemplos prácticos cómo llenar tu declaración, cómo confirmar tu cuenta CLABE y qué hacer si el SAT rechaza tu devolución. Además, también tendrás guías para responder en el Buzón Tributario y un checklist de documentos para no equivocarte.
Al terminar este curso podrás presentar tu declaración anual por ti mismo, sin miedo y con la tranquilidad de que estás cumpliendo correctamente. Más importante aún, tendrás la capacidad de recuperar el dinero que es tuyo y evitar errores que te cuesten tiempo y dinero.
target_audience: A TRABAJADORES ASALARIADOS QUE RECIBEN SU INGRESO POR SUELDOS Y SALARIOS Y DESEAN SOLICITAR SU DEVOLUCIÓN DE SALDO A FAVOR ANTE EL SAT

courses.bio: A Deep-Dive
objectives: How does the IRS determine whether a taxpayer qualifies for an offer in compromise based on doubt as to collectability, and what factors are considered in th
In what ways can the concept of "reasonable collection potential" impact a taxpayer's ability to settle their tax liabilities through an offer in compromise?
Discuss the implications of collateral agreements in relation to offers in compromise. How might these agreements affect a taxpayer's future income and relat
Analyze the circumstances under which the IRS might accept an offer in compromise for effective tax administration, even when a taxpayer has the means to pay

Evaluate the significance of the Collection Information Statement (Form 433) in the offer in compromise process. How does this form influence the IRS's asses
What role does economic hardship play in the IRS's decision-making process regarding offers in compromise, and how might it be substantiated by the taxpayer?
Discuss the importance of compliance with filing and payment requirements after the acceptance of an offer in compromise. What consequences might a taxpayer
How might the concept of public policy and equity considerations influence the IRS's acceptance of an offer in compromise?

12. In what ways can understanding the IRS's policies regarding offers in compromise empower taxpayers to better navigate their tax obligations and liabilities?
requirements: No requirements.
courses.description:
Taxpayers who have few assets and little prospect of generating sufficient income to pay a tax liability in full may be allowed to strike a settlement for less than the full amount due to settle their case. This is known as an offer in compromise. The IRS's acceptance of an offer in compromise conclusively settles the liability once and for all, absent fraud or mistake. This presentation will cover the nuances of offers in compromise highlighting the issues that arise most frequently.


An installment agreement is an option for taxpayers who cannot pay their entire tax bills by the due date. It allows taxpayers to pay the amount due over a period of time. Join me as I do a deep dive into installment agreements.


Learning objectives include the following:


How does the IRS determine whether a taxpayer qualifies for an offer in compromise based on doubt as to collectability, and what factors are considered in this evaluation?
In what ways can the concept of "reasonable collection potential" impact a taxpayer's ability to settle their tax liabilities through an offer in compromise?
Discuss the implications of collateral agreements in relation to offers in compromise. How might these agreements affect a taxpayer's future income and relationship with the IRS?
Analyze the circumstances under which the IRS might accept an offer in compromise for effective tax administration, even when a taxpayer has the means to pay their full tax liability.
What are the procedural steps a taxpayer must follow when appealing the rejection of an offer in compromise, and how might these steps affect their chances of a successful appeal?
How does the IRS's approach to offers in compromise based on doubt as to liability differ from those based on doubt as to collectability, and what are the reasons for these differences?
Evaluate the significance of the Collection Information Statement (Form 433) in the offer in compromise process. How does this form influence the IRS's assessment of a taxpayer's financial situation?
What role does economic hardship play in the IRS's decision-making process regarding offers in compromise, and how might it be substantiated by the taxpayer?
Discuss the importance of compliance with filing and payment requirements after the acceptance of an offer in compromise. What consequences might a taxpayer face if they fail to adhere to these obligations?
How might the concept of public policy and equity considerations influence the IRS's acceptance of an offer in compromise?
Reflect on the potential challenges taxpayers may face when submitting an offer in compromise. What strategies could they employ to improve their chances of acceptance?
In what ways can understanding the IRS's policies regarding offers in compromise empower taxpayers to better navigate their tax obligations and liabilities?

courses.title: Master of International Taxation (MIT)
courses.bio: Embark on a Global Tax Journey: A Foundational Exploration of International Taxation Principles and Policies
objectives: Understand foundational principles of international tax systems
Learn key concepts underpinning global tax policies
Analyze complex international tax treaties
Explore theoretical frameworks of global taxation
Develop skills to navigate cross-border tax complexities
Grasp the dynamics of transfer pricing in taxation
Examine efforts to curb global tax avoidance
Understand national and international tax policy interplay
Synthesize knowledge of international tax systems
Solidify understanding of global tax theories
Appreciate complexities in tax policy formulation
Evaluate impact of taxation on global economies
Apply theoretical insights to real-world scenarios
Cultivate critical perspectives on tax policy
Engage in global discourse on international taxation
Prepare for roles in academia policy-making or advisory
requirements: No prior knowledge of international taxation is required—just an interest in understanding how tax systems work across different countries.
A basic familiarity with economic or financial concepts can be helpful but is not necessary, as the course covers foundational principles.
Participants should have an analytical mindset and a willingness to engage with complex global tax policies and regulations.
Critical thinking and problem-solving skills will be beneficial in exploring tax treaties, transfer pricing, and international tax compliance.
Enthusiasm for learning about global economic systems and their connection to taxation will enhance the overall learning experience.
courses.description:
Embark on a transformative journey through the intricate realm of global tax systems with our comprehensive program designed to equip you with an unparalleled understanding of international taxation. This course offers a deep dive into the theoretical frameworks that underpin global tax policies, providing you with the intellectual tools necessary to navigate the complexities of taxation across borders.
Your academic voyage begins with a meticulously structured course preparation phase, where foundational knowledge is established, setting the stage for a robust learning experience. Here, you will be introduced to the essential principles and concepts that form the backbone of international tax systems. This preparatory stage ensures that you are well-versed in the key theoretical underpinnings, allowing you to engage with the material at a sophisticated level.
Once equipped with a solid foundation, you will seamlessly transition into the heart of the course, where you will explore the intricacies of navigating the multifaceted world of international taxation. This part of the program is designed to challenge your analytical skills, as you delve into the complexities of tax treaties, transfer pricing, and the global efforts to curb tax avoidance. Through a series of in-depth theoretical explorations, you will gain insights into the dynamic interplay between national tax policies and international regulations, fostering a nuanced understanding of how these elements influence global economic landscapes.
As you progress, the course offers a comprehensive summary that synthesizes the knowledge acquired, reinforcing your understanding of key concepts and theories. This integrative approach aids in solidifying your grasp of the material, ensuring that you emerge with a coherent and holistic view of international taxation. The course summary serves as a vital component, bridging the gap between theoretical knowledge and its broader implications, allowing you to appreciate the complexities of tax policy formulation on a global scale.
In conclusion, this program culminates in a reflective phase that encourages you to consider the broader impact of international taxation on global economic systems. You will be invited to evaluate the theoretical insights gained throughout the course, considering their applicability to real-world scenarios and their potential to inform policy decisions. This reflective stage is designed to empower you with a critical perspective, enhancing your ability to contribute thoughtfully to discussions and debates within the field of international taxation.
Through this intellectually rigorous course, you will cultivate a deep appreciation for the theoretical aspects of international taxation, equipping you with the knowledge to excel in academia, policy-making, or advisory roles. By engaging with a curriculum that is both comprehensive and thought-provoking, you will not only expand your intellectual horizons but also position yourself as a knowledgeable and influential participant in the global discourse on taxation. Join us in this enlightening endeavor and unlock the potential to shape the future of international tax policy.
target_audience: Graduate students seeking advanced knowledge in global tax systems
Aspiring international tax advisors aiming to enhance analytical skills
Policy makers interested in understanding global tax policy frameworks
Economists looking to explore the impact of taxation on global economies
Legal professionals specializing in tax law and cross-border regulations
Accountants focusing on international taxation and transfer pricing
Business consultants advising multinational corporations on tax strategies
Researchers conducting studies on the dynamics of international taxation

courses.bio: Unpack CGT on a more advanced level
objectives: Income tax framework
Capital gains tax structure
Capital vs. revenue
The eight schedule
Taxable capital gains and assessed losses
South African Tax
requirements: Little to basic understanding of Capital Gains Tax
Little to basic understanding of Tax
Please note that this course relates to South African tax only
courses.description:
****Please note that this course is based on South African Tax****


Capital Gains Tax is a complex matter to understand. Capital gains tax (CGT) is not a separate tax but forms part of income tax. A capital gain arises when you dispose of an asset on or after 1 October 2001 for proceeds that exceed its base cost. The relevant legislation is contained in the Eighth Schedule to the Income Tax Act 58 of 1962. Please join us for this very insightful session, whereby we are going to unpack CGT on a more advanced level.


Topics Discussed:
Income tax framework
Capital gains tax structure
Capital vs. revenue
The eight schedule
Taxable capital gains and assessed losses
Disposal and acquisition of assets
Limitation of losses
Base cost
Proceeds
Primary residence exclusion
Impact of CGT on the income tax calculation


About the presenter:
Daniel van Tonder
Daniel van Tonder is the Head of Taxation at FinSolve Accounting and Taxation – situated in Durbanville Cape Town.
He completed his B- Compt degree in Financial Accounting while still busy with his articles at Diemont, Zimmerman & Bolink Auditors in Polokwane.
After his articles he entered the private sector to gain valuable experience as a Group Finance Manager and Group Internal Tax Practitioner.
He is currently busy with his post graduate diploma in taxation through Unisa.
Daniel is a registered tax practitioner and a proud member of the South African Institute of Taxation.

courses.description:
O curso de Retenção de Tributos Federais do Zero a Profissional- Módulo ESSENCIAL abrange os níveis básico e intermediário, o que significa que o aluno terá um aprendizado mais COMPLETO.
Mesmo que o aluno não tenha experiência ou não conhece sobre o assunto, terá condições de aprender, pois a linguagem é acessível a todos os públicos. Além disso, todas as aulas possuem exemplos práticos para melhor fixação do conteúdo.
Este curso é indicado para quem deseja entender desde o básico, acerca das seguintes retenções tributárias federais: IRRF- Imposto de Renda Retido na Fonte de Pessoa Física e de Pessoa Jurídica, CSLL- Contribuição sobre o Lucro Líquido, PIS- Programa de Integração Social e COFINS - Contribuição para Financiamento da Seguridade Social, por meio de um conteúdo Essencial para o conhecimento fundamental à prática da área contábil e fiscal/tributária.
Na prática, todo profissional da área Contábil e Fiscal/Tributária percorre níveis de experiência, pois quando inicia sua careira, ele deve ter pelo menos, o nível de conhecimento Essencial, seguindo para o conhecimento prático dos estudos adquiridos, passa para o nível Intermediário, até chegar ao nível Avançado.
O que você vai aprender neste curso?
Noções básicas de tributos e suas espécies, competência tributária, responsabilidade tributária, hipótese de incidência, fato gerador, reajuste da base , caso de dispensa de retenção, situações especiais de suspensão da exigibilidade, destaque na nota fiscal,  retenção de imposto de renda Pessoa Física e Pessoa Jurídica, tratamento das retenções na contabilidade, (registros contábeis dessas retenções) e muito mais.
Comprometimento é fundamental e garante seu avanço neste curso. Buscando atingir sempre o próximo nível, pois existem pessoas que trabalham há anos na área contábil/fiscal optando por se manter no nível essencial toda a vida.
O domínio de cada aula garante a sua qualificação, preparo e avanço ao próximo nível. VENHA PARA A REALIZA, E ALCANCE SEU PRÓXIMO NÍVEL PROFISSIONAL, TÁ EM SUAS MÃOS.

All students past and present of this course must view this lecture.

requirements: É necessário conhecimento básico em informática, contabilidade escrita fiscal e áreas afins, como por exemplo áreas administrativa e financeira
courses.description:
Aprender a elaborar os arquivos SPED - Escrituração Contábil Digital (ECD) e Escrituração Contábil Fiscal (ECF).
Aprender a interpretar os BLOCOS que compõe os arquivos SPED ECD e ECF de forma técnica analisando arquivos TXT e de forma conceitual aprendendo a fazer a leitura e a interpretação do Manual Técnico do SPED - GUIA PRÁTICO da EFD.
Aprender sobre a estrutura dos arquivos TXT do SPED - Escrituração Contábil Digital (ECD) e sobre a Escrituração Contábil Fiscal (ECF) e sua organização hierárquica.
Aprender sobre apuração de Imposto de Renda Pessoa Jurídica - IRPJ e Contribuição Social S/ Lucro Líquido - CSL para empresas do Lucro Real e do Lucro Presumido dentro do programa Escrituração Contábil Fiscal (ECF)
Conhecer sobre as principais demonstrações contábeis utilizadas pela contabilidade como Demonstração do Resultado do Exercício - DRE, Demonstração de Lucros e Prejuízos Acumulado - DLPA , Demonstração das Mutações do Patrimônio Líquido - DMPL, BALANÇO PATRIMONIAL
Elaborar um plano de contas de forma lógica e organizada utilizando arquivos modelo disponibilizado nas aulas.
Elaborar o livro diário contábil em forma de arquivo digital utilizando arquivos modelo disponibilizado nas aulas.
Entender sobre composição de sados iniciais dos balancetes utilizados na contabilidade.
Entender o que o LALUR - Livro de Apuração do Lucro Real e LACS - Livro de Apuração da CSL
Entender sobre prazos e penalidades que podem incidir sobre a declaração.
Aprender sobre assinatura dos arquivos digitais e sobre a transmissão do arquivo e substituição dos arquivos.
Todo este conteúdo é abordado no curso com base na Escrituração Contábil Digital (ECD) e Escrituração Contábil Fiscal (ECF) com exemplos práticos utilizando o PVA - Programa Validador de Arquivos da RFB ( Receita Federal do Brasil).
target_audience: Contadores, Auxiliares de Escrita Fiscal, Gerentes ADM, Programadores e Profissionais de Áreas Afins

courses.title: Pajak untuk Kebutuhan Bisnis Industri di Indonesia
courses.bio: Leasing, Organisasi Non Profit, Perbankan, Asuransi, E-Commerce
objectives: Student memahami perpajakan dalam Industri
Student memahami perpajakan leasing, membangun beroperasi dan transfer - pajak BOT, non-profit dan yayasan perpajakan
Student memahami perpajakan Asuransi perbankan, e-commerce dan Joint Venture
Student memahami pencegahan penghindaran pajak sesuai pasal 5 5 (1b), 9 (1f), 10 (1), 15, 18 (1,2,3).

Pajak Industri: Pemajakan Atas Sewa Guna Usaha - Leasing

requirements: Memahami dasar ilmu pajak
courses.description:
Pajak adalah kontribusi wajib kepada negara yang terutang oleh orang pribadi atau badan yang bersifat memaksa berdasarkan Undang-Undang, dengan tidak mendapatkan imbalan secara langsung dan digunakan untuk keperluan negara bagi sebesar-besarnya kemakmuran rakyat.
Pada course Pajak untuk Kebutuhan Bisnis Industri di Indonesia ini akan membahas konsep pajak untuk beberapa industri. Topik akan dibahas dalam materi ini termasuk: Perpajakan untuk Leasing, BOT, Perbankan, asuransi, e-commerce, pertambangan, Yayasan Pendidikan, Yayasan Sosial, Rumah Sakit, UKM, dan Penghindaran pajak. Kontennya terdiri dari teori dan studi kasus di setiap bab dalam 15 menit dalam bentuk video.
Materi yang akan dibahas pada course ini, antara lain:
Perpajakan Leasing (sewa operasi, sewa pembiayaan), dibangun mengoperasikan dan transfer - pajak BOT, non-profit dan pajak yayasan (pendidikan, Rumah Sakit dan pengembangan masyarakat)
Perpajakan Asuransi perbankan, e-Commerce dan Joint Venture
Penghindaran pajak menurut pasal 5 5 (1b), 9 (1f), 10 (1), 15, 18 (1,2,3)
Setelah berhasil menyelesaikan course ini, diharapkan student dapat :
Memahami perpajakan dalam Industri.
Memahami perpajakan leasing (sewa operasi, sewa pembiayaan), membangun beroperasi dan transfer - pajak BOT, non-profit dan yayasan perpajakan (pendidikan, rumah sakit dan pengembangan masyarakat)
Memahami perpajakan Asuransi perbankan, e-commerce dan Joint Venture
Memahami pencegahan penghindaran pajak sesuai pasal 5 5 (1b), 9 (1f), 10 (1), 15, 18 (1,2,3).
target_audience: Pelajar yang ingin belajar pajak di industri

courses.bio: Learn to enter tax data for a C Corporation into tax Form 1020 from a CPA
objectives: How to enter tax data for an C Corporation into Form 1120
How to use tax software to input a Form 1120
How to use an Excel worksheet to support tax data input for a C Corporation tax return Form 1120
How to enter and track M-1 adjustments

Comp 24 C Corporation Comprehensive Problem Part 24 Review & Diagnostics

requirements: None
courses.description:
This course currently consists of a comprehensive problem showing the data input process of a C Corporation into tax Form 1120.
This course will put together a systematic format of entering data into a Form 1120 that will minimize errors, isolate problems as they happen, and remove the possibility of having to start the process all over again.
We will enter each M-1 adjustment individually into both the tax return and an Excel worksheet so that we fully understand how M-1 adjustments function.
We will start by reviewing the data for the comprehensive problem.
Then we will enter the data into an Excel worksheet that will be used to help us organize the information.
We will be using Lacerte Tax software to enter the tax data into Form 1120. However, we will also provide PDF files of the tax forms so learners can enter the data directly into the tax forms as we go. The tax forms can also be found on the IRS website.
The course will demonstrate how to enter the data into the tax forms in stages to reduce potential mistakes and to identify mistakes as they happen so they can be fixed as easily as possible.
We will start the data input with the balance sheet.
Then we will enter the income statement as it is formatted in the adjusted trial balance.
Next, we will systematically go through the M-1 adjustments. We will isolate these adjustments, reviewing them on the tax forms, in the software, and using our Excel worksheet.
We will then review the tax forms.
target_audience: Business owners considering a Partnership form of business entity

courses.title: Income Tax (India) - Rules, Regulations, Filing of Returns
courses.bio: Income Tax India rules, sections, computation, filing returns, refunds & claims. Become an Income Tax Consultant/Analyst
objectives: Income Tax (India) rules & regulations
requirements: Enthusiasm and determination to make your mark on the world!
courses.description:
A warm welcome to the Income Tax (India) course by Uplatz.


Gain hands-on experience in Income Tax computation and filing through popular tools while learning the latest topics such as Litigation Management, TDS, TCS, Income Tax from Other Sources, Capital Gain, Business Income, Recent Changes in Taxation, Filing Income Tax Return/ Tax Audit and Resolution of Doubts. This online course on Income Tax Returns intends to equip the participants with understanding of intensive knowledge on analysis of all forms of ITR Forms along with the Overview ITR Forms and e-filing, the structure of the said course is designed in a comprehensive manner.
The objective of this online course is to augmenting the knowledge of the members in discharging their professional duties in a better and effective manner and to provide intensive knowledge on Income Tax Returns, the structure of the said course is designed in a comprehensive manner. The said Income Tax course has been developed by eminent faculties having in depth knowledge and expertise on the subject.
At the end of the Income Tax Certification Course, you will have an in-depth knowledge of the basic concepts of the Income Tax Act. Income Tax Certification course will provide you an in-depth knowledge of the basic concepts Income-Tax Act 1961. After completion of the course, you will have clarity of the different provisions of the Income Tax Act. The course covers all the latest updates made in the Income Tax Act with respect to the assessment year 21-22.


The course will help in tax planning to the following individuals:
Tax consultants and CAs
Individuals
People heading Corporate Finance
Entrepreneurs


Uplatz provides this comprehensive course on Income Tax. The Income Tax course covers all topics related to the Income Tax in India, its computation, rules, regulations, application, sections, filing, refunds & claims, and the like. This Income Tax course will help you if you wish to work as an Income Tax Consultant for individuals or corporates, as well as if you practice as a Chartered Accountant.

courses.title: Sunat -> Factura electrónica Peru -> Odoo ERP CRM
courses.bio: Para PYMEs

SUNAT: Facturando desde el sitio web de comercio más guia de remisión

requirements: Tener RUC Actualizado
courses.description:
Factura con todos los requisitos exigidos por la SUNAT usando Odoo ERP & CRM con facturador y multiples aplicaciones todo en uno.
Implementar la factura electrónica en tu empresa hace eficiente la gestión de comprobantes electrónicos integrado en un ERP y CRM de Odoo.
Es importante la FE ya constituye un título valor, esto indica que a quien se le emitió la factura de venta puede reclamar el bien, producto o servicio facturado y además le permite la reclamación de garantías. También es considerada un documento negociable puesto que establece una relación comercial entre quien entrega el producto o servicio y quien lo recibe, además permite contabilizar la deuda a favor del facturador y la obligación de pago por parte del adquiriente.

courses.bio: 税金は働く人にとって絶対に知っておかなければいけない知識です。自分のお給料から税額がどうやって決まるか知りたいと思いませんか？
objectives: 自分の税金の金額がどうやって決まるかがわかるようになれる

自分の税金のことは自分で解決しよう

源泉徴収票でも確認できる

ボーナスレクチャー: ボーナスレクチャー：特別なご案内

requirements: 特にありません
courses.description:
このコースでは、所得税を中心としてサラリーマンの方が最低限知っておくべき税金の知識をお伝えします。
働く人すべてに関係する税金（所得税）ですが、学校でも教えてもらえず社会に出ても誰も教えてくれませんが、税金の知識ほど生きていくために必要な知識はありません。
しかし、残念なことにサラリーマンで税金のことをちゃんと理解できている人は一握りです。
日本では年末調整という制度があるおかげでサラリーマンは確定申告をせずに済みますが、デメリットとして税金のことをあまりに知らなすぎるのです。
そのせいで金融機関や不動産会社の「節税になる！」という謳い文句に釣られ、どれだけ自分に効果があるか正しい判断ができずなんとなく手を出してしまうのです。


あなたは、自分がiDeCo（イデコ）に加入したらどれだけ税金が少なくなるか知っていますか？
あなたは、自分が支払った生命保険料でどれだけ税金が少なくなっているか知っていますか？
あなたは、同じ控除でも住宅ローン控除と医療費控除では控除の効果が全く違うことを理解できていますか？


もし、これらを理解できていないのであれば本コースは非常に役に立ちます。
本コースでは給料収入をメインとしているサラリーマンの方を対象にお給料から自分の税金がどのように決められているのかを流れで解説しています。
その中で「配偶者控除」や「生命保険料控除」といった税金を少なくするための控除の説明を行っています。


本コースを受講終了するころには、あなたはさっきの質問に対して回答ができるようになります。

そろそろインターネットの「節税になる！」みたいなアクセスを集めるためだけに書かれた記事に振り回されず、自分にとって何が有利なのかを自分で考える知識を身につけませんか？
リクエストがあれば、コンテンツを追加していく予定です。知りたいことがあればQ&Aにて要望を書いてください。




【注意事項】
※1 　本コースは税金の概要を解説したものとなります。
※2 　2018年1月時点の税法に基づき、解説をしております。法改正があった場合は動画の金額、条件などが異なる可能性があります。
※ 2 　Q&Aにて個別具体的な質問をいただいても回答することができませんのでご了承ください。


【セクション1】

このセクションでは、基本的な税金の計算の流れや勘違いされやすい「所得」と「収入」の違いについて説明をしています。


【セクション2】

このセクションでは、様々な控除の種類について条件や控除される金額について説明をしています。
このセクションを見ることで自分に関係する控除は何なのか？いくら控除されるのかを知ることができます。
また意外と知られていないノウハウもお伝えします。


【セクション3】

このセクションでは、様々な控除を差し引いて最終的に支払うべき税金の金額を計算するステップを説明しています。
また多くの方に関係する税額控除である「住宅ローン控除」についても説明をしています。
target_audience: 給料を受け取っているサラリーマンの方
税金の仕組みを理解したいと思っている方

courses.title: Zelf je BTW aangifte doen voor ZZP'ers (2019 update)
courses.bio: DIY BTW voor ZZP
objectives: Je kan zelf je BTW aangifte doen met het bijgeleverde programma, of kosten besparen als je de BTW aangifte uitbesteedt aan je boekhouder omdat je precies weet wat er nodig is om je aangifte te kunnen doen. Laat geen geld meer liggen omdat je niet weet wat je precies terug kunt vragen.
requirements: Je hebt geen specifieke voorkennis nodig. Je hebt een computer of laptop nodig met MS Excel 2010 of hoger.
courses.description:
Deze cursus is voor zelfstandige professionals die graag zelf hun BTW aangifte willen doen.
Zelfs als je geen idee hebt hoe je administratie werkt kan je deze cursus volgen. Stap voor stap gaan we je administratie door en na deze training kan jij zelf je eigen BTW aangifte doen én heb je direct meer overzicht in je financiën!
De jaarafsluiting / jaarrekening, loonbelasting en de IB worden hierin niet behandeld.
Het doel van de cursus is geld besparen en inzicht krijgen in je eigen administratie.
Als je deze cursus hebt gedaan kan je je administratie eenvoudig bijhouden via Excel en heb je tussentijds geen boekhouder meer nodig voor je BTW aangifte. Dit bespaart je aanzienlijk wat geld.
Met het DIY btw voor ZZP Excel programma doe je in een handomdraai zelf je btw aangifte!
target_audience: Ondernemers die zelf willen leren hun BTW aangifte te doen.

courses.title: Steuern für Selbstständige/Unternehmer (Crashkurs)
courses.bio: Optimiere deine Selbständigkeit: Steuern souverän meistern im Crashkurs für Unternehmer – Steuern einfach erklärt!
objectives: Verschiedene Rechtsformen (Einzelunternehmen, GbR, UG, GmbH und mehr)
Unternehmensgründung (Gewerbeanmeldung + steuerlicher Erfassungsbogen)
Wahl des richtigen Geschäftskontos (Kriterien)
Vor- und Nachteile der Kleinunternehmerregelung
Überblick über die relevanten/wichtigsten Steuerarten
Gewerbe-, Umsatz, Lohn- und Kirchensteuer (inkl. Solidariätszuschlag)
Besteuerung einer Kapitalgesellschaft (z. B. Körperschaftssteuer)
Freibeträgen und Ausnahmeregelungen für die verschiedenen Steuerarten
Pflichten, Fristen und Vorschriften bei der Steuererklärung
Voraussetzungen für die Einnahmen-Überschuss-Rechnung
Einnahmen-Überschuss-Rechnung (EÜR) ausfüllen
Gewerbe- und Umsatzsteuererklärung ausfüllen
Rechnungsstellung als Unternehmer (inkl. GoBD-konforme Buchhaltung)
Aufbewahrungspflichten und Folgen der Unternehmensgründung
Unterschied zwischen Werbungskosten und Betriebsausgaben
Werbungskosten/Betriebsausgaben geltend machen
Geeigneten Steuerberater für sein Unternehmen finden
Überblick über Verlustvorträge und Steuervorauszahlungen
requirements: Es werden weder Vorerfahrungen noch ein bestimmter Kenntnisstand vorausgesetzt.
Grundlegendes Interesse an der Thematik "Besteuerung eines Unternehmens" (inkl. Unternehmensgründung)
courses.description:
Willkommen zu diesem umfassenden 10-stündigen Videokurs "Steuern für Selbstständige/Unternehmer" – deine ultimative Anleitung, um das Steuerwesen für Unternehmer zu meistern! Dieser Kurs bietet nicht nur einen tiefen Einblick in die Unternehmensgründung, sondern deckt auch sämtliche Aspekte der Besteuerung ab, von den verschiedenen Steuerarten bis zur fertigen Steuererklärung mithilfe von Elster.
Was du im Kurs lernen wirst:
Unternehmensgründung: Erhalte einen umfassenden Überblick über verschiedene Rechtsformen und lerne, wie du die geeignete Rechtsform für dein Unternehmen wählst. Dazu gehören Gewerbeanmeldung, Elster-Registrierung und das Ausfüllen des Fragebogens zur steuerlichen Erfassung.
Kleinunternehmerregelung: Vertiefe dein Verständnis für die Vor- und Nachteile der Kleinunternehmerregelung und erfahre, ob sich diese für dein Unternehmen lohnt.
Verschiedene Steuerarten im Überblick: Erkunde die Welt der Unternehmensbesteuerung, einschließlich Gewerbe-, Umsatz-, Lohn-, Körperschafts- und Kirchensteuer. Lerne außerdem, wann Steuern fällig sind und wie du eine Kapitalgesellschaft (z. B. GmbH) richtig versteuerst.
Steuererklärungen im Überblick: Verstehe die Struktur einer vollständigen Steuererklärung, die Voraussetzungen für die Einnahmen-Überschuss-Rechnung (EÜR) und die Fristen für die Steuererklärung.
Steuererklärung in der Praxis: Praktische Anleitungen zum Ausfüllen von EÜR, Gewerbe-, Umsatz- und Einkommensteuererklärung mithilfe von Elster.
Rechnungsstellung als Unternehmer: Tauche ein in die Welt der Rechnungsstellung, sei es als Kleinunternehmer oder regelbesteuertes Unternehmen. Erfahre, wie du deine Buchhaltung GoBD-konform führst.
Vorschriften und Pflichten als Unternehmer: Lerne die wesentlichen Vorschriften und Pflichten als Unternehmer kennen, einschließlich Aufbewahrungspflichten und häufiger Fehler, die unbedingt vermieden werden sollten.
Werbungskosten vs. Betriebsausgaben: Unterscheide zwischen Werbungskosten und Betriebsausgaben, um einen Überblick über deine zukünftige Steuerlast zu erhalten.
Sehr ausführliche FAQ-Sektion: Zugriff auf eine fortlaufend aktualisierte FAQ-Sektion mit umfassenden Antworten auf häufig gestellte Fragen rund um das Thema Steuern und Unternehmertum.
Warum dieser Kurs?
10 Stunden Videomaterial: Tiefgreifende Einblicke in die Welt der Steuer sowie umfassendes Wissen für erfolgreiche angehende Unternehmer.
Umfangreicher Themenbereich: Der Kurs deckt sämtliche Schlüsselaspekte der Unternehmensbesteuerung ab.
Laufend aktualisierte FAQ-Sektion: Bleibe immer auf dem neuesten Stand und erhalte Antworten auf deine individuellen Fragen.
Praxisorientiert: Lerne durch praktische Beispiele sowie Schritt-für-Schritt-Anleitungen, die du direkt in deinem Unternehmen umsetzen kannst.
Flexibles Lernen: Der Kurs ist so konzipiert, dass du in deinem eigenen Tempo lernen kannst. Die Videos sind jederzeit abrufbar, sodass du deinen eigenen Zeitplan erstellen kannst.
Starte deine Reise zu finanzieller Sicherheit als Unternehmer/Selbstständiger und schreibe dich noch heute in den Videokurs "Steuern für Selbstständige/Unternehmer (Crashkurs)". Beherrsche die Kunst der Unternehmensbesteuerung und lege den Grundstein für deinen zukünftigen geschäftlichen Erfolg! Und im Zweifelsfall kannst du jederzeit von der 30-Tage-Geld-zurück-Garantie profitieren!
Hinweis: Keine steuerliche Beratung!
target_audience: Existenzgründer, (Klein-)Gewebetreibende, Freiberufler, Kleinunternehmer, nebenberufliche Unternehmer und mehr!
Zusätzlich richtet sich dieser Kurs an Personen, die über Interesse an der Weiterbildung im Bereich Steuern - vorrangig bezogen auf das Unternehmertum - verfügen.

courses.description:
(IRAs) Individual Retirement Accounts, both traditional IRAs and Roth IRAs will discuss tax planning, concentrating on tax benefits of contributing to IRAs.
The course will discuss the tax benefits of traditional individual retirement accounts (IRAs), including how to record deductions related to traditional IRAs on tax forms, using actual tax forms as examples to demonstrate scenarios.
We will discuss contribution limits to traditional individual retirement accounts (IRAs) and how those contribution limits interplay with other types of retirement accounts like employer-provided retirement plans.
The course will discuss the tax benefits of Roth individual retirement accounts (IRAs) or Roth IRAs.
We will discuss contribution limits to Roth individual retirement accounts (IRAs) or Roth IRAs and how those contribution limits interplay with other types of retirement accounts.
The course will compare and contrast Traditional IRAs and a Roth IRAs.
We will also cover retirement savings contributions credits, including qualification credits and examples of how to report the credit using actual tax forms.
target_audience: Anybody who wants to save on taxes

courses.title: The VAT Reconciliation Course
courses.bio: The process of comparing Business VAT
objectives: Reconcile VAT per month, category allocated by SARS and per financial year
How to prepare your VAT report should SARS select you for audit/verification
How to deal with tax invoices previously disallowed, which has now been corrected
How to calculate your VAT effective rate and how to use it in your day-to-day VAT management
requirements: No prerequistes required
Basic understanding of VAT
courses.description:
VAT reconciliation is the process of comparing the VAT that a business has collected from customers against the VAT that the business has paid on its purchases. The purpose of this process is to ensure that the correct amount of VAT has been accounted for and paid to the tax authorities.
In addition, you must also consider transactions that do not appear on your VAT report (for example adjustments and deemed supplies) as well as reconciling your general ledger to the SARS statement of account (SOA).
This session aims to assist the learner with the VAT reconciliation process, that can become quite complicated.
Join us for this insightful and practical session, during which a step-by-step process of VAT reconciliation will be demonstrated, and useful templates will be provided.


Topics Discussed:



Reconcile VAT per month, category allocated by SARS and per financial year
How to prepare your VAT report should SARS select you for audit/verification
How to deal with tax invoices previously disallowed, which has now been corrected
Reconcile the SARS SOA with your general ledger
Identifying transactions in your books of account that should form part of your VAT recon as a reconciling item
The SARS SOA – how does it work and how to record the information in your books of account
How to calculate your VAT effective rate and how to use it in your day-to-day VAT management
Reconciling your VAT201 returns with the AFS / TB
Executing a Year-to-date recon categorically to include transactions posted after a VAT period close off
Fixing errors made on the VAT201 and in the General ledger


In addition to the above, the following adjustments will be demonstrated as well:
Mixed supplies & apportionment
Fringe benefits
Disposal of assets
Exit VAT - cease to be a vendor
Section 18 (4)(b) - pre-registration
Cost recoveries + on/supplies
Change in use
Trade discounts
2nd hand goods
Additional assessments raised
Bad + doubtful debt
Clawback adjustment

courses.title: الموسوعة الضريبية للجميع خطوة بخطوة معا نتعلم
courses.bio: أحتراف العمل الضريبي من الألف إلي الياء
objectives: فن التعامل مع منظومة الضرائب الإلكترونية بمنهج تعليمي بسيط يناسب جميع المستويات من المبتدئ حتي المحترف من الألف إلي الياء .
المنهج تم تقسيمه إلي مجموعات وكل مجموعة تحتوي علي عدد من المحاضرات تهدف إلي تعلم الدارس كيفية التعامل مع المنظومة من البداية و حتي نهايتها بالشرح المفصل ..
الموسوعة تشمل كافة الموضوعات الضريبية من بداية التسجيل كممول / كمحاسب علي البوابة الإلكترونية وحتي الفاتورة الإلكترونية وما يتعلق بها من أمور غاية في الأهمية .
في نهاية هذا الكورس يستطيع الدراس التعامل مباشرة مع منظومة الضرائب الإلكترونية وعنده الدليل الذي يستطيع به أنجاز العمل المطلوب في أقصر وقت ممكن .

Introduction: دليل التسجيل كممول ( أو محاسب ) جديد
دليل كيفية سداد / تجديد الأشتراك للممول علي البوابة الإلكترونية
دليل كيفية تحديث البيانات الخاصة بالممول أذا ما طرأ عليها أي تغير .
نماذج الخصم والتحصيل و القيمة المضاقة: دليل أستيفاء نماذج الخصم والتحصيل تحي حساب الضريبة
دليل أستيفاء إقرار القيمة المضافة ( الجزء الأول )
دليل استيفاء إقرار القيمة المضافة ( الجزء الثاني )
إقرارات الأشخاص الطبيعيين: إقرار 101 علي صافي دخل الأشخاص الطبيعيين الغير مؤيد بمستندات - الجزء الأول
إقرار 101 علي صافي دخل الأشخاص الطبيعيين الغير مؤيد بحسابات - الجزء الثاني
إقرار 105 علي صافي دخل الأشخاص الطبيعيين المؤيد بحسابات - الجزء الأول
إقرار 105 علي صافي دخل الأشخاص الطبيعيين المؤيد بحسابات - الجزء الثاني
إقرارات الأشخاص الأعتباريين: دليل أستيفاء إقرار 102 علي صافي دخل الأشخاص الأعتباريين الغير مؤيد بحسابات
دليل استيفاء إقرار 106 علي صافي دخل الأشخاص الأعتباريين المؤيد بالحسابات - جزء1
دليل استيفاء إقرار 106 علي صافي دخل الأشخاص الأعتباريين مؤيد بحسابات - الجزء 2
دليل أستيفاء إقرار 107 المؤيد بحسابات للأشخاص الأعتباريين
دليل استيفاء إقرار 107 المؤيد بحسابات للأشخاص الأعتباريين
دليل أستيفاء إقرار 109 المؤيد بحسابات للأشخاص الأعتباريين
دليل أستيفاء إقرار 109 المؤيد بحسابات للأشخاص الأعتباريين - الجزء الثاني
منظومة الفاتورة الإلكترونية: دليل الممول / المحاسب للفاتورة الإلكترونية - الجزء الأول
دليل الممول / المحاسب للفاتورة الإلكترونية - الجزء الثاني
دليل الأسئلة الشائعة عن منظومة الفاتورة الإلكترونية

requirements: لا تتطلب الدورة أي مهارات أو خبرات أو أدوات أو معدات ( باستثناء ) المعرفة بالكمبيوتر معرفة جيدة لأن العمل الحالي هو كيفية التعامل المباشر مع منظومة الضرائب , والموسوعة تعليمية شاملة بالشرح و التحليل لكل موضوع بالتفصيل حتي يستطيع الدارس الوصول إلي مستوي عالي جدا من التحصيل العلمي و العملي في مجال العمل الإلكتروني مع منظومة الضرائب الإلكترونية.
courses.description:
أحبائي في كل مكان أسعد الله أوقاتكم
أن شاء الله تعالي يجب علي الدارس لهذه الدورة أن يتعلم و يكون ملما بالاتي :
1 - فن التعامل مع منظومة الضرائب الإلكترونية بمهنيه وحرفيه والتكامل مع المنظومة وعرضها على النظام الجديد.
2 - مشاهدة الفيديوهات بتركيز يبدأ خطوة بخطوة مع كل مرحلة من مراحل بداية الأمر ، ويجب أن يتم نشر الفيديوهات
3 - الديكهات علي الأتي:
القسم الأول:
- البداية - وهو فيديو تعريفي بسيط.
- دليل الممول / المحاسب - لكيفية التسجيل علي البوابة الإلكترونية لمعدات الضرائب.
- دليل الممول / المحاسب - (لسداد / تجديد) اشتراك البوابة (شهري / سنوي).
- دليل الممول / المحاسب - دليل الممول / تعديلها.
القسم الثاني:
- دليل الممول / المحاسب لأستيفاء نماذج الخصم و التحصيل تحت حساب الضريبة.
- دليل الممول / المحاسب - لأستيفاء إقرار العبارة وهو عبارة عن جزءين.
القسم الثالث:
إقرارات الأشخاص الطبيعيين:
- دليل الممول / المحاسب - لأستيفاء إقرار 101 الغير مؤيد توثيقه علي جزءين.
- دليل الممول / المحاسب - لأستيفاء إقرار 105 المؤيد بمستندات علي جزءين.
القسم الرابع:
إقرارات الأشخاص الاعتباريين:
- دليل الممول / المحاسب - لأستيفاء إقرار 102 الغير مؤيد بمستندات.
- دليل الممول / المحاسب - لأستيفاء إقرار 106 المؤيد بمستندات علي جزءين.
- دليل الممول / المحاسب - لأستيفاء إقرار 107 المؤيد بمستندات علي جزءين.
- دليل الممول / المحاسب - لأستيفاء إقرار 109 المؤيد بمستندات علي جزءين.
القسم الخامس:
منظومة الفواتير الإلكترونية:
- الملاحظات الهامة عن الفاتورة الإلكترونية.
- دليل الممول / المحاسب - الجزء الأول - علامة التسجيل علي البوابة الإلكترونية لمنظومة الفواتير.
- دليل الممول / المحاسب - الجزء الثاني - دليل الممول / المحاسب - البيان.
- الأسئلة الشائعة عن منظومة الفاتورة الإلكترونية
(وطبعا الفيديو دا مهم جدا ويجيب عن الأسئلة المتعلقة بالفاتورة و ما يحيط بها من إستفسارات)
- و أخيرا الفيديو الخاص بالمستندات المالية الداعمة لكفالة الضريبة على الضريبة.
أدعو الله تعالي أن يكون هذا الكورس مفيد لكل الناس
تحياتي
د / محمد يوسف
target_audience: هي لكل محاسب مبتدئي ( أو خريج جامعة يريد العمل في مجال الضرائب الإلكترونية ) و أيضا لكل صاحب عمل حر يستطيع بعد هذا الكورس التعامل المباشر مع مصلحة الضرائب من خلال البوابة الإلكترونية التي أصبحت في متناول الجميع و أيضا المحاسبين القانونيين و كل أصحاب الأعمال (صغير / كبير) فهي دورة من الألف إلي الياء للجميع .

courses.title: Retenção de Imposto de Renda e Contribuições Federais
courses.bio: Aprenda a efetuar as retenções corretamente e evitar autuações do Fisco!
objectives: O presente curso tem por objetivo apresentar aos participantes as principais peculiaridades da Retenção dos Tributos Federais (IR, PIS, COFINS e CSLL), através do estudo do Regulamento do Imposto de Renda e da Lei nº 10.833/03.
O curso visa garantir aos participantes informações teóricas aliadas a exemplos, de modo que possam aplicar os conhecimentos obtidos nas atividades profissionais cotidianas.

Através do curso sobre Retenção dos Tributos Federais (IR, PIS, COFINS e CSLL), o aluno terá amplo conhecimento sobre o tributo, sanando dúvidas porventura existentes, aplicando o conhecimento na prática e reduzindo o risco de autuações pelo Fisco.
requirements: Não há requisito ou pré requisito para o curso.
courses.description:
O presente curso tem por objetivo apresentar aos participantes as principais peculiaridades da Retenção de Imposto de Renda e Contribuições Federais (PIS, COFINS e CSLL), através do estudo do Regulamento do Imposto de Renda e da Lei nº 10.833/03. O curso visa garantir aos participantes informações teóricas aliadas a exemplos, de modo que possam aplicar os conhecimentos obtidos nas atividades profissionais cotidianas.
Através do curso, o aluno terá amplo conhecimento sobre os tributos, sanando dúvidas porventura existentes, aplicando o conhecimento na prática e reduzindo o risco de autuações pelo Fisco.
O aluno estudará os seguintes tópicos: 1-) Introdução; 2-) Obrigação Tributária; 3-) Fato Gerador do Imposto de Renda; 4-) Retenção de Imposto de Renda (1,5%); 5-) Retenção de Imposto de Renda (1%); 6-) Retenção de Imposto de Renda (Comissões e Corretagens); 7-) Retenção de Imposto Renda (Publicidade e Propaganda); 8-) Dispensa de Retenção de Imposto de Renda; 9-) Contribuições Federais (Fato Gerador); 10-) Contribuições Federais (Base de Cálculo, Alíquota e Dispensa de Retenção).
target_audience: Profissionais das áreas: fiscal, contábil, jurídica, auditoria, financeira, administrativa e outros.

courses.title: Planejamento tributário - Lucro real, Presumido e Simples
courses.bio: Curso atualizado com as novas regras do PIS e COFINS
objectives: Regime tributário Lucro Presumido
Regime tributário Lucro Real
Regime tributário Simples Nacional
Dicas avançadas de redução de tributos
Contabilidade tributária
requirements: Noções de negócios
courses.description:
Para se matricular por apenas 69,99 fale comigo em 85991821500 (zap)
Olá, tudo bem? seja muito bem vindo ao meu curso de Redução de tributos no Lucro Real, Lucro Presumido e Simples. Sim, você vai aprender de verdade a reduzir tributos em diversos cenários.
Quem sou eu? Eu sou Marteson Castelo Branco, contador, auditor tributário e tributarista com muitos alunos aqui na Udemy.
Perguntas e respostas:
- O que irei aprender?
Você vai aprender a contabilidade tributária avançada, os três regimes tributários na perspectiva de enquadrar a empresa no melhor regime tributário e estratégias para reduzir tributos em cada um deles.
- Vou aprender mesmo os três regimes tributários?
Vai sim.
- O professor ensinará baseado no quê?
O professor ensinará baseado na legislação específica da matéria que estiver sendo tratada, sem opinião pessoal e sem ensinar erros. Todas as dicas de redução serão embasadas na legislação fiscal vigente.
- Se a legislação tributária for alterada?
O curso será atualizado em um módulo chamado atualizações fiscais postado no final do curso.
- Sou estudante ainda, não terminei a faculdade, posso fazer?
Pode sim. Aconselho que você assista aula por aula na ordem que postei.
- Não sou Contador(a), posso fazer o curso?
Pode sim, na verdade você deve. A linguagem e metodologia usado no curso é pensada para profissionais do direito, contabilidade, administração, finanças, processos, economia etc. Não tenha medo, eu estarei com você o tempo todo.
- Tem materiais para baixar?
Tem sim, vários.
- Os slides usados nas aulas ficarão disponíveis para baixar?
Ficarão sim.
- Não posso assistir todos os dias, tem algum problema?
Não, o curso será seu para sempre pois o acesso é vitalício. Mas tente assistir ao menos um módulo por semana.
- Poderei fazer perguntas ao professor?
Poderá sim. Quantas forem necessárias, mas é importante lembrar que as perguntas feitas não podem se transformar em uma consultoria.
target_audience: Estudantes de modo geral que precisam entender de verdade a contabilidade tributária

courses.title: Steuern Masterkurs: Erbschaftsteuer (2)
courses.bio: Erbschaftssteuer - Schenkungssteuer - Erbschaftsteuerberechnung - Beispiele - Bewertungen
objectives: Steuerschema zur Erbschaftssteuer und Schenkungssteuer
Berechnungen zu den beiden Steuerarten
Erben, Erblasser, Schenker oder Beschenkte kennenlerne
Tricks, um die Erbschaftssteuer zu sparen
Beispiele zu den Steuerarten

Entlastungsbetrag für Erwerber der Steuerklassen II und III
Anrechenbare Steuer nach § 6 Abs.3 ErbStG und 21 ErbStG

requirements: Sie brauchen keine spezifischen Kenntnisse. Auf meinem Grundlagenkurs wird noch einmal explizit hingewiesen. Diese Grundkenntnisse wären hilfreich, auch wenn es hier nochmal kurz wiederholt wird.
courses.description:
Liebe Steuersparer,
wahrscheinlich haben Sie schon meinem
STEUERRECHT MASTERKURS TEIL 2 (1/2)
ERBSCHAFTSSTEUER – SCHENKUNGSSTEUER – GRUNDLEGENDES NR. 1 besucht.
Dieser zeigt Ihnen die Grundlagen der Erbschaftsteuer auf.
Hier wird jetzt aber gerechnet und gespart.


Es eine komplizierte Steuerart. Aber auch eine Art, wo man viel Geld einsparen kann.


Damit wir möglichst wenig an das Finanzamt und/oder an die Anwälte und Steuerberater bezahlen müssen, müssen wir die Erbschaftssteuer/Schenkungssteuer verstehen.
Ebenso die Bewertungen der einzelnen Vermögensgegenstände sowie die Freibeträge und Entlastungen müssen gekannt und angewandt werden.


Wie sieht es denn eigentlich mit dem Erbnebenkosten aus? Der Notar, die Beerdigung, der Steuerberater... Das alles kostet Geld. Können diese Kosten abgezogen werden? Die Antwort erfahren Sie in diesem Kurs.


Wie wird das Vermögen bewertet? Mietwohnungen, Bargeld, Edelmetalle... Wie wird das bewertet? Wie siehst es denn mit dem Hausrat aus? Muss ich den versteuern?


Diese Fragen werden unter anderen in diesem Kurs beantwortet.


Sie lernen:
- die 5 Schritte der Erbschaftssteuer kennen
- zu sparen
- zu bewerten
- die Steuern rechtzeitig anzuzeigen
und noch vieles mehr


Wenn Sie diesen Kurs abgeschlossen haben, macht Ihnen keiner so schnell etwas im Bereich der Erbschaftssteuer und der Schenkungssteuer vor.


Das Finanzamt hat dann Pech gehabt... und bekommt deutlich weniger von Ihren hart verdienten Geld.


Deswegen lautet auch mein Motto... Lasst uns sparen!


Bis gleich.
Ihr Nico Molitor


PS: Dieser Kurs beinhaltet keine individuelle Steuerberatung. Ein individuelle Steuerberatung kann nur ein Steuerberater mit einem abgeschlossen Examen durchführen. Hier lernen Sie nur, wie etwas funktioniert, sodass Sie eigene Schlüsse aus dem Kurs ziehen müssen. Steuerberatung ist eine individuelle Leistung, sodass nur ein Steuerberater Ihnen genau Auskunft in Ihren speziellen Fall geben kann. Bitte prüfen Sie den Inhalt auf Aktualität und Richtigkeit. Ich übernehme keine Haftung für etwaige Fehler, die jeden mal passieren können. Dieser Kurs dient nur der Wissensübermittlung
target_audience: Steuersparer, die wenig Erbschaftssteuer und/oder Schenkungssteuer zahlen wollen
Menschen, die wissen wollen, wie viel vom Erbe übrigbleiben könnte
Menschen, die Anwaltskosten und Steuerberaterkosten im Erbfall minimieren möchten
Menschen, die idealerweise den Kurs Steuer(recht) Masterkurs Teil 2 (1/2) gesehen haben
Menschen, die die Erbschaftsteuer anhand von Beispielen kennenlernen möchten

courses.description:
Preparing T1 Canadian Personal Tax Return using Profile Tax Software + 15 Case Studies
Learn how to prepare a T1 personal tax return for Canadian individuals from start to finish, including self-employed business, rental properties, employment expenses, RRSP, investments, capital gains and much more.
Preparing personal tax returns can seem pretty complicated. However, most Canadians have very simple tax matters. After completing our course you will be able to complete your own tax returns, or the tax returns for your family or tax clients, with ease. You will learn everything you need to know to prepare the majority of tax returns you will come across.

requirements: No Tax Experience Needed
courses.description:
This course will focus on tax preparation for taxpayers who qualify for the Premium Tax Credit (PTC) under the Affordable Care Act, generally reported on Form 8962.
We will look at each new concept from multiple angles, starting with a presentation discussing the topic and then analyzing practical examples to better understand how the credit is calculated and applied.
The example section will use IRS forms and real-world scenarios to work through problems, helping learners understand how the Premium Tax Credit impacts the actual tax return. Learners will also visualize the calculations using step-by-step methods aligned with IRS worksheets and applicable tax formulas.
Premium Tax Credits introduce a unique set of complexities to tax preparation, especially when there are advance payments, mid-year changes, or shared policy allocations. This course begins by introducing the core concepts of the Premium Tax Credit and walking through foundational terms such as household income, the second-lowest cost silver plan (SLCSP), and contribution amounts using practical examples.
Learners will understand how the Advance Premium Tax Credit (APTC) affects monthly premiums and how to reconcile these amounts on the tax return. We will explore both annual and monthly calculations in detail, using allocation and alternative computation methods for complex scenarios.
The course will guide learners through determining eligibility, applying for the credit, and ultimately completing Form 8962, including reconciling excess credits and understanding repayment limitations.
We will cover how to allocate premium amounts across households, apply special rules for alternative calculations, and correctly identify situations where adjustments are necessary including on supplementary Form 1095-A .
By the end of this course, learners will have a thorough understanding of how to handle Premium Tax Credits with confidence, whether preparing taxes for themselves or others, and will be equipped to tackle both common and complex filing situations involving health insurance subsidies.
target_audience: Anybody who wants to Learn about Taxes
Accounting Students, Tax Professionals, Enrolled Agents & CPA's

courses.title: Steuern Masterkurs: Erbschaftsteuer (1)
courses.bio: Erbschaftssteuer - Schenkungssteuer - Grundlegendes (1/2)
objectives: Die Grundlagen der Erbschaftsteuer werden vermittelt
Der Unterschied zwischen Erben und Schenkungen
Die verschiedenen Möglichkeiten etwas zu vererben
Die verschiedenen Möglichkeiten etwas zu verschenken
Im Teil 2 dieser doppelten Kursreihe lernen Sie die Erbschaftsteuerberechnung und Beispiele kennen

Erwerb des Todes wegen (Erben): Erwerb durch Vertrag zugunsten Dritter auf den Todesfall

requirements: Sie benötigen keine Voraussetzungen für die Teilnahme an diesem Kurs. Die Erbschaftsteuer wird vom Fundament aus einsteigerfreundlich in diesem Kurs erklärt.
courses.description:
Richtig vererben oder schenken! Wie funktioniert das? Das ist hier die Frage...
Der Staat, nein das Finanzamt möchte Ihr Geld sehen... Ihr hart verdientes und bereits versteuertes Geld...


Einen Anwalt für Erbrecht einschalten. Ja, ggf. ne gute Idee, Kostet aber.


Es betrifft uns eigentlich alle! Jeder erbt was. Auch Möbel oder die 500 Euro aus dem Sparschwein wären ein Erbe.


Wollen Sie es den Staat geben? Also ich möchte den Staat möglichst wenig abgeben.  Aber, Wie funktioniert das?


In diesem Kurs werden Sie die Grundlagen der Erbschaftsteuer und Schenkungssteuer kennenlernen.
Das Thema ist kompliziert, Sehr kompliziert... Es ist einer der kompliziertes Steuerarten in der BRD.


Nun... Echte fallbezogene Auskunft kann Ihnen nur ein Steuerberater oder Anwalt für Erbrecht übermitteln. Nur diese sind teuer, sehr teuer. Es macht so großen Sinn sich schonmal vorher mit diesem Thema zu beschäftigen. Allein um Kosten zu sparen...


Ich arbeite in diesem Bereich und möchte Ihnen dieses Thema näherbringen.


Dieser Kurs Erbschaftssteuer - Schenkungssteuer - Grundlegendes (1/2) wird Ihnen ein Schutzschild in die Hand geben. Dieses Schutzschild dient als Vermögens- und Bestandsschutz.


Wissen ist Macht!!! Dieses Fachwissen vermitteln ich Ihnen in diesen Kurs. Im zweiten Teil Steuerrecht Masterkurs Teil 2 Erbschaftsteuer - Schenkungssteuer - Erbschaftsteuerberechnung -Beispiele - Bewertungen werden wir uns mit Beispielrechnungen beschäftigen. Diese beiden Kurse machen Sie fit fürs vererben, erben, schenken oder verschenken.


In diesem Teil 1 werden Sie beispielsweise folgendes lernen:
- Historie und Aufbau der Erbschaftsteuer
- Vorschriften und Tarife
- 4 Grundbestandteile des Erben und Schenkens
- Sonderfälle Zweckzuwendungen, Familenstiftungen
- Erbanfall, Ordnungen
- gesetzliche Erbfolge
- Schenkungen unter Lebenden
- Persönliche Steuerpflicht


Und vieles mehr.
Ich freue mich Ihnen dieses Thema näherzubringen.


Bis bald
Ihr Nico Molitor


PS: Dieser Kurs beinhaltet keine individuelle Steuerberatung. Ein individuelle Steuerberatung kann nur ein Steuerberater mit einem abgeschlossen Examen durchführen. Hier lernen Sie nur, wie etwas funktioniert, sodass Sie eigene Schlüsse aus dem Kurs ziehen müssen. Steuerberatung ist eine individuelle Leistung, sodass nur ein Steuerberater Ihnen genau Auskunft in Ihren speziellen Fall geben kann. Bitte prüfen Sie den Inhalt auf Aktualität und Richtigkeit. Ich übernehme keine Haftung für etwaige Fehler ,die jeden mal passieren können. Dieser Kurs dient nur der Wissensübermittlung.
target_audience: Erblasser, die etwas zu vererben haben
Beschenkte, die etwas geschenkt bekommen haben
Menschen, die sich für das Erbrecht interessieren

courses.title: Tax Technology Essentials: ERP, Tax engines, Data, AI
courses.bio: Teching up the Modern Tax Professionals
objectives: Understand the key technologies transforming tax, including AI, automation, and blockchain
Identify and classify different types of crypto assets and their tax implications
Apply the principles of data ethics, governance, and data security in a tax context
Learn how tax data is collected, processed, and used across digital system

The Tax Tech Shift: Why It Matters Now: Understanding Tax Technology and its Impact:
Decoding the Tax Tech Toolbox: AI and Machine Learning in Tax

requirements: A basic understanding of tax, accounting, or finance concepts (e.g., VAT, income tax, corporate tax)
Interest in how technology is changing the tax profession
courses.description:
The tax profession is changing — fast. Digital tools, data-driven processes, and automation are no longer optional. If you're a tax professional, accountant, or finance team member, understanding tax technology is critical for staying relevant and ahead of the curve.
This course offers a condensed, podcast-style (with visuals) exploration of key concepts to pass Tax Technology exams. Designed for busy professionals, this course breaks down complex ideas into practical, engaging, and easy-to-follow audio lectures.
You’ll learn how digital tools are transforming compliance, how data and ethics intersect in tax workflows, and how emerging technologies like AI and RPA are shaping the future of tax administration — all delivered in short, digestible episodes.
Whether you're exploring digital transformation in your firm or simply want to understand the “why” behind the changes happening around you, this course is your practical entry point into the world of tax technology.

What you'll learn
Understand the core concepts of tax technology and its role in transforming tax functions
Identify different types of tax technology tools and how they apply to real-world tax work
Explore ethical data practices, governance standards, and data security in tax settings
Get up to speed on emerging technologies like AI, blockchain, and automation in tax
Learn how to manage and deliver tax technology projects using modern methodologies
Discover how to handle, structure, and use tax data effectively for compliance and advisory
Understand HMRC’s ten-year digital strategy and how it impacts UK tax professionals
Learn how to deliver more proactive, technology-enabled tax services
target_audience: Tax professionals looking to understand and adapt to the impact of technology in their field
Accountants, analysts, and finance team members who interact with tax processes or data

courses.title: 2023年度中国税收政策要点和影响分析
courses.bio: 中国增值税、企业所得税、个人所得税和其他税种2023年度新税收政策讲解及案例分享
requirements: 具备基本的财税知识
courses.description:
时光飞逝，转眼间2023年已离我们远去，2024年甲辰龙年正徐徐拉开帷幕。2023年中国财政部和国家税务总局都出台哪些税收政策？这些税收政策对企业营运影响如何？应该如何应对才能最大限度降低企业税务风险，并提高税务效益? 我们与大家一起来探讨一下。
继续落实国家“减税降费”的大政方针，2023年度出台的新税收政策主要还是围绕三个主旋律，一是支持科技创新，二是扶持中小企业发展，三是支持创业投资。
我们将在课程中分析2023年度中国新出台的增值税、企业所得税、个人所得税以及其他税收政策要点及其对企业营运的影响，帮助大家了解2023年度新税收政策的出台背景、历史演变和政策目标，并通过案例分享帮助大家更好掌握新税收政策的要点，加深对新税收政策影响营运的理解，同时也探讨如何利用新税收政策作税务筹划，提高企业税务效益。
target_audience: 对中国财税政策感兴趣的学员

courses.description:
As a tax professional, learners are immediately confronted with large volumes of detailed tax theory, and struggle to understand how the theory fits into the end goal of preparing tax computations.
This course has been designed to develop a foundation of simple application upon which the complexities of taxation can be built at a later stage. The approach is practical rather than theoretical.


Topics Discussed:
Utilizing an assessed loss brought forward
Definition of trade
The trade requirement
Commencement of trade
Set-off of losses in the current year
General
Facts and circumstances test
The six-out-of-ten-year-rule
Fluctuating taxable income
Decision tree – produced by SARS – with minor modifications


All Included:

Video presented course
Downloadable course material
Certificate of training
Assessment (optional)
SAIT Accredited - 4 Verifiable CPD Points
____________________________

About the Presenter:
Ruzel van Jaarseveld
Ruzel brings more than 26 years of extensive experience in financial management and bookkeeping, having worked across a diverse range of industries and corporate environments. Her expertise encompasses a broad array of skills, including the preparation and management of trial balances, payroll processing, VAT and PAYE returns, inventory control, and the compilation of detailed management accounts. Additionally, she is well-versed in E-filing systems and possesses a thorough understanding of the procedures involved in importing and exporting, making her a highly versatile and knowledgeable professional in her field.
Ruzel has over 26 years financial and bookkeeping experience, working with many industries and corporate environments, with extensive knowledge and practical application of trial balance, payroll, VAT, PAYE returns, Inventory control, Management Accounts, E-filing and Procedures of Importing and Exporting.
Ruzel is a seasoned appointed facilitator with Biz Facility, and for numerous years has been presenting various national practical financial workshops to business owners and corporate financial staff.

courses.description:
Description
Take the next step in your career! Whether you’re an up-and-coming professional, an experienced executive, aspiring manager, budding Professional. This course is an opportunity to sharpen your cost management and accounting capabilities, increase your efficiency for professional growth and make a positive and lasting impact in the business or organization.


With this course as your guide, you learn how to:
All the basic functions and skills required corporate tax planning.
Transform residential status and the taxation. Set off and carry forward of losses, deductions: for special conditions. Computation of taxable income of companies.
Get access to recommended templates and formats for the detail’s information related to business environment.
Learn useful case studies, understanding the tax planning for different organizations, financial management decisions, tax consideration in specific managerial decisions, tax planning for liquidations, advance tax planning and tax relief, tax treatment for business re-structuring, restructuring: conversion and slump sale with useful forms and frameworks
Invest in yourself today and reap the benefits for years to come.
The Frameworks of the Course
Engaging video lectures, case studies, assessment, downloadable resources and interactive exercises. This course is created to Learn about Corporate Tax planning, Residential status and Taxation, its importance through various chapters/units. How to maintain the Income Tax and its basic framework. Also, to learn about the set- off and carry forward of losses.
Tax planning will help you to understand the details about the tax planning for different organization, deductions-for special conditions. Financial management decisions. Tax consideration in specific managerial decisions. Tax planning for liquidations. Advance Tax planning and tax relief. Tax treatment for business re-structuring. Conversion and slump sale.
The course includes multiple Case studies, resources like formats-templates-worksheets-reading materials, quizzes, self-assessment, film study and assignments to nurture and upgrade your Corporate Tax Planning in details.
In the first part of the course, you’ll learn the details of the Corporate Tax Planning, residential status and taxation, Set-off and carry forward of losses. Computation of Taxable income of companies. Tax planning: FTZ, SEZ and 100% EOUs.
In the middle part of the course, you’ll learn how to develop a knowledge Deductions-for special conditions. Tax planning for different organization, financial management decisions. Tax consideration in specific managerial decisions. Tax planning for liquidation.
In the final part of the course, you’ll develop the knowledge related to the advance tax planning and tax relief, Tax treatment for business re-structuring. Restructuring: Conversion and the slump sale. You will get full support and all your quarries would be answered.

Corporate Tax Management in an organisation a step by step approach
Managing corporate taxes in an organization involves a systematic and strategic approach to ensure compliance with tax regulations and optimize the tax position. Here is a step-by-step guide to corporate tax management:
Understand Tax Regulations:
Stay informed about local, state, and federal tax regulations that apply to your organization.
Regularly update your knowledge to ensure compliance with changes in tax laws.
Establish a Tax Team:
Form a dedicated tax team or assign tax responsibilities to specific individuals within the finance or accounting department.
Ensure that team members are well-trained and knowledgeable about tax regulations.
Maintain Accurate Financial Records:
Keep detailed and accurate financial records throughout the year.
Implement robust accounting systems to track income, expenses, and other financial transactions.
Tax Planning:
Develop a tax planning strategy to minimize the organization's tax liability.
Consider tax credits, deductions, and incentives that may apply to your industry or specific activities.
Regular Tax Audits:
Conduct regular internal tax audits to identify and rectify potential issues before external audits.
Review financial statements and transactions to ensure compliance and accuracy.
Transfer Pricing Compliance:
Ensure that your organization's transfer pricing policies comply with tax regulations.
Document and justify any intercompany transactions to avoid transfer pricing disputes.
Utilize Tax Software:
Invest in tax management software to streamline the process of calculating and filing taxes.
These tools can help automate calculations, track changes in tax laws, and generate necessary reports.
Tax Compliance Calendar:
Develop a tax compliance calendar that outlines deadlines for filing various tax returns and making tax payments.
Ensure timely submission of all required documents to tax authorities.
Risk Management:
Identify and assess potential tax risks.
Develop strategies to mitigate risks and ensure that the organization is prepared for potential tax controversies.
Engage with Tax Professionals:
Work with tax consultants, accountants, and legal experts to get advice on complex tax issues.
Seek professional assistance for tax planning and compliance to ensure accuracy and adherence to regulations.
Documentation and Recordkeeping:
Maintain thorough documentation of all transactions, decisions, and supporting documents.
This documentation will be crucial in the event of an audit or when filing tax returns.
Continuous Training:
Provide ongoing training to the tax team to keep them updated on changes in tax laws and regulations.
Encourage professional development to enhance the team's expertise.
Monitor Global Tax Trends:
Stay informed about global tax trends and international tax laws, especially if your organization operates in multiple jurisdictions.
Engage in Tax Credits and Incentives:
Identify and leverage available tax credits and incentives that can benefit your organization.
These could include research and development credits, investment credits, and other industry-specific incentives.
Regularly Review Tax Strategy:
Periodically review and update your organization's tax strategy to adapt to changes in the business environment and tax regulations.
By following this step-by-step approach, organizations can enhance their corporate tax management practices, ensure compliance, and optimize their tax position. It's important to note that tax laws and regulations are subject to change, so staying proactive and adaptive is crucial in effective corporate tax management.
