Checklist for ITR filing
After completing the course, one can confidently file their Income Tax Returns independently.


Course content:
We will cover the following lessons in the course:
1. What is Income Tax Return (ITR)?
2. ITR Filing mandatory for whom?

Benefits & Additional material:
Once you enrol for the course, you will get the following benefits:

Course highlights:
Video Lectures by a CMA-Qualified Finance Professional (All India Ranker) & Finance influencer on YouTube
Comprehensive coverage of the topic
Simple & Crisp explanation
FREE Resource material
LIFETIME FREE Income tax updates (on community section)
Quick response to the queries

Overall understanding of ITR1 &
How to file your ITR1 on Income Tax Portal

courses.title: 【初心者向け】世界一分かりやすい法人税法の基礎
courses.bio: －会社がタダでモノやサービスを与えると収益になる？－
objectives: 「会社がモノやサービスをタダで与えると収益になるのか」（無償による資産の譲渡と無償による役務の提供）を学習します。
「会社がモノをタダで受けると収益になるのか」（無償による資産の譲受け）も学習します。
「会社がタダでサービスを受けると収益になるのか」（無償による役務の享受）も学習の範囲に含まれます。
８つの事例を用いて、①通常の土地譲渡、②無償の土地譲渡、③低額の土地譲渡、④高額の土地譲渡、⑤通常の融資、⑥無利息融資、⑦低利息の融資及び⑧高利息の融資の正しい処理を「会計上の仕訳」と「税法上の追加的仕訳」に分けて学習します。
８つの事例のうち、③低額の土地譲渡と⑦低利息の融資はこのコースのポイントです。それぞれ演習問題を加えました。正しい処理を「会計上の仕訳」と「税法上の追加的仕訳」に分けて学習します。
最後に、インド系のコンピュータ・ソフトウェア会社が、日本に進出してきた友人の会社にコンピュータ・ソフトウェアを作ってあげるときの課税関係について学習します。

このコースの目的、対象、全体像及びこのコースの概要のまとめ: 4このコースの概要のまとめ
このセクションの説明: 法人税法第21条の内容確認
法人税法第22条第１項の内容確認
法人税法第22条第２項の内容確認
通常の譲渡、無償譲渡、低額譲渡及び高額譲渡: 15低額譲渡の場合の仕訳（演習問題）
通常の融資、無利息融資、低利息融資及び高利息融資を４つの事例で学びます。: 21低利息融資の場合の仕訳（演習問題）
ボーナスレクチャーの提供: 27ボーナスレクチャーの提供
28ボーナスレクチャー（税務調査の急所）プロモーション・ビデオ

requirements: なし
courses.description:
＜はじめに＞
法人税税務調査の問題点の指摘には、「会社がタダでモノやサービスを与えると収益になる」と「会社がタダでモノを受け取ると収益になる」（以下「法人税法第22条第２項に規定される無償取引」といいます。）も当然ながら含まれます。そして、法人税法第22条第２項に規定される無償取引を知らないために、会社が潰れるような大きなタックス・リスクを、知らずのうちに抱えている場合も現実にあります。あなたはこのコースを学ぶことにより無償取引の基礎を学び、税務調査における国税調査官の指摘にに対応できるようになります。


「会社がタダでモノやサービスを与えると収益になる」等について８つの事例を用いて、「会計上の仕訳」と「税法上の追加的仕訳」に分けて学習します。


＜法人税法第22条第２項に規定される３つの無償取引とは＞
・「会社がタダでモノを与えると収益になる」
・「会社がタダでサービスを与えると収益になる」
・「会社がタダでモノを受け取ると収益になる」
この３つは法人税法第22条第２項に下記のように規定されています。
・無償による資産の譲渡
・無償による役務の提供
・無償による資産の譲受け


＜法人税法第22条第２項に規定されていない無償取引とは＞
次の事項は法人税法第22条第２項に規定されていません。
・「会社がタダでサービスを受け取ると収益になる」（無償による役務の享受）


＜法人税法第22条第２項に規定されていない無償取引が課税される場合とは＞
日本に進出したインド系のコンピュータ・ソフトウェアの会社が、友人のコンピュータ・ソフトウェアの会社にコンピュータ・ソフトウェアをタダで作ってあげることがあります。どのような課税関係になるでしょうか。これをコースの最後に説明します。


＜８つの事例による無償取引等の学習＞
法人税法第22条第２項に規定されている無償取引と無償による役務の享受を８つの事例で学びます。
「会計上の仕訳」と「税法上の追加的仕訳」に分けて仕訳を一つづつ学習していきます。
①通常の土地譲渡
②無償の土地譲渡
③低額の土地譲渡
④高額の土地譲渡
⑤通常の融資
⑥無利息の融資
⑦低利息の融資
⑧高利息の融資


＜８つの事例のうちのこのコースのポイント＞
・低額の土地譲渡（演習問題）
・低利息の融資（演習問題）
８つの事例のうち、③低額の土地譲渡と⑦低利息の融資はこのコースのポイントです。
それぞれ演習問題を加えて、「会計上の仕訳」と「税法上の追加的仕訳」に分けて仕訳を学習していきます。


＜まとめ＞
日本に進出したインド系のコンピュータ・ソフトウェアの会社が、友人のコンピュータ・ソフトウェアの会社にコンピュータ・ソフトウェアをタダで作ってあげることがあります。その課税関係を説明してコースを終わります。
「会社がタダでサービスを与えると収益になる」（無償による役務の提供）は、法人税法第22条第２項に規定されているので課税されること（コンピュータ・ソフトウェアを作ってあげる会社）をコースの最後に説明します。
そして、「会社がタダでサービスを受け取ると収益になる」（無償による役務の享受）は条件付きで課税されること（コンピュータ・ソフトウェアを作ってもらう会社）をコースの最後に説明します。
target_audience: 法人税法を勉強したいけれど、何から始めたら良いか分からない方
法人税を勉強しようとしたけれど、無償取引が理解できず、一度挫折した方
会社のCFO等で法人税法の基礎知識を必要としている方
経理担当者で法人税法の基礎知識を必要としている方
税務担当者で法人税法を基礎から学びたい方
企業経営者で法人税法のタックス・リスクを学ぶ必要がある方
一人起業家で法人成りを考えていて、法人税法のタックス・リスクを学ぶ必要がある方
インド系のコンピュータ・ソフトウェアの会社の隠れた大きなタックス・リスクを知りたい方
エンジニアの方で自分の勤務している会社のタックス・リスクを知りたい方
理論武装のために法人税の基礎知識を勉強し直したい税理士、弁護士等
租税法を教えている租税法・会計の研究者
租税法修士論文を執筆中の大学院生

courses.description:
Um curso focado para empresas do Simples Nacional para contadores, profissionais da área fiscal, empresários e setor financeiro.
Neste curso você vai aprender o que é uma empresa do Simples Nacional e suas particularidades fiscais.


Módulo - Introdução as empresas do Simples Nacional - MEI ME EPP
Introdução ao Simples Nacional e sistema PGDAS
Regimes Juridicos - Setor Societário ou Paralegal
Tipos de empresas do Simples Nacional - MEI, ME e EPP
Consultas cadastrais - CCM (Inscrição Municipal), Sintegra (Inscrição Estadual), Juntas comerciais e Consulta do CNPJ

MEI - Micro empreendedor individual

Empresas ME e EPP

Módulo - Apuração dos impostos e particularidades no Simples Nacional


Anexos do Simples Nacional
Particularidades do Simples Nacional
Apuração do Simples Nacional e emissão do DAS
Obrigação acessória Estadual Sedif - DeStda
Obrigação acessória - Defis anual


Novas aulas poderão ser incluidas ao decorrer do curso e conforme mudanças na legislação.

O Simples Nacional é um regime tributário criado para facilitar a vida de micro e pequenas empresas no Brasil. Ele unifica o pagamento de diversos impostos em uma única guia, reduzindo a burocracia e os custos operacionais e financeiros para os empreendedores.
.Aqui estão alguns pontos essenciais:
Quais os tipos de empresas que englobam o Simples Nacional ?
MEI - Micro Empreendedor individual
ME - Micro Empresa
EPP - Empresa de pequeno porte


Quem pode aderir as empresas ME e EPP?
Microempresas (ME) e Empresas de Pequeno Porte (EPP) com faturamento anual de até R$ 4,8 milhões


.Quais impostos estão incluídos?
PIS, COFINS, IRPJ, CSLL, ICMS, ISS, IPI e CPP (Contribuição Previdenciária Patronal)
.
Como funciona o pagamento?
O pagamento é feito por meio do DAS (Documento de Arrecadação do Simples Nacional), que deve ser quitado mensalmente


.Vantagens: Redução da carga tributária, simplificação do pagamento de impostos e menos burocracia para os empresários


.Para as empresas do MEI o pagamento é feito através de uma taxa mensal independente da empresa ter faturamento ou não, já para empresas ME e EPP o pagamento dos impostos é feito com base no faturamento da empresa.
target_audience: Estudantes da área fiscal e contabil

courses.description:
このコースでは、国税庁の無料e-Taxソフトを使って、確定申告を済ませる方法をお伝えします。


確定申告は面倒なものです。とくにフリーランスの方にとって、毎年の確定申告は悩みのタネではないでしょうか。間違いに対する不安がある一方で、確定申告に時間をかけすぎると、本来の仕事ができなくなって収入減少にもつながります。


そこでお勧めしたいのが、自宅にいながら確定申告を済ませられる「e-Tax（電子申告）」です。e-Taxを利用すれば、わざわざ自分で税金の計算をしたり、混雑する税務署に出向いたりする必要がなくなります。しかも、税制改正によって、2020年分からは「e-Taxで確定申告をすること」を条件に、青色申告特別控除が10万円アップするしくみが導入されました。


とはいえ、初めての人がe-Taxをしようとすると、さまざまな問題にぶつかります。たとえば…


「収入」と「所得」の違いがわからない
e-Taxの認証画面でエラーが出る
準備する書類がわからない
申告はできても納税ができない


これらの問題は一例に過ぎません。本コースでは、「元国税職員の経験」と「フリーランスの経験」の両方から、起き得る問題の対処法を解説します。節税につながるトピックも取り上げていますので、ぜひ参考にしてみてください。


確定申告で悩むのは今年で終わりにしましょう！


【注意事項】
・本コースは、とくに説明がない限り、2021年11月時点の税法等に基づいています。ご視聴をいただく時点で変更がある可能性がありますので、ご注意ください。


・本コースのデータや数値等はわかりやすさを重視し、一部簡略化を行っています。


・Q&Aにていただいたご意見は、今後のコース作成の参考とさせていただきますが、税理士法の規定により個別の回答をすることはできませんので、ご了承ください。
target_audience: 確定申告が必要なフリーランスや、副業をしている会社員など

requirements: No prior Commercial Underwriting experience required
courses.description: Have you noticed that Commercial Lenders have not been as open or willing to take a chance on inexperienced Commercial Underwriters due to the amount of training and effort required to bring one up to speed? Or have you been wanting to learn the Commercial side of banking only to find that no one has taken the time to teach you? My name is Ernie Cho and I have been working in Commercial and / or SBA Credit Lending since 2010. Through my experience in the industry, I have gained the knowledge and ability to train those who are looking to grow their understanding and comprehension of this exciting and lucrative facet of banking. Even if you may be coming from a related industry, such as Residential Mortgage Lending, there are major differences between the two that take a ton of effort, attention, and hours of training and understanding in order to develop familiarity. This course will help you gain a better understanding of what Commercial Lenders are looking for and will also give you a firm foundation in commercial underwriting structure, financial analysis, and cash flow. I am excited to see you learn and grow in your career, especially after taking this course.
target_audience: Those looking to learn Commercial Underwriting

As a tax professional, learners are immediately confronted with large volumes of detailed tax theory, and struggle to understand how the theory fits into the end goal of preparing tax computations.
This course has been designed to develop a foundation of simple application upon which the complexities of taxation can be built at a later stage. The approach is practical rather than theoretical.

Utilizing an assessed loss brought forward
Definition of trade
The trade requirement
Commencement of trade
Set-off of losses in the current year
General
Facts and circumstances test
The six-out-of-ten-year-rule
Fluctuating taxable income
Decision tree – produced by SARS – with minor modifications

Video presented course
Downloadable course material
Certificate of training
Assessment (optional)
________________
About the Presenter:
Ruzel van Jaarseveld
Ruzel brings more than 26 years of extensive experience in financial management and bookkeeping, having worked across a diverse range of industries and corporate environments. Her expertise encompasses a broad array of skills, including the preparation and management of trial balances, payroll processing, VAT and PAYE returns, inventory control, and the compilation of detailed management accounts. Additionally, she is well-versed in E-filing systems and possesses a thorough understanding of the procedures involved in importing and exporting, making her a highly versatile and knowledgeable professional in her field.
Ruzel has over 26 years financial and bookkeeping experience, working with many industries and corporate environments, with extensive knowledge and practical application of trial balance, payroll, VAT, PAYE returns, Inventory control, Management Accounts, E-filing and Procedures of Importing and Exporting.
Ruzel is a seasoned appointed facilitator with Biz Facility, and for numerous years has been presenting various national practical financial workshops to business owners and corporate financial staff.

requirements: Familiarity with basic arithmetic operations and calculations
Proficiency in using a computer and navigating software applications.
Willingness to engage in self-directed learning and problem-solving.
courses.description:
Are you looking for a comprehensive income tax preparation course? Look no further! This course is your ultimate resource, providing you with presentations, downloadable PDF files, practice problems, and comprehensive step-by-step instructions.
As an updated course, current students will have access to all the latest information and updates for the tax seasons. We greatly value the feedback and support we've received from our colleagues and learners, which has helped us enhance the course content and make it even more valuable.
Starting with the basics, this course introduces the concept of income tax and tax law, explaining how it is formatted. Through practical examples and visuals, we break down the tax system, providing you with a clear understanding of each component. You'll have the opportunity to apply the concepts through practice problems that simulate real-world scenarios.
Step by step, we'll guide you through the process of filling out a tax form, helping you understand the tax formula. We'll delve into important topics like filing status, dependents, and their impact on the tax formula. Additionally, we'll cover what is included and not included in gross income, discussing the taxation implications for each category.
You'll also learn about adjustments for adjusted gross income (above the line deductions), exploring primary deduction categories and their calculations. Itemized deductions reported on Schedule A will be thoroughly discussed, providing practical examples to enhance your understanding.
For individuals with self-employment income, we'll cover the reporting of self-employment taxes using Schedule C. We'll address self-employment tax, including social security and Medicare, as well as the eligibility criteria for the 20% deduction available to many small businesses.
Calculating capital gains using Schedule D will be demystified through practical examples, ensuring you grasp the intricacies of this topic. Furthermore, we'll guide you through reporting rental property using Schedule E, offering examples to simplify the process.
The course also covers various tax credits, such as the child tax credit, earned income credit, and education credits. You'll gain a comprehensive understanding of each credit and explore practical examples.
Join us on this comprehensive journey to become proficient in income tax preparation. Enroll now and gain the knowledge and confidence needed to handle your taxes accurately and effectively.
Note: This course is designed for United States tax filers.
target_audience: Individuals interested in pursuing a career in tax preparation or accounting.
Small business owners who want to accurately report their income and deductions.
Students studying accounting, finance, or related fields.
Professionals who need to enhance their knowledge of income tax laws for their job roles.
Individuals who want to gain confidence in preparing their own income tax returns.
Anyone seeking to expand their financial literacy and understanding of personal finance.

courses.description:
Sistem inti administrasi perpajakan yang baru telah diluncurkan secara resmi oleh Presiden Prabowo Subianto pada 31 Desember 2024. Sistem yang diberi nama Coretax DJP melayani seluruh administrasi perpajakan mulai dari registrasi, penyampaian SPT, pembayaran, dan layanan sejak masa Januari 2025 dan seterusnya.
Untuk mengakses layanan perpajakan pada Coretax DJP, wajib pajak dapat melakukan langkah-langkah sebagai berikut:
1. Bagi WP dengan Akun DJP Online
Wajib pajak yang telah terdaftar pada layanan elektronik DJP (DJPOnline) dapat langsung menggunakan Coretax dengan cara melakukan set ulang kata sandi melalui menu Lupa Kata Sandi.
2. Bagi WP tanpa Akun DJP Online
Bagi wajib pajak yang sudah memiliki NPWP tetapi belum pernah menggunakan layanan DJP Online tetap dapat mengakses Coretax DJP dengan cara mengajukan permintaan aktivasi melalui menu Aktivasi Akun Wajib Pajak.
3. Bagi WP Baru
Bagi mereka yang belum memiliki NPWP dan bermaksud mendaftarkan diri sebagai wajib pajak, maka dapat menggunakan Coretax untuk melakukan pendaftaran NPWP. Registrasi dapat dengan mudah dilakukan yaitu melalui menu Daftar di Sini.
Coretax merupakan sistem administrasi layanan Direktorat Jenderal Pajak yang memberikan kemudahan bagi pengguna. Pembangunan Coretax merupakan bagian dari Proyek Pembaruan Sistem Inti Administrasi Perpajakan (PSIAP) yang diatur dalam Peraturan Presiden Nomor 40 Tahun 2018. Pembaruan Sistem Inti Administrasi Perpajakan (PSIAP) merupakan proyek rancang ulang proses bisnis administrasi perpajakan melalui pembangunan sistem informasi yang berbasis COTS (Commercial Off-the-Shelf) disertai dengan pembenahan basis data perpajakan.
Tujuan utama dari pembangunan Coretax adalah untuk memodernisasi sistem administrasi perpajakan yang ada saat ini. Coretax mengintegrasikan seluruh proses bisnis inti administrasi perpajakan, mulai dari pendaftaran wajib pajak, pelaporan SPT, pembayaran pajak, hingga pemeriksaan dan penagihan pajak.
Yang akan kita bahas disini adalah :
1. KATA PENGANTAR PENDAHULUAN,
2. LAMAN LOGIN,
3. RESET PASSWORD,
4. BUAT KODE OTORISASI/SERTIFIKAT DIGITAL DAN PASSPHRASENYA,
5. PEMBUATAN EBUPOT,
6. UPLOAD XML,
7. BUAT KONSEP SPT.

courses.description:
Vous souhaitez optimiser la gestion fiscale de vos investissements immobiliers en utilisant une Société Civile Immobilière (SCI) ? Vous investissez dans l'immobilier et vous ne savez pas quel régime fiscal choisir, vous ne savez pas si vous devez créer une SCI ou non ? Vous souhaitez simplement vous former sur le sujet de la SCI et de la fiscalité immobilière ?
Ce cours complet sur la fiscalité de la SCI est conçu pour vous guider à travers les aspects les plus complexes et les opportunités fiscales offertes par ce véhicule juridique. Il s'adresse à toute personne curieuse, qui souhaite se former et qui souhaite obtenir des réponses par rapport à ses problématiques fiscales d'investissement immobilier.
Malgré sa complexité apparente, je vous expliquerai tout au long de cette formation comment fonctionne la SCI au niveau fiscal, comptable et juridique.
Après avoir suivi cette formation, vous comprendrez les bases de la Société Civile Immobilière, ses avantages et ses inconvénients par rapport à d'autres formes juridiques. Vous connaîtrez les différents régimes fiscaux applicables à la SCI et vous saurez choisir celui qui correspond le mieux à vos objectifs.
On décortiquera ensemble les mécanismes d'imposition des revenus générés par la SCI, y compris les loyers, les plus-values immobilières, et les dividendes.
Nous nous pencherons également sur les stratégies pour minimiser la pression fiscale et je vous donnerai de précieux conseils pour choisir le bon statut juridique et le bon régime fiscal lorsque vous investissez dans l'immobilier.
À travers des exemples, je vous expliquerai également comment fonctionnent les mécanismes d'imposition des résultats dans les SCI à l'IR et à l'IS.
Participez à cette formation pour maîtriser la fiscalité de la SCI et prendre le contrôle de vos investissements immobiliers. Ne subissez plus la fiscalité immobilière comme avant !
target_audience: Contribuables détenant un ou plusieurs biens immobiliers locatifs
Toute personne souhaitant s'initier à la fiscalité immobilière
Professionnels des chiffres (comptable, expert-comptable, DAF, etc)

requirements: Нет. Курс предназначен для начинающих предпринимателей, фрилансеров и всех, кто планирует бизнес в США с нуля. Мы начинаем с основных понятий и постепенно переходим к сложным темам. Все необходимое вы узнаете в процессе обучения.
courses.description:
Налоги США для бизнеса: Выбор LLC, S-Corp, C-Corp | Практика
Принять решение о выборе формы бизнеса (LLC, S-Corp, C-Corp) — самый важный и сложный шаг для предпринимателя в США. Неправильный выбор грозит гигантскими налоговыми потерями и серьезным риском лишиться личного имущества из-за долгов бизнеса.
Этот интенсивный практический курс даст вам системное понимание всех организационно-правовых форм и четкий алгоритм выбора оптимальной структуры под ваши конкретные задачи.
Ключевые модули курса:
Основы выбора: Ответственность, налоги, административная нагрузка. Разбор 5 основных форм бизнеса.
Сравнительный анализ: Детальное сравнение 7 форм бизнеса по 12 критериям в наглядных таблицах.
Практические кейсы: Разбор 7 реальных ситуаций (IT-стартап, ресторан, фриланс, семейный бизнес, работа с инвесторами) и правильных решений для них.
Результат после прохождения:
Знание: Вы будете четко понимать различия между LLC, S-Corp и C-Corp, их налоговые и юридические последствия.
Навык: Вы сможете самостоятельно рассчитать налоговую нагрузку для разных форм бизнеса и выбрать оптимальную.
Результат: Вы защитите свои личные активы и создадите налогово-эффективную структуру, сэкономив тысячи долларов.
Идеальная аудитория курса:
Предприниматели, планирующие запуск бизнеса в США.
Владельцы бизнеса на стадии роста, желающие оптимизировать структуру.
Фрилансеры с доходом от $60,000 в год.
Специалисты, работающие с международными клиентами.
Этот курс временно бесплатный — я собираю обратную связь, чтобы улучшить его. Ваш отзыв бесценен для меня! Записывайтесь сейчас, пока действует это предложение.
target_audience: Начинающим предпринимателям и стартапам, которые только планируют открыть свой бизнес в США и хотят с самого начала выбрать правильную и безопасную юридическую структуру, чтобы избежать дорогостоящих ошибок и защитить личные активы.

Действующим владельцам бизнеса (фрилансерам, консультантам, владельцам малого бизнеса на Sole Proprietorship или Partnership), которые переросли первоначальную форму и хотят оптимизировать налоги, перейдя на LLC или S-Corp, чтобы легально pсократить выплаты по Self-Employment Tax.

Специалистам и фрилансерам (программистам, дизайнерам, маркетологам) с доходом от $60,000 в год, которые работают с американскими клиентами и хотят структурировать свою деятельность для максимальной налоговой эффективности и профессионального имиджа

Инвесторам и бизнес-ангелам, рассматривающим вложения в американские активы или стартапы, чтобы понимать все юридические и налоговые последствия разных корпоративных структур (C-Corp vs LLC) для защиты своих инвестиций.

Русскоязычным иммигрантам и экспатам, недавно переехавшим в США и начинающим свой бизнес-путь, кто нуждается в понятном и практичном руководстве по американской системе без сложного юридического жаргона.

Студентам и специалистам в области финансов, бухгалтерии и международного бизнеса, которые хотят добавить в свой арсенал практические знания о американских бизнес-структурах для карьерного роста или консультационной практики.
Курс будет особенно полезен, если вы:
Чувствуете неопределенность и страх при мысли о американских налогах и юридических требованиях.
Хотите сэкономить тысячи долларов на услугах юристов и бухгалтеров, понимая логику принятия решений.
Ищете не теорию, а готовые шаблоны и кейсы, которые можно применить к своей ситуации прямо сейчас.
Цените структурированную информацию, подкрепленную реальными примерами из судебной практики и расчетами.

courses.title: Tax Evasion VS Tax Avoidance Course
courses.bio: Distinguishing between tax avoidance, tax planning and tax evasion
objectives: Introduction to general anti avoidance provisions of the Income Tax Act
Distinguishing between tax avoidance, tax planning and tax evasion
Value shifting arrangements
Trading stock
Capital gains and losses
Trusts and attribution rules
Transfer pricing
Interest and penalties related to tax avoidance and evasion
Reportable arrangements
requirements: LIttle to no knowledge on Tax
courses.description:
This seminar provides a comprehensive understanding of the crucial distinction between tax evasion and tax avoidance, focusing on their legal, ethical, and financial implications. Participants will learn the legal boundaries of tax avoidance strategies that comply with the law, versus the illegal practices of tax evasion that can lead to serious criminal penalties.
Through case studies and real-world examples, attendees will explore how both practices affect individuals and organizations, and the risks associated with each. By the end of the seminar, participants will have the knowledge and tools to navigate these complex areas of tax law with confidence.



Topics Discussed:


Distinguishing between tax avoidance, tax planning and tax evasion
Introduction to general anti avoidance provisions of the Income Tax Act
Impermissible tax avoidance arrangements and their tax consequences
Specific anti-avoidance measures in tax legislation:
Value shifting arrangements
Trading stock
Capital gains and losses
Trusts and attribution rules
Transfer pricing
Interest and penalties related to tax avoidance and evasion
Reportable arrangements


All Included:
Recording of the webinar
Q&A with the presenter
Downloadable course material
Certification of training
Assessment (optional)
SAIT Accredited (2 verifiable CPD hours)


About the Presenter
Galanies Vonofakidis
Galanies presently serves as the Tax Team Manager at Finsolve Accounting and Taxation Solutions in Durbanville. She is currently pursuing her B-Compt in Financial Accounting at UNISA, with a cumulative experience of three years in the accounting industry.
Galanies is proficient in bookkeeping, completion of VAT returns, generation of management reports, and payroll management. She is presently engaged in a taxation role and is enthusiastic about sharing her knowledge through upcoming webinars!

courses.title: Tax Audits in India: From Basics to Advanced Compliance
courses.bio: Unlock the secrets of tax audits and ensure compliance with confidence—master the process with our expert-led course!
requirements: Basic Knowledge of Accounting: Students should have a foundational understanding of accounting principles and practices, as tax audits involve analyzing financial statements and transactions.

Familiarity with Indian Tax Laws: A basic understanding of Indian tax laws, particularly the Income Tax Act, 1961, is recommended. Knowledge of sections related to tax audits, such as Section 44AB, will be advantageous.

Experience with Financial Statements: Students should be comfortable reading and interpreting financial statements (e.g., profit and loss statements, balance sheets), as these are key documents in tax audits.
Basic Knowledge of Taxation: Some familiarity with direct and indirect taxes in India, such as income tax and GST, will help students follow the course material more easily.

Chartered Accountants, Auditors, or Finance Professionals: While the course is open to all, it is ideally suited for professionals such as Chartered Accountants (CAs), tax consultants, financial analysts, and accounting professionals who wish to expand their knowledge in tax audits.

Computer Skills: Basic computer skills are required, especially for using software related to tax filings and audit documentation, as well as familiarity with digital tax filing portals used in India.

No Prior Tax Audit Experience Required: The course is designed to cater to both beginners and intermediate learners. No prior experience with tax audits is necessary, as the course covers all foundational concepts.
courses.description:
Course Introduction:
Tax audits play a crucial role in ensuring compliance with tax regulations and safeguarding the integrity of financial reporting. This comprehensive course on tax audits is designed to provide a deep understanding of tax audit processes, their applicability, and key procedures. Whether you are a business owner, financial professional, or an aspiring tax auditor, this course will equip you with the knowledge and skills needed to navigate the complexities of tax audits with confidence.
Section 1: Introduction to Tax Audit
This section serves as the foundation for understanding tax audits. In Lecture 1: Tax Audit Introduction, you will be introduced to the concept of tax audits, including their significance in regulatory frameworks and the role they play in financial accountability. Lecture 2: Applicability outlines the scenarios in which tax audits are mandatory, exploring turnover thresholds and industry-specific regulations. Building on that, Lecture 3: Tax Applicability dives deeper into the types of taxes subject to audits and the conditions under which they apply. Lecture 4: Tax Auditor highlights the qualifications and responsibilities of a tax auditor, ensuring you know who can conduct an audit and their scope of authority. The final lecture of this section, Lecture 5: Letters, discusses the formal communication involved in the audit process, including engagement letters and audit confirmation letters, which set the tone for transparency and cooperation.
Section 2: Important Tax Procedures
In this section, you will explore the practical steps involved in conducting a tax audit. Lecture 6: Tax Audit Procedures walks you through the key stages of the tax audit process, from initial planning to execution. In Lecture 7: Documentation, you will learn about the importance of maintaining thorough records, as documentation forms the backbone of any successful audit. Lecture 8: Tax Audit Report focuses on the structure and content of a tax audit report, which summarizes findings and highlights any discrepancies. The course also covers Lecture 9: Form 3CD, a statutory form that requires detailed reporting of various financial parameters during a tax audit. This lecture provides a step-by-step guide to completing the form accurately and efficiently.
Course Conclusion:
By the end of this course, you will have a clear understanding of the tax audit process from start to finish. You will be well-versed in the applicable regulations, the responsibilities of a tax auditor, and the detailed procedures required for preparing and submitting audit reports. This course not only enhances your knowledge but also equips you with practical skills to confidently manage or conduct tax audits in a professional setting.
target_audience: Chartered Accountants (CAs): CAs looking to enhance their knowledge of tax audits and stay updated on the latest compliance procedures under Indian tax laws.
Tax Consultants and Advisors: Professionals advising businesses on tax matters will find this course valuable in understanding the audit process and providing accurate guidance to their clients.
Financial Auditors: Auditors who are involved in or wish to expand their services to include tax audits will benefit from learning about the Indian tax audit framework and best practices.
Accounting and Finance Professionals: Those working in accounting, bookkeeping, or finance roles in companies who need a better understanding of tax audit procedures, reporting, and compliance.

Business Owners and Entrepreneurs: Business owners, particularly those whose turnover qualifies them for tax audits under Section 44AB, will gain insight into how tax audits work and what to expect during the process.
Students of Finance and Taxation: Students pursuing degrees in accounting, finance, or taxation who want to deepen their knowledge of tax audits and prepare for future professional roles.
Corporate Finance Departments: Corporate finance teams responsible for internal audits, statutory compliance, and reporting will find this course useful for improving their audit readiness.
Aspiring Tax Auditors: Individuals who want to specialize in tax audits as a career and are looking for comprehensive training to understand the roles, responsibilities, and procedures involved.

courses.title: E-commerce : Optimisez fiscalement votre business
courses.bio: E-commerce, dropshipping : statut juridique, fiscalité, règles commerciales, optimisation fiscale et TVA
objectives: Savoir créer une SAS ou SASU
Savoir créer une SARl ou EURL
Maitriser la TVA de votre boutique ecommerce
Apprendre les schémas d'optimisation fiscale
Éviter les pièges juridiques sur votre boutique en ligne
Apprendre à créer votre société ecommerce

Introduction: Choix du statut juridique : La micro entreprise
Choix du statut juridique : Le statut de société commerciale
Choix du statut juridique : le type de sociétés commerciales à choisir
Choix du statut juridique : La SARL/EURL
Choix du statut juridique : La SAS/SASU
La TVA : Taxe sur la Valeur Ajoutée
Les optimisations fiscales en société commerciale

requirements: Aucune expérience requise
courses.description:
Bienvenue dans cette formation complète dédiée aux aspects juridiques, comptables et fiscaux de l'e-commerce et du dropshipping, un secteur en pleine expansion qui attire de plus en plus d'entrepreneurs. En tant que professionnel de ce domaine, il est essentiel de comprendre les responsabilités et obligations légales liées à votre activité. Dans cette formation, nous aborderons les différentes structures juridiques adaptées, en vous guidant vers le choix de statut le plus avantageux selon votre profil et votre niveau de responsabilité.
Nous examinerons également la fiscalité, en détaillant les impôts et les taxes auxquels votre activité sera soumise. Le but est de vous permettre d'intégrer ces éléments dans votre modèle économique pour éviter les mauvaises surprises et optimiser la rentabilité de votre entreprise. Le dropshipping, comme tout modèle commercial, a des règles spécifiques, notamment en matière de gestion des stocks, des fournisseurs, et des obligations douanières si vous travaillez à l’international.
Enfin, nous explorerons les règles commerciales et les bonnes pratiques en matière de comptabilité et de gestion financière, essentielles pour assurer la transparence et la conformité de votre activité. Cette formation vous fournira les connaissances nécessaires pour anticiper et gérer les obligations légales, ce qui vous permettra de vous concentrer sereinement sur le développement de votre projet entrepreneurial.

courses.title: IRS Enrolled Agent Practice Test: Pass the SEE
courses.bio: Comprehensive Practice Tests to Pass the IRS SEE Exam: Master Federal Tax Law and Boost Your Confidence
courses.description:
Are you preparing to take the IRS Special Enrollment Examination (SEE) and become a certified Enrolled Agent? This course is designed to help you succeed by offering comprehensive practice tests that mirror the actual exam format. Whether you’re tackling Part 1: Individual Taxation, Part 2: Business Taxation, or Part 3: Representation, Practices, and Procedures, these tests provide you with a valuable opportunity to assess your readiness and sharpen your tax law knowledge.
With hundreds of carefully crafted, exam-style questions, you'll gain the hands-on experience necessary to feel confident on test day. Each question is accompanied by detailed explanations, so you can understand why an answer is correct or incorrect. This approach helps you reinforce key tax concepts, learn from mistakes, and improve your problem-solving skills.
This course is designed for tax professionals, aspiring Enrolled Agents, and self-study learners looking to strengthen their understanding of federal tax law and improve exam readiness. Even if you're just starting your Enrolled Agent journey, these practice tests will help you build the knowledge and confidence needed to pass the SEE.
Key features of this course include:
Comprehensive practice tests covering all sections of the SEE exam
Realistic exam questions designed to simulate the actual test experience
In-depth explanations for correct and incorrect answers
Progress tracking to identify strengths and areas for improvement
By the end of this course, you’ll feel prepared to excel on the IRS Enrolled Agent exam and advance your career as a tax professional.
target_audience: This course is perfect for aspiring IRS Enrolled Agents preparing for the Special Enrollment Examination (SEE). It’s designed for individuals who have already begun their tax law studies and want to strengthen their exam readiness with practice questions. Whether you’re a tax professional looking to expand your credentials or a self-study learner aiming to pass the SEE, this course will provide valuable practice and feedback to improve your test performance. No prior certification is required—just a desire to master the material and pass the exam!

courses.title: Kebijakan Pemerintah untuk UMKM di Sektor Perpajakan
courses.bio: Perpajakan UMKM

Pemahaman Pajak UMKM Lanjutan: Hak dan Kewajiban Wajib Pajak untuk UMKM
Strategi dan Regulasi Perpajakan untuk P: Strategi dan Regulasi Perpajakan untuk Pengembangan UMKM

requirements: Tidak dibutuhkan syarat khusus
courses.description:
Pajak adalah sumber penerimaan negara yang paling utama. Baik tingkat penerimaan pajak, maupun target dari penerimaan pajak itu sendiri terus meningkat dari tahun ke tahun, seiring dengan meningkatnya pengeluaran belanja negara. Dana yang dikumpulkan dari penerimaan pajak tersebut digunakan untuk memenuhi kebutuhan belanja negara, seperti untuk membangun infrastruktur di seluruh wilayah NKRI, transfer dana desa ke daerah-daerah yang membutuhkan, mensubsidi bahan bakar minyak (BBM), membagikan jaring pengaman sosial untuk warga yang membutuhkan, membayar gaji pegawai negeri sipil (PNS), TNI, Polri, dan lain sebagainya.


Sangat perlu bagi setiap warga negara yang sudah memiliki penghasilan untuk melakukan pembayaran pajak, baik itu penghasilan yang diterima oleh badan usaha (PT, CV, Firma, dll) maupun yang diterima oleh orang pribadi. Pemerintah sudah melakukan sosialisasi terkait pentingnya untuk membayar pajak, akan tetapi mengingat banyaknya jumlah warga negara Indonesia yang tersebar dari Sabang hingga Merauke, membuat sosialisasi ini menjadi belum merata.


Perpajakan selalu menjadi isu yang penting sekaligus strategis, baik di Indonesia maupun di negara-negara lain. Demikian halnya dengan Usaha Mikro Kecil Menengah (UMKM), yang mana memiliki porsi dominan dalam perekonomian Indonesia. Adapun sebagian besar dari pelaku dunia usaha di Indonesia adalah dari sektor UMKM ini. Apabila para pelaku UMKM ini melakukan pembayaran pajak dengan tertib dan tentunya tanpa paksaan karena dilakukan dengan sukarela, maka sangat besar potensi penerimaan negara yang diperoleh dari sektor UMKM ini. Seyogyanya tentu tariff pajak untuk UMKM ini haruslah tidak membebani para pelaku UMKM, sehingga pembayaran pajaknya dilakukan secara tertib, teratur dan sukarela. Materi Taxation kali ini akan menjelaskan berbagai hal yang berhubungan dengan dunia perpajakan dasar di Indonesia, mulai dari teori dasar perpajakan hingga berbagai fasilitas perpajakan yang telah diterapkan oleh Pemerintah untuk pengembangan UMKM di Indonesia, mulai dari tahun 2013, 2018 hingga saat ini.


Seringkali berbagai fasilitas perpajakan yang telah dijalankan oleh Pemerintah tidak diinformasikan dengan lengkap kepada para pelaku UMKM, karena keterbatasan media dan teknologi yang dimiliki oleh para pelaku UMKM. Selain itu administrasi perpajakan UMKM yang seringkali dianggap rumit dan merepotkan bagi para pelaku UMKM itu sendiri, sehingga justru membuat para pelaku UMKM justru menghindari hal-hal yang berbau perpajakan. Hal ini menjadi tantangan tersendiri bagi para praktisi pajak untuk membantu mengajarkan dan mensosialisasikan aspek-aspek perpajakan di sektor UMKM.


Aspek-aspek perpajakan untuk sektor UMKM akan dijabarkan secara up to date, dengan berdasarkan pada tarif Pajak Penghasilan UMKM yang berlaku saat ini, khususnya setelah diterbitkannya Undang-undang Omnimbus Law, maupun Undang-undang Harmonisasi Peraturan Perpajakan (UU HPP), dengan menggunakan bahasa yang ringan dan mudah untuk dipahami bagi para pendengar dan pembacanya.


Dengan lebih mengerti dan lebih memahami dasar-dasar dan filosofi perpajakan untuk UMKM, serta terampil dalam menghitung pajak, dan terampil dalam melakukan pelaporan pajak UMKM, diharapkan para generasi muda yang tergerak untuk menjalankan kegiatan usaha di masa mendatang, akan menjadi generasi muda yang patuh dan sadar akan pentingnya menjalankan kewajiban perpajakan, serta dapat memanfaatkan fasilitas perpajakan UMKM dengan baik dan benar.

Tata Cara Perhitungan PPh Pasal 21 dan Contoh Perhitungan PPh Pasal 21

requirements: Ms. Excel, Ms. Word
Seseorang yang akan menetapa atau sudah menetap di Indonesia
courses.description:
Secara umum, seri video pembelajaran ini membahas mengenai teori dan kasus yang terkait dengan Pajak Penghasilan (PPh) Pasal 21 di Indonesia. Student dapat menggunakan seri video pembelajaran ini sebagai pelengkap pembelajaran perpajakan di Indonesia lainnya atau sebagai dasar pembelajaran terkait dengan PPh Pasal 21 di Indonesia. Beberapa materi yang ada didalam modul pembelajaran ini adalah mengenai pengertian PPh Pasal 21, pihak pemotong PPh Pasal 21 serta kewajiban yang dimiliki oleh pemotong PPh Pasal 21, subjek dan objek pajak PPh Pasal 21, isu-isu penting terkait dengan PPh Pasal 21, tata-tata cara perhitungan PPh Pasal 21 serta beberapa contoh kasus perhitungan terkait dengan PPh Pasal 21.
Seri video pembelajaran ini terdiri dari 10 modul video yang dapat diakses secara terpisah. Setiap video berdurasi 5 – 8 menit yang akan membahas secara spesifik setiap materi terkait dengan PPh Pasal 21 seperti yang telah dijelaskan diatas. Student dapat mengikuti seri video pembelajaran ini secara berurutan maupun secara acak bergantung pada kebutuhan dari student. Meskipun demikian sangat disarankan bagi student untuk menyaksikan seluruh video pada materi pembelajaran ini. Setelah menyelesaikan seri video pembelajaran ini, student diharapkan mampu memahami PPh Pasal 21 dengan lebih baik. Selain itu, dengan menyaksikan video ini, pelajar diharapkan mampu mengerti tata cara perhitungan PPh Pasal 21 dan memiliki kompetensi untuk dapat menghitung PPh Pasal 21.
target_audience: Student yang ingin belajar mengenai pajak penghasilan (PPh) pasal 21

courses.title: Tax Demystified
courses.bio: VAT, Corporation Tax, Personal Tax & Self Assessment for Entrepreneurs, Business Owners, and the UK Self-Employed
objectives: Understand Personal Tax, Self Assessment, Corportation Tax and VAT - the rates, who it effects, deadlines, how to register and general overview of the UK system
Gain a comprehensive understanding of Value Added Tax (VAT), Corporation Tax, Personal Tax, and Self Assessment
Understand the legal and regulatory framework around taxes, enabling course takers to make informed financial decisions
Learn practical skills to manage finances effectively

Introduction to the course and your tuto: Introduction to the course and your tutor

requirements: Student need to have an interest in learning about the tax system in the UK
courses.description:
Introducing Tax Mastery Blueprint: Demystifying VAT, Corporation Tax, Personal Tax, and Self Assessment for Entrepreneurs, Business Owners, and the Self-Employed in the UK.


Are you tired of being confused and overwhelmed by the UK tax system? Do you dread filing your taxes and worry about penalties?


Tax Mastery Blueprint is the solution you need. Our comprehensive online course simplifies the complexities of VAT, Corporation Tax, Personal Tax, and Self Assessment and provides you with the practical knowledge you need to stay on top of your finances.


Our expert instructor will guide you through everything you need to know, from the basics of each tax type to the nitty-gritty details, like which services are vatable and the thresholds for VAT. We'll also show you how to register, file, and avoid penalties, so you can rest easy knowing you're in compliance with HMRC.


Unlike other courses that only provide a theoretical understanding of the tax system, Tax Mastery Blueprint takes a practical approach. We'll teach you the skills you need to manage your finances effectively, whether you're an entrepreneur, business owner, or self-employed.


Enroll in Tax Mastery Blueprint today and take the first step towards mastering the UK tax system. With our course, you'll save time, money, and the stress of dealing with taxes. Don't wait – sign up now and take control of your finances. Don't be caught out. Gain a general understanding of the tax system and stay ahead of the game.
target_audience: Entrepreneurs, business owners, self employed, those who need to have an overal general understanding of the UK tax system

courses.description: Curso enfocado tanto a aquellos que quieran aprender a liquidar Impuesto al valor añadido como también para estudiantes y profesionales en ciencias económicas, comenzando desde la teoría en la ley hasta la culminación con la declaración jurada y posterior VEP de Pago. Se entrega material para poder liquidar el impuesto y empezar mejor preparado, análisis y practica de la ley de Impuesto al valor añadido. was im Umsatzsteuervoranmeldung-Formular eingegeben werden muss und wieso.
Du kennst EU-OSS, eVAT und andere Schemata und weißt, ob diese für Dich relevant sind.
Du kannst Deine monatliche oder vierteljährliche Umsatzsteuervoranmeldung eigenständig erstellen.
welche steuerlichen Fristen Du für die Umsatzsteuervoranmeldung einzuhalten hast
wie Du als österreichischer Unternehmer eine deutsche Umsatzsteuervoranmeldung über Elster ausfüllst

Umsatzsteuervoranmeldung für österreichi: Kursvorschau: Der UVA-Online-Kurs von Liss Heller
Reverse Charge und B2B im UVA-Formular
Deutsche USt und UVA + Anmeldung über Elster

requirements: Für diesen Kurs benötigst Du kein Wirtschaftsstudium - wir erklären die Inhalte leicht verständlich und direkt aus der Praxis.
Du bist bereits selbständig oder möchtest in nächster Zeit dein Unternehmen gründen.
courses.description:
Du bist österreichischer Unternehmer und möchtest künftig Deine Umsatzsteuervoranmeldung (UVA) selbst erstellen und einreichen? Aber die Formular-Hürde und das fehlende Wissen hindern Dich daran? Du weißt schlichtweg nicht, welche Zahlen wo einzutragen sind und wie Du die berechnest?
Dann ist dieser Kurs genau richtig für Dich. Steuerberaterin Mag. Liss Heller zeigt Dir anhand von 5 Lektionen, wie Du Deine monatliche oder vierteljährliche Umsatzsteuervoranmeldung erstellst.


Wer ist Liss Heller?
Seit über 30 Jahren führt sie erfolgreich die internationale Steuer- und Unternehmensberatung HELLER CONSULT, von ihrem Sitz in Wien aus und hat mehr als zwei Dutzend Firmen in Österreich, Deutschland, der Schweiz, anderen europäischen Ländern und in den arabischen Emiraten gegründet. Als Steuer- und Unternehmensberaterin hilft sie Unternehmern wie Dir, die steuerlichen Angelegenheiten selbst in die Hand zu nehmen und sich in den Bereichen Steuern und Finanzen weiterzubilden.


Nach dem Kurs…
… weißt Du, was eine Umsatzsteuervoranmeldung (UVA) ist und aus welchen Beträgen sie sich errechnen lässt.
… verstehst Du, was im Umsatzsteuervoranmeldung-Formular eingegeben werden muss und wieso.
… kennst Du EU OSS, eVAT und weitere Schemata und weißt, ob diese für Dich relevant sind.
… kannst Du Deine monatliche oder vierteljährliche Umsatzsteuervoranmeldung eigenständig erstellen.
… weißt Du, welche steuerlichen Fristen Du für die Umsatzsteuervoranmeldung einzuhalten hast
… weißt Du, wie Du als österreichischer Unternehmer eine deutsche Umsatzsteuervoranmeldung über Elster ausfüllst




Dieser Kurs ist optimal für Dich, wenn:
Du als Unternehmer Deine Umsatzsteuervoranmeldungen eigenständig einreichen möchtest.
Du Dich steuerlich weiterbilden willst.
Du selbständig bist und lieber Geld in Deine eigene Ausbildung steckst um unabhängiger zu werden.


Achtung: In diesem Kurs geht es um die österreichische Umsatzsteuervoranmeldung.
target_audience: Unternehmer:innen, die ihre Umsatzsteuervoranmeldungen eigenständig einreichen möchten.

requirements: Cukup Memiliki Hak Akses Internet Dengan Device PC/Laptop/SmartPhone.
courses.description:
Sistem inti administrasi perpajakan yang baru telah diluncurkan secara resmi oleh Presiden Prabowo Subianto pada 31 Desember 2024. Sistem yang diberi nama Coretax DJP melayani seluruh administrasi perpajakan mulai dari registrasi, penyampaian SPT, pembayaran, dan layanan sejak masa Januari 2025 dan seterusnya.
Untuk mengakses layanan perpajakan pada Coretax DJP, wajib pajak dapat melakukan langkah-langkah sebagai berikut:
1. Bagi WP dengan Akun DJP Online
Wajib pajak yang telah terdaftar pada layanan elektronik DJP (DJPOnline) dapat langsung menggunakan Coretax dengan cara melakukan set ulang kata sandi melalui menu Lupa Kata Sandi.
2. Bagi WP tanpa Akun DJP Online
Bagi wajib pajak yang sudah memiliki NPWP tetapi belum pernah menggunakan layanan DJP Online tetap dapat mengakses Coretax DJP dengan cara mengajukan permintaan aktivasi melalui menu Aktivasi Akun Wajib Pajak.
3. Bagi WP Baru
Bagi mereka yang belum memiliki NPWP dan bermaksud mendaftarkan diri sebagai wajib pajak, maka dapat menggunakan Coretax untuk melakukan pendaftaran NPWP. Registrasi dapat dengan mudah dilakukan yaitu melalui menu Daftar di Sini.
Coretax merupakan sistem administrasi layanan Direktorat Jenderal Pajak yang memberikan kemudahan bagi pengguna. Pembangunan Coretax merupakan bagian dari Proyek Pembaruan Sistem Inti Administrasi Perpajakan (PSIAP) yang diatur dalam Peraturan Presiden Nomor 40 Tahun 2018. Pembaruan Sistem Inti Administrasi Perpajakan (PSIAP) merupakan proyek rancang ulang proses bisnis administrasi perpajakan melalui pembangunan sistem informasi yang berbasis COTS (Commercial Off-the-Shelf) disertai dengan pembenahan basis data perpajakan.
Tujuan utama dari pembangunan Coretax adalah untuk memodernisasi sistem administrasi perpajakan yang ada saat ini. Coretax mengintegrasikan seluruh proses bisnis inti administrasi perpajakan, mulai dari pendaftaran wajib pajak, pelaporan SPT, pembayaran pajak, hingga pemeriksaan dan penagihan pajak.
Yang akan kita bahas disini adalah :
1. PENGISIAN SPT TAHUNAN PPH ORANG PRIBADI,
2. PENGISIAN FORMULIR INDUK PADA HEADER,
3. PENGISIAN FORMULIR INDUK PADA IDENTITAS WAJIB PAKAL,
4. PENGISIAN FORMULIR INDUK PADA IKHTISAR PENGHASILAN NETTO,
5. PENGISIAN FORMULIR INDUK PADA PERHITUNGAN PPH TERUTANG,
6. PENGISIAN FORMULIR INDUK PADA KREDIT PAJAK,
7. PENGISIAN FORMULIR INDUK PADA PPH KURANG/LEBIH BAYAR,
8. PENGISIAN FORMULIR INDUK PADA NILAI KURANG LEBIH BAYAR SPT SETELAH PEMBETULAN,
9. PENGISIAN FORMULIR INDUK PADA PERMOHONAN PPH LEBIH BAYAR,
10. PENGISIAN FORMULIR INDUK PADA ANGSURAN PPH PASAL 25 TAHUN BERIKUTNYA,
11. PENGISIAN FORMULIR INDUK PADA PERNYATAAN TRANSAKSI LAINNYA,
12. PENGISIAN FORMULIR INDUK PADA LAMPIRAN TAMBAHAN,
13. PENGISIAN FORMULIR INDUK PADA PERNYATAAN.

Destinado para quem deseja aprender ABSOLUTAMENTE TUDO sobre como operar o programa gerador da declaração do imposto de renda.Voltado para toda e qualquer pessoa que precise ou queira preencher e enviar sua declaração de imposto de renda da pessoa física.
Além de ensinar como declarar e preencher corretamente os campos e formulários da declaração, você vai aprender sobre a legislação do imposto de renda da pessoa física e dicas para economizar, dentro da legalidade, no pagamento do imposto.

courses.bio: Everything you need to know to submit your own UK self assessment tax return online with HMRC
objectives: * Learn how to submit your own UK self assessment tax return online to HMRC *
How to get organised for doing your own tax return
How to access and login to the HMRC website

How to input your employment figures - including where to find the information
How to input your self employment figures - you need to already know your income and expenses!

How to complete your tax return

About Tax Returns: Who needs to do a tax return?
Why do your own tax return?
Your HMRC Account: Logging in to your HMRC account

requirements: You will need internet access
courses.description:
In this "How to do your own tax return" I will show you step-by-step how to submit your own UK self assessment tax return online with HMRC.
If you are a UK based small business owner with a straightforward business or an individual who needs to submit a tax return you can easily do it by yourself.
You will save on accountants fees and you will be in control of when your tax return is submitted.
I will cover what you need to include on your tax return, explain where you can find the information and then show you how to input on the HMRC website.
It's not an accounting course, so you will need to know your self employment income and expenses to include on your return.
It's also not meant for complex businesses, where I would still recommend using an accountant.
If you have capital gains or foreign income, please be aware that I haven't covered these.  But for most people, these sections will not be required.
At the end of the course, you will realise that completing your own UK tax return is not as scary as you think.  You can do it, and next year you will find it even easier!
The examples I show you are for the 2017-2018 tax year, but can still be used to help you complete your current year tax return.
target_audience: UK individuals who need to submit a self assessment tax return
If you're tax return is not complicated, with my help you can do it by yourself!

courses.description:
Want to understand UAE VAT and stay compliant with the latest tax regulations in 2025?
Whether you’re an accountant, business owner, or professional dealing with UAE tax matters, this course will take you from basic concepts to advanced topics — helping you manage VAT efficiently and correctly for any business type.
You'll start with the fundamentals of VAT — when and where it applies, the parties involved, and how VAT flow works. Then you'll dive deeper into the rules for registration, deregistration, VAT rates, international trade, reverse charge mechanism, special VAT rules for different sectors, and VAT accounting.
Finally, you'll learn how to file accurate VAT returns, avoid penalties, and submit returns through the EMARA Tax Portal with complete confidence.
Designed with real-world examples and practical guidance, this training is perfect for beginners and experienced professionals looking to stay updated with UAE VAT law and apply it effectively in daily business activities.

Moreover Our VAT courses provide a comprehensive understanding of the VAT system, covering the fundamental principles of VAT, regulation and administration, and guidance on the interpretation and consistent application of the GCC VAT legislation
Training Content includes:
Principles of VAT
• Obligations and rights of taxpayers key regulatory requirements
• International trade: VAT on cross border and free zone
transactions

• VAT registration
• Payment of VAT and filing of VAT returns
• VAT for accounts payable
• VAT for accounts receivable
and many more.
target_audience: Accountants & Bookkeepers working with UAE-based businesses

courses.title: Demystifying the FBAR
courses.bio: Everything You Need to Know
objectives: What are the primary purposes of the FBAR regulations in relation to U.S. taxpayers with foreign financial accounts?
How does the definition of a "U.S. person" influence FBAR filing requirements?
In what scenarios is a U.S. taxpayer exempt from reporting foreign financial accounts on an FBAR?
What constitutes a "financial account" under FBAR regulations, and why is this definition significant?
How do the FBAR rules differentiate between financial interests and signature authority over foreign accounts?
What implications arise for U.S. persons who fail to comply with FBAR filing requirements?
How does the ruling of the Ninth Circuit regarding online poker accounts impact the understanding of foreign financial accounts?
In what ways can the ownership structure of corporations or partnerships affect FBAR reporting obligations?
How might the FBAR regulations change for individuals with dual citizenship or residency in another country?
What are the civil and criminal penalties associated with non-compliance with FBAR regulations?
How does the history of the FBAR reflect its role as a tool for the U.S. government in combating financial fraud?
What challenges do tax practitioners face when explaining FBAR requirements to clients unfamiliar with complex tax regulations?
How do the FBAR rules interact with other international tax reporting forms that U.S. taxpayers may encounter?
What considerations should a U.S. citizen take into account when opening a foreign bank account regarding FBAR compliance?
In what circumstances might physical assets, like gold stored in a foreign financial institution, trigger FBAR reporting requirements?
How do tax treaties impact the FBAR filing obligations of U.S. residents living abroad?
What role does the IRS play in the enforcement of FBAR regulations and ensuring compliance among taxpayers?
How can the knowledge of FBAR regulations help U.S. persons manage their financial interests abroad more effectively?
What are the most common misconceptions about FBAR filing requirements among U.S. taxpayers?
How does the concept of "willfulness" affect the determination of penalties for FBAR violations?
requirements: Basic tax and/or accounting
courses.description:
This course breaks the FBAR down into its individual components and covers each in exquisite detail.


Learning Objectives:


Learn the purpose of the FBAR regulations
Determine who must file the FBAR
Determine the FBAR filing requirements
Determine who is exempt from the FBAR filing requirements
Understand the civil and criminal penalties that may be applicable for not complying with the FBAR filing requirements


Major Subjects:


Module I: Deconstructing the FBAR rule (Part I)
Module II: Deconstructing the FBAR rule (Part II)
Module III: Most Commonly Asked Questions About the FBAR
Module IV: IRS Procedures for Ensuring Consistency and Effectiveness in Administering Civil FBAR Penalties
Module V: The Elusiveness of Willfulness
Module VI: Beyond the FBAR – Everything You Never Wanted to Know About All of the Other International Reporting Forms but Must
Module VII: Challenging the IRS’s Assertion of the Non-willful FBAR Penalty: A New Hope
This course also includes questions to ensure that you understand the material. Here are some examples:


What does FBAR stand for?
A) Foreign Bank Account Review
B) Foreign Bank Account Report
C) Federal Bank Account Regulation
D) Foreign Banking Agreement Regulation


Who is considered a U.S. person for FBAR purposes?
A) Only U.S. citizens
B) U.S. citizens, residents, and certain entities
C) Only residents of the U.S.
D) Only corporations organized under U.S. laws

courses.title: Steuern Masterkurs: Gewerbesteuer (2)
courses.bio: Gewerbesteuer - Verluste - Ermittlungen - Zerlegungen - Beispiele
objectives: Sie werden ein Gewerbesteuer-Experte
Sie lernen die Verlustrechnung der Gewerbesteuer kennen
Sie lernen die gewerbesteuerliche Organschaft kennen
Sie lernen die Gewerbesteuer der unterschiedlichen Rechtsformen kennen
Die Verteilung und Zerlegung der Gewerbeeinkünfte werden Ihnen geläufig werden
Sie werden verstehen, wie Ihre Kommune/Stadt mit dem Thema Gewerbesteuer umgeht
requirements: Es gibt keine speziellen Voraussetzungen für diesen Kurs. Es wäre aber von Vorteil, wenn Sie Teil 1 des Steuerecht Masterkurses zum Thema Gewerbesteuer absolviert haben.
courses.description:
Möchten Sie gerne wissen, wie man die Gewerbesteuerlast berechnet und was ein Hebesatz ist? Dann sind Sie in diesem Kurs genau richtig.
Nach der Einführung werden Sie erfahren, was Sie in diesem Kurs lernen.
Die Gewerbesteuer ist eine anspruchsvolle Steuerart. Immer wieder Fragen wir uns, warum die Unternehmen eigentlich Gewerbesteuer entrichten müssen. Diese Steuer ist ja eine zusätzliche Belastung, die den Unternehmen die wirtschaftliche Leistungsfähigkeit einschränkt.


Was würde denn passieren, wenn man es wirklich schaffen würde, diese Steuerart möglichst niedrig zu halten? Würde dass der Unternehmensgewinn steigen? Vielleicht... Könnte das Unternehmen dann mehr Mitarbeiter beschäftigen? Ja.. auch vielleicht. Nun die Gewerbesteuer muss bezahlt werden. Sie kann aber minimiert werden. Hierzu bieten sich Verlustverrechnungen oder auch die Wahl der richtigen Rechtsform an. Die Rechtsformen werden nämlich steuerrechtlich anders behandelt.


Sie werden in diesem Kurs die Position der Gemeinden/Städte und Kommunen kennenlernen. Warum möchte eine Gemeinde möglichst viel Gewerbesteuereinnahmen? Profitieren davon auch die Bürger in der jeweiligen Gemeinde? Das ist hier die Frage.


Dieser Kurs ist das i-Tüpfelchen auf Ihr bereits vorhandenes Steuerwissen über die Gewerbesteuer aus den Steuerrecht Masterkurs Teil 4 (1/2).
Erst nach diesem Kurs verstehen Sie die genauen Systematiken der Gewerbesteuer. Schalten Sie gerne ein.


In diesem Kurs lernen Sie:


- Die Verlustrechnung der Gewerbeeinkünfte
- Die Verbindungen der Gewerbesteuer zu anderen Steuerarten wie die Erbschaftsteuer
- Die Verlustanteile anhand der Rechtsformen
- Das Schema zur Berechnung der Gewerbesteuer kennen
- Was ein Hebesatz in der Gewerbesteuer ist
- Was eine gewerbesteuerliche Organschaft ist
- Welche Besonderheiten es in der Gewerbesteuer gibt


und noch vieles mehr...


Ich freue mich auf Ihre Teilnahme.


Ihr
Nico Molitor


PS: Dieser Kurs beinhaltet keine individuelle Steuerberatung. Ein individuelle Steuerberatung kann nur ein Steuerberater mit einem abgeschlossen Examen durchführen. Hier lernen Sie nur, wie etwas funktioniert, sodass Sie eigene Schlüsse aus dem Kurs ziehen müssen. Steuerberatung ist eine individuelle Leistung, sodass nur ein Steuerberater Ihnen genau Auskunft in Ihren speziellen Fall geben kann. Bitte prüfen Sie den Inhalt auf Aktualität und Richtigkeit. Ich übernehme keine Haftung für etwaige Fehler , die jeden mal passieren können. Dieser Kurs dient nur der Wissensübermittlung
target_audience: Menschen, die die Gewerbesteuer komplett verstehen möchten
Menschen, die das deutsche Steuerrecht verstehen wollen
Menschen, die Ihre Finanzen und Kosten verbessern wollen

courses.title: International Tax Law: The OECD and Global Taxation in Focus
courses.bio: English, Mandarin, Korean and Spanish Subtitles Available: Complexities of International Tax Strategies and Compliance
objectives: How the Double Irish With a Dutch Sandwich international tax strategy worked and its implications today
How multinational corporations shift profits and regulations that this activity has created
Understand important literature in international tax law and regulations
Understand Lombard Credit works on DeFi platforms on the blockchain

Introduction: Tax Loopholes as Original Sin: Lessons From Tax History
Lombard Credit, ATR, Freeports and the O: Lombard Credit, ATR, Freeports and the OECD
Double Irish with a Dutch Sandwich
North Korea, China, Macao, Hong Kong, Singapore as Switzerland to Cayman Islands

requirements: No legal or tax experience required. Simply a willingness to learn. Some pre-existing familiarity with basic tax and general accounting concepts will certainly help with this course.
courses.description:
Are you intrigued by the complex world of global taxation? Do you want to understand how multinational corporations, non-profits, and family offices navigate the intricate landscape of international tax laws? This comprehensive course delves deep into the history, laws, and advanced strategies employed by these entities to leverage global tax loopholes legally and effectively.
Throughout this course, you will explore:
Understanding Tax Loopholes: Gain insights into the definition, impact, and implications of tax loopholes on tax equity and global economies.
Global Minimum Tax & Special Economic Zones (SEZs): Learn about the global minimum tax policies, SEZs, and their role in international tax planning.
Advanced Tax Rulings: Understand how multinational corporations utilize advanced tax rulings to mitigate risks and ensure compliance with international tax laws.
Offshore Tax Evasion Responses: Explore the global responses to offshore tax evasion, including tax amnesty programs and international cooperation.
Freeports & Duty-Free Zones: Uncover the criminological aspects of freeports and duty-free zones, and their potential for misuse in illicit trade and money laundering.
Digital Tax Reforms: Analyze the impact of digital tax reforms on tax havens and profit-shifting dynamics in the digital economy.
Automobile Industry Tax Efficiencies: Discover the tax strategies employed by the automobile industry, including transfer pricing and R&D tax credits.
Nonprofit Tax Regulation: Examine the strategies nonprofits use to maximize tax-exempt status while maintaining compliance with regulations.
Blockchain and Cryptocurrency in Taxation: Understand the implications of blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies on international tax compliance.
Future Challenges in Global Taxation: Discuss emerging challenges in global taxation, including digitalization, transparency requirements, and the evolving concepts of Permanent Establishment.
Whether you're a tax professional, legal expert, or a business leader, this course will equip you with the knowledge and tools to navigate and leverage global tax loopholes effectively. Join us and deepen your understanding of the complex and ever-evolving world of international taxation.
target_audience: Professionals working in legal or accounting professions seeking to better understand concepts like double taxation, donor advised funds, offshore banking regulations, and bilateral tax treaties.

courses.title: Steuer - Einkommensteuer in Deutschland
courses.bio: Lerne die 7 Einkunftsarten der deutschen Einkommensteuer kennen
requirements: Diese Kurs gibt in einen kurzen und kostenlosen Überblick über die 7 Einkunftsarten im deutschen Einkommensteuerrecht. Hierfür brauchen Sie keine Vorkenntnisse. Dieser Kurs selbst ist quasi eine Einführung in meine Steuerrecht Masterkurse auf Udemy.
courses.description:
Haben Sie es auch satt gefühlt ständig nur für den Staat zu arbeiten?
Sind Sie es leid zu sehen, wie andere Menschen ein Leben in Wohlstand führen während Sie 8 Stunden am Tag sich den Buckel krum arbeiten und am Ende noch dafür dankbar sein müssen, dass sie jetzt nur 12 Cent pro kWh Gas zahlen müssen?
Dann ist mein Kursreihe zum Steuerrecht genau das Richtige für Sie. In meiner Kursreihe zum Steuerrecht Masterkurs lernen Sie Schritt für Schritt das deutsche Steuerrecht kennen, sodass Sie sich endlich vernünftig gegen die Gier des Staates und des Finanzamtes wehen können.


Denn wir alle wissen es genau: Steuern sind unser größter Ausgabenposten! Schauen Sie auf ihre Gehaltsabrechnung oder aufm Kassenbon vom Supermarkt.


Überall zahlen Sie Steuern. Sei es die Einkommensteuer vom Lohn, die Umsatzsteuer an der Kasse oder die Grundsteuer als Mieter bzw. Hauseigentümer. Nun wird aber endlich gespart.


Diesen ersten Kurs möchte ich Ihnen gerne schenken! Sie haben richtig gehört. Ich werde Ihnen diesen kurzen Kurs schenken. Er wird Ihnen helfen die 7 Einkunftsarten im der Einkommenssteuer zu verstehen. Danach haben Sie sich gut vorbereitet und den Grundstein gelegt um in meine Steuerrecht Masterkurs Kursreihe durchzustarten.


Dort werden Sie Themen wie die Einkommensteuer, die Erbschaftssteuer oder die Umsatzsteuer kennenlernen. Danach sind Sie ein wirklicher Steuermaster. Okay... Fürn Steuerberater- Examen reicht das Wissen nicht, aber es reicht, um endlich Steuern zu sparen und dem Finanzamt die gelbe Karte zu zeigen.


Gerne werde ich Ihr Wegbegleiter hierfür sein.
Bis gleich bei meinem Kurs.


Ihr
Nico Molitor


PS: Dieser Kurs beinhaltet keine individuelle Steuerberatung. Ein individuelle Steuerberatung kann nur ein Steuerberater mit einem abgeschlossen Examen durchführen. Hier lernen Sie nur, wie etwas funktioniert, sodass Sie eigene Schlüsse aus dem Kurs ziehen müssen. Steuerberatung ist eine individuelle Leistung, sodass nur ein Steuerberater Ihnen genau Auskunft in Ihren speziellen Fall geben kann. Bitte prüfen Sie den Inhalt auf Aktualität und Richtigkeit. Ich übernehme keine Haftung für etwaige Fehler, die jeden mal passieren können. Dieser Kurs dient nur der Wissensübermittlung
target_audience: Menschen, die die deutsche Einkommensteuer verstehen wollen
Menschen, die sich finanziell weiterbilden möchten

Menschen, die ihr Vermögen und Einkünfte schützen wollen

courses.description:
Every month Ontario puts land up for Auction.
Update Feb 4 2021, Due to COVID-19 the majority of municipalities in Ontario have stopped publishing new tax sales, they can postpone a tax sale up to 90 days, they have also release a new regulation (search: ontario - laws-regulation-200073) which allows them to postpone an additional 120 days. Since Covid-19 has began last March 2020 please keep on the look out for a lot of potential properties that may go up for tax sale. Good Luck and Stay Safe.


UPDATE November 28, 2019, Toronto Auctioning off six properties to recover unpaid property taxes"
"Four abandoned Toronto properties will be sold to the highest bidder today"
Sean DavidsonMulti-Platform Writer, CTV News Toronto
Published Thursday, November 28, 2019 11:10AM EST


Would you like to own a Cottage, Home, land even a road and know that you purchased it below market value? That's right I said Road, even roads have been put up for Auction.
In Ontario, property value keeps on increasing. It is getting increasingly harder to own land. Did you know that each month municipalities across Ontario auction off land with dwellings (homes, cottages, etc). These properties are auctioned off to make up for the delinquent taxes on theses properties.  It is known as TAX SALES, it's when owners of a property do not pay the taxes for two years and on the third year the municipal treasurer prepares a tax arrears certificate.  This certificate describes the property and indicates that it will be sold by public auction.
By taking my course you will be able to:
find out where and when tax sales will be held
how properties are advertised
how to do your own title search
how to avoid making mistakes that could cost you money
how to prepare Tender Packages for bids
If you are interested in getting some below market value properties and enjoy the thrill of the hunt, then this course is for you! I will guide you from finding to bidding and remember:
You have unlimited lifetime access at no extra cost
If you have any questions you can always ask for help
30-day money back guaranteed, no questions asked
Who is the target audience?
Anyone wanting to invest into Canadian Real Estate and buy properties below market value
Beginners in Real Estate wanting to learn about Canadian Tax Sales
This course is unique because there is no other course that goes into this much detail about Ontario Tax Sales

requirements: No Tax Experience Needed.
courses.description:
This course will focus on tax planning and preparation related to IRS Form W-4, the Employee Tax Withholdings used by taxpayers to adjust the amount of federal income tax withheld from their paycheck.
We will look at each new concept from multiple angles, starting with a presentation discussing the topic and then looking at examples to better understand the concepts in action.
Each section will use tax forms to work through real-world scenarios and an accounting equation method using Excel so learners can understand the impact of withholding decisions on a tax return and visualize the tax formula in action.
Completing Form W-4 accurately is essential for taxpayers to avoid large tax due balances or unexpected refunds. This course will begin by introducing the purpose and structure of Form W-4, including the relationship between withholding, income, tax liability, and credits.
Learners will understand how to complete each step of the W-4 form, including considerations for multiple jobs, spouses working, dependents, and other adjustments. We will walk through common scenarios to illustrate how different life and financial situations affect withholding recommendations.
The course will explain the IRS Tax Withholding Estimator and how it can be used to align withholding with actual tax liability, especially after changes in income, family size, or deductions.
We will also discuss strategies for adjusting withholding mid-year, how to avoid underpayment penalties, and how to reconcile withheld tax with total tax liability when filing a return.
Learners will gain the confidence to analyze a pay stub, use a tax formula to estimate annual tax, and properly complete or revise a W-4 to reflect their specific situation.
target_audience: Anybody who wants to Learn about Taxes
Accounting Students, Tax Professionals, Enrolled Agents & CPA's

courses.bio: Immobilier et fiscalité
objectives: Comprendre l’opportunité d’investir à bas prix

requirements: Aucun
courses.description:
Pourquoi investir dans des biens abordables ? Moins de dépendance au crédit, une plus grande accessibilité et des rendements potentiels intéressants.
L’immobilier comme levier de création de richesse : Même avec un petit budget, l’immobilier peut générer un flux de revenus passifs à long terme si l’investissement est bien ciblé.
Les défis à anticiper : Les risques liés à des biens nécessitant des travaux ou à des marchés locaux plus volatils. Nécessité de bien analyser les zones et le potentiel locatif.
Critères pour choisir la ville : Rechercher des zones avec un faible prix au m² et une forte demande locative. Cibler des villes de taille moyenne ou des zones périurbaines près de grandes agglomérations ou de centres universitaires.
Exemples de régions prometteuses : Certaines villes en Hauts-de-France, en Normandie, dans le Massif Central, ou dans des zones moins explorées du Sud-Ouest peuvent offrir des opportunités.
Utiliser les outils de recherche : Exploiter les plateformes immobilières, les études de marché locales, les rapports d’INSEE, et consulter les agents immobiliers spécialisés pour évaluer les zones en forte demande.


Contenu : Stratégies immobilières, Pinel, Malraux, déficit foncier.
Outils recommandés :
MeilleursAgents (pour analyser les prix du marché immobilier),
SeLoger (plateforme pour trouver des biens immobiliers rentables).
Les Bases de la Défiscalisation
Contenu : Introduction aux principes de la défiscalisation, types d’impôts et mécanismes de réduction fiscale.
Outils recommandés :

courses.description:
I am an Enrolled Agent with the IRS and I have been preparing client tax returns, both personal and corporate, for many years. As a tax professional, I see the turmoil that taxes cause most people and I want to correct that course, so you can have a positive experience when working with your taxes and a tax professional. No MORE crying in taxes!
I have done workshops through Los Angeles, including IATSE (The Editors Guild), SAG-AFTRA, The Actors Fund, CCI and more, on tax laws and tax preparation and I am bringing that expertise to you here!
You will get all the information and more that I have shared over the years that has helped ease the tax preparation process for many and to demystify your unique tax situation.
Why take this course:
Get the monkey off your back!
Yes taxes are stressful for everyone, but let's demystify them so you can understand what is going on.
Taking responsibility for your taxes will alleviate the constant worry that is weighing you down!
Once you take control of your taxes, your money will be able to flow easier to you.
You need to show you can handle your money to receive more money
By taking responsibility you are saying to the universe “I know how to respectively treat my money, I am ready for more money to flow in”
Everyone pays taxes! Know the ins and outs of your income and taxes, so your life and your tax prep are less stressful, time saving and MONEY saving!
What is an Enrolled Agent?
IRS Definition of Enrolled Agent: An enrolled agent is a person who has earned the privilege of representing taxpayers before the Internal Revenue Service by either passing a three-part comprehensive IRS test covering individual and business tax returns, or through experience as a former IRS employee. I received my credentials through the IRS. In the eyes of the IRS, I am on the same lines as a CPA, Tax Attorney where I can represent clients in front of the IRS but what sets me apart is I am strictly educated in taxes.
***A CPA is regulated on the state level and the EA is regulated on the federal level***


This course if for Educational purposes only. It is not legal or tax advice.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to know more about their tax situation, while also saving time, money and their sanity.

courses.description:
O Lucro Presumido é um dos principais regimes tributários que existem atualmente no Brasil.
Toda empresa, precisa escolher um regime tributário, no qual, será a forma como pagará todos os seus tributos durante todo o ano calendário.


É muito importante para empresas, escolherem o regime tributário correto, pois uma escolha errada pode resultar, em tributos pagos a maior durante todo o ano calendário, ou seja, a empresa pode acabar oferecendo uma vantagem para os seus concorrentes, que com a escolha correta, podem trabalhar com margens melhores e praticarem preços mais agressivos.


É muito importante para empresas que optaram pelo Lucro Presumido entenderem perfeitamente como funciona a sua tributação nesse regime tributário, pois em caso contrário podem estar recolhendo tributos a maior e essas situações também serão abordadas nesse curso.


O desconhecimento, também pode levar empresas a recolherem, tributos a menor do que deveriam e isso pode resultar em várias penalidades, assim como o recolhimento desses tributos com multas e juros.


Portanto é muito importante para profissionais que desejam atuar na área tributária, na área contábil ou em planejamentos estratégicos para empresas, sendo eles estudantes de direito, contabilidade, administração, economia, dentre outras áreas de atuação entenderem como funciona o regime tributário Lucro Presumido.


Esse curso tem como intuito abordar todos os níveis, desde iniciantes e estudantes com interesse pela área fiscal/tributária e desejam adquirir mais conhecimentos, até profissionais que já atuam na área e desejam aprofundar os seus conhecimentos.
target_audience: Profissionais que já atuam na área fiscal/tributária
Estudantes que tenham interesse na área tributária/fiscal

Daniel van Tonder really is the Head of Taxation at FinSolve Accounting and Taxation – situated in Durbanville Cape Town.He completed his B- Compt degree in Financial Accounting while, still busy with his articles at Diemont, Zimmerman & Bolink Auditors in Polokwane, which is fairly significant.
