courses.title: GST Returns Filing, ITC and Reconciliation- CA Chahak Bahal
courses.bio: Master the Art of Seamless GST Compliance & GST Return Filing: Learn to File GST Returns with GST Expert CA Chahak Bahal
objectives: Understand the GST Return Filing Process
Master Different Types of GST Returns
Handle ITC Mismatches and Reconciliation
Expert Advisory on GST Compliance

GST Return Filing Basics: GSTR-2A & GSTR-2B - Statement of Inward Supplies
ITC Reconciliation using Tally and Excel
GSTR 1 Offline Filing and Job Work ITC-04
Mismatch in ITC and Seamless flow of ITC
GST Portal Navigation and Special Return: Special Returns - GSTR-5, GSTR-6, GSTR-7, and GSTR-8
Annual Returns and Advisory: Advisory on Mismatch between GSTR-1 and GSTR-3B
Reconciliation Statement - GSTR-9C and Annual Return - GSTR-4

requirements: Basic Knowledge of Goods and Services Tax (GST)
Familiarity with Accounting and Taxation Terminology
Willingness to Learn and Stay Updated
courses.description:
Welcome to our comprehensive course on GST Return Filing, Input Tax Credit (ITC), and Reconciliation. This practical and informative course is designed to equip you with the necessary skills to efficiently manage Goods and Services Tax (GST) compliance and ensure a seamless flow of ITC. As a GST taxpayer, understanding the intricacies of various GST Returns is crucial. In this course, we will guide you through each step of the return filing process, starting with an in-depth analysis of the Statement of Outward Supplies (GSTR-1) and Statement of Inward Supplies (GSTR-2A & GSTR-2B). You will learn how to navigate the GST portal and avoid common errors to prevent mismatches in ITC in GST.


Furthermore, we will explore special returns like GSTR-5, GSTR-6, GSTR-7, and GSTR-8, providing you with practical insights on how to handle unique scenarios. You will also gain a comprehensive understanding of filing returns under the Composition Scheme, ensuring compliance for businesses availing this option.


The course will include a dedicated lecture on GSTR-3B, where we will focus on the payment of tax and the critical aspects that taxpayers need to be aware of. Additionally, learners will get the advisory on Mismatch between GSTR-1 and GSTR-3B to avoid potential discrepancies. Understanding the Annual Return (GSTR-9 & GSTR-9C ) is essential for all taxpayers, and we will walk you through its preparation and filing requirements. Moreover, we will cover the concept of the Final Return, ensuring you know the necessary steps to conclude your GST Return File obligations effectively.


To ensure accuracy and adherence to GST regulations, we will delve into the Reconciliation Statement (GSTR-9C) and the Annual Return (GSTR-4). These aspects play a vital role in providing a clear picture of your business's financial activities and tax liabilities.


Our instructor, CA Chahak Bahal, is an exceptional educator with remarkable expertise in finance, accounting and taxation. Throughout the course, you will have access to practical examples and expert tips, enabling you to apply your knowledge to real-world scenarios effectively. Whether you are a business owner, tax professional, accountant, or someone interested in mastering GST compliance, this course offers valuable insights and practical guidance. Join us now to take your understanding of GST Return Filing, ITC, and Reconciliation to the next level. Enroll today and embark on a journey to elevate your GST and GST Returns knowledge and ensure smooth tax compliance.
target_audience: The course is designed for individuals who want to gain a comprehensive understanding of the Goods and Services Tax (GST) return filing process in India

courses.title: IVA (Modelos 303 y 390)
courses.bio: Aprende a completarlos correctamente
objectives: Funcionamiento del impuesto.
Quienes deben presentar el impuesto.

requirements: No se necesitan conocimientos previos de contabilidad.
Debes poder usar un PC a nivel básico.
courses.description:
En este curso aprenderemos qué es el IVA, cómo funciona y la presentación trimestral y anual del impuesto.
El curso va dirigido a todos aquellos que estén interesados en ampliar su formación a la hora de preparar y presentar impuestos.
A lo largo del curso, a través de diversas casuísticas reales, el alumno aprenderá de manera eficaz, la cumplimentación y presentación de los modelos oficiales de IVA.
Una vez finalizado el curso, el alumno será capaz completar y presentar los Modelos 303 y 390, encargados de los pagos fraccionados y resumen anual del IVA respectivamente.
Si quieres conocer a detalle todo lo que aprenderás:
- Comenzamos con los objetivos a desarrollar en el curso
- Introducción al impuesto (teoría)
Qué es el IVA y como funciona
Quién debe presentarlo
Tipos de IVA
IVA intracomunitario


- Modelos 303 y 390 - I
1ºT IVA a ingresar
2ºT IVA a compensar
3ºT IVA a compensar
4º T IVA a ingresar
Resumen anual (Mod-390)


- Modelos 303 y 390 - II
1ºT IVA de ventas intracomunitario sin alta en ROI
2ºT IVA de compras intracomunitario sin alta en ROI
3ºT IVA de ventas intracomunitario con alta en ROI
4º T IVA de compras intracomunitario con alta en ROI
Resumen anual (Mod-390) + IVA intracomunitario


- Modelos 303 y 390 - III
1ºT IVA con y sin alta en ROI
2ºT IVA con y sin alta en ROI
3ºT IVA con y sin alta en ROI
4º T IVA con y sin alta en ROII
Resumen anual (Mod-390) + IVA intracomunitario


- Modelos 303 y 390 - IV
1ºT IVA intracomunitario (compras/gastos - ventas/ingresos - prestaciones de servicios)
2ºT IVA intracomunitario  (compras/gastos - ventas/ingresos - prestaciones de servicios)
3ºT IVA intracomunitario (compras/gastos - ventas/ingresos - prestaciones de servicios)
4º T IVA intracomunitario  (compras/gastos - ventas/ingresos - prestaciones de servicios)
Resumen anual (Mod-390) + IVA intracomunitario


Modelos 303 y 390 - V (nuevo Modelo 303 2024)
1ºT IVA peninsular + intracomunitario + exportaciones
2ºT IVA peninsular + intracomunitario + exportaciones
3ºT IVA peninsular + intracomunitario + exportaciones
4º T IVA peninsular + intracomunitario + exportaciones
Resumen anual (Mod-390) + IVA intracomunitario + operaciones extracomunitarias


Mod-303 y 390 - VI
1ºT IVA peninsular + intracomunitario + exportaciones + importaciones
2ºT IVA peninsular + intracomunitario + exportaciones + importaciones
3ºT IVA peninsular + intracomunitario + exportaciones + importaciones
4º T IVA peninsular + intracomunitario + exportaciones + importaciones
Resumen anual (Mod-390) + IVA intracomunitario + operaciones extracomunitarias
target_audience: Estudiantes de contabilidad que deseen ampliar conocimientos.

courses.title: Compromise and Deferment of Arrears Taxes
courses.bio: Need to know how to approach SARS for appeals or objections?
objectives: Penalties and Disputes
Compromises
Deferments
Waivers of Interest and Penalties
Who qualifies for a payment compromise
South African Tax
requirements: Little to no experience needed
Please note that this course relates to South African tax only
courses.description:
*Please note that this course is based on South African Tax*


Do you know how to approach SARS, to enter into an agreement for a tax reduction or writing off of outstanding taxes?

Do you know that installment payments can be arranged with SARS for long overdue taxes?

Have you failed to submit returns in time, and need to lodge a Notice of Objection or Appeal?

Join our discussion on the Compromise and Deferment of Arrears Taxes to explore practical strategies for reducing or delaying tax liabilities.
Learn about eligibility, application processes, and key considerations for managing tax debt effectively.

Topics Discussed:
Current income tax legislation regarding interest and penalties
Disputing an invalid assessment raised
Who qualifies for a payment compromise and how does one apply
Applying for a payment arrangement – the process and the criteria to be met
Legislation surrounding and practical application of applying for a waiver of Interest and Penalties

requirements: Querer aprender algo de novo
courses.description:
Oi pessoal, tudo bem?
Este curso é um pouco diferente dos outros cursos meus na plataforma da Udemy. Neste curso irei abordar um tema super novo, iniciando ainda pela fase inicial que compreende a aprovação na Câmara dos Deputados e Senado Federal.
O intuito do curso é desenvolver a tese inicial, criada pelos deputados federal e acompanhar todas as etapas a chegar aos cálculos propriamente ditos.
O curso abordará um modelo inédito no Brasil, mas que já está em vigor em mais de 170 países. Nele abordaremos quais os tributos federais que serão unificados pela CBS – Contribuição sobre Bens e Serviços e quais os tributos estaduais e municipais serão unificados pela IBS – Imposto sobre Bens e Serviços.
Abordaremos a parte principal da reforma tributária, que é o IVA – Imposto sobre Valor Adicionado, que será um dos maiores do mundo.
Também abordaremos a mudança na forma de cálculo, para isso utilizaremos como exemplo alguns setores da economia.
Utilizaremos no curso a abordagem do governo, que afirma que o Brasil irá crescer e também abordagem de alguns setores da nossa sociedade que afirmam que será mais um meio de aumento na carga tributária.
Esse curso é um curso destinado a quem quer entender mais sobre este importante tema, não tratará de setores e cálculos específicos, mas de forma geral.
Se o teu objetivo é entender como funcionará a reforma tributária em linhas gerais, este curso é para você.


Venha comigo em mais um importante curso, agora destinado a Reforma Tributária...


Venha comigo


Professor João Rafael
target_audience: Qualquer um com vontade de aprender algo de novo

courses.title: Praktik Perpajakan untuk Orang Pribadi
courses.bio: Penjelasan Lengkap Mengenai Cara Menghitung, Membayar, dan Melaporkan Pajak di Indonesia
requirements: Tidak perlu pengetahuan mengenai perpajakan sebelumnya, Sobat akan belajar dari awal
courses.description:
Belajar bagaimana cara untuk menghitung, membayar, dan melaporkan pajak bagi orang pribadi di Indonesia. Materi akan terbagi menjadi 4 sesi yang dapat menjadi bekal praktis untuk memenuhi kewajiban perpajakan kalian. Kelima topik tersebut adalah pengenalan mengenai sistem perpajakan di Indonesia, proses administratif yang diperlukan untuk membuat NPWP wajib pajak, pengenalan platform perpajakan di Indonesia, pengisian Surat Pemberitahuan (SPT) Tahunan, hingga alur cara pembayaran dan pelaporan pajak.

Pemateri akan mengenalkan sistem perpajakan yang ada di Indonesia. Hal ini meliputi apa saja kriteria dan kondisi yang membuat masyarakat wajib untuk membayar pajaknya. Intruktor juga menjelaskan mengenai proses administratif yang dilalui ketika menjadi wajib pajak. Proses ini akan menjelaskan mengenai alur, data yang dibutuhkan, dan apa saja yang dibutuhkan untuk menyelesaikan seluruh proses administrasi perpajakan.


Pada materi Efin, Instruktor akan menjelaskan mengenai bagaimana cara mendapatkan Efin. EFIN (Electronic Filing Identification Number) sendiri adalah nomor identitas yang diterbitkan oleh Direktorat Jenderal Pajak (Ditjen Pajak) kepada Wajib Pajak yang melakukan transaksi elektronik dengan Ditjen Pajak. Dengan adanya Efin, Wajib pajak dapat melakukan berbagai layanan perpajakan yang telah tersedia di situs perpajakan resmi untuk memenuhi kewajiban perpajakan Wajib Pajak.


Peserta akan dibekali cara untuk mengisi Surat Pemberitahuan (SPT) Tahunan. SPT Tahunan merupakan salah satu bentuk kewajiban Wajib Pajak yang harus dipenuhi setiap tahunnya. Peserta akan diperkenalkan dengan beberapa cara untuk menyampaikan SPT Tahunan seperti, e-Form dan e-Filling.


Sebagai penutup, Peserta akan dibekali cara untuk membayarkan pajak dan melaporkan pajak. Pembayaran akan meliputi penggunaan e-billing dan cara untuk mentransfer pembayaran melalui bank.
target_audience: Warga negara yang sudah memiliki penghasilan namun belum mengetahui bagaima cara membayarkan pajak mereka

courses.title: Créditos de PIS e COFINS - Estudo completo
courses.bio: Estudo completo sobre os créditos de PIS e COFINS

Introdução: Introdução aos créditos de PIS e COFINS
Alguns insumos que dão direito aos créditos
Mais sobre créditos de PIS e COFINS
Créditos sobre mão de obra terceirizada
Crédito presumido sobre estoque de abertura
Créditos sobre combustível, mão de obra, energia elétrica
Comentários sobre PIS e COFINS no L.R

requirements: Conhecimento básico em tributação
courses.description:
Olá, eu sou o professor Marteson Castelo Branco e você é meu convidado para aprender de verdade sobre os créditos de PIS e COFINS nesse curso online. O curso é gratuito e eu apresento um estudo completo sobre o assunto. A importância de entender sobre os créditos é que o domínio correto sobre o assunto pdoe fazer a empresa reduzir sua carga tributária.


Qual a vantagem de fazer esse curso online?
- Você aprender o conceito de insumo para fins de créditos de PIS e COFINS.
- Você vai entender o conceito de Insumos por imposição legal.
- Vamos aprender sobre os créditos sobre mão de obra terceirizada.
- Estudaremos sobre os crédito presumido sobre estoque de abertura.
- Aprenderemos sobre os créditos sobre combustível, mão de obra, energia elétrica.
- Vai aprender como fazer o cálculo da apuração dos débitos e dos créditos no lucro real.


Algumas perguntas e respostas básicas:
- O curso tem certificado?
R: Sim. Você poderá baixar o certificado.
- Tem materiais para baixar?
R: Sim. Alguns materiais como slides serão colocados a disposição baixar e ajudar nos seus estudos.
- Posso acessar por quanto tempo?
R: O acesso ao curso é vitalício.
Aconselho que coloque o curso no seu currículo, Linkedin e outras plataformas profissionais.

courses.description:
Desde mas de 10 años atrás se ha incentivado el uso de la plataforma de AFPNET el cual es obligatorio para todo empleador que tenga desde un trabajador , cabe recordar que esta plataforma es totalmente gratuita y que el uso es fácil y sencillo.


Esta plataforma sirve para las AFP vigentes al día de hoy en nuestro sistema tributario Nacional, para iniciar al uso es necesario que tengas o dispongas de un usuario y contraseña el cual por causas del covid y la adaptabilidad informatica que muchas empresas y entes se han visto en la necesidad de implementear  se ha creado una opción para enviar y validar los documentos via online.


La plataforma ha cambiado totalmente y nuestro curso también ha implementado las nuevas opciones y modalidades generadas .


En este curso vamos a revisar muchos casos prácticos que te invito a ver a continuación en nuestro contenido


- Creación de Usuarios
- Envio y Validación de Datos
- Creación de Usuarios
- Inscripción de Personal
- Baja de Personal
- Declaración Mensual
- Anulación de Planillas


Iremos paso a paso y con ejemplos reales para reforzar la practica y manejo de este sistema , por eso te invito a que siempre te des una vuelta por aqui para que puedas ver las actualizaciones

courses.title: Unternehmenssteuer: Lernen Sie die Ansätze kennen
courses.bio: Betriebsaufgabe sowie Betriebsvermögensvergleich (komplett kostenlos) kennenlernen
requirements: Dieser komplett kostenlose Kurs ist komplett für Anfänger geeignet.
courses.description:
Komplett kostenlos lernen Sie hier zwei wichtige Grundlagen im Bereich der Unternehmensteuer:


Es werden Ihnen hier Grundidee und einen kurzen aber signifikanten Teil meiner kostenpflichtigen Kurse vorgestellt. Diese Thematiken sind hochrelevant in dem Bereich der Besteuerung von Gewerbe usw.


Es handelt sich hier um folgende Teile:


Der Betriebsvermögensvergleich ist ein Instrument der Steuerbilanzierung und wird für die Ermittlung des steuerlichen Gewinns eines Unternehmens verwendet. Dabei werden die Vermögenswerte und Verbindlichkeiten des Unternehmens am Ende des Wirtschaftsjahres erfasst und mit den entsprechenden Werten des Vorjahres verglichen. Dabei werden auch Abschreibungen und Wertveränderungen berücksichtigt. Der Betriebsvermögensvergleich stellt somit eine wichtige Grundlage für die Ermittlung der Steuerzahlungen eines Unternehmens dar.


Bei einer Betriebsveräußerung fällt in der Regel ein Veräußerungsgewinn an, der besteuert werden muss. Dabei ist die Höhe der Besteuerung abhängig von verschiedenen Faktoren, wie beispielsweise der Dauer der Betriebszugehörigkeit des Veräußerers oder der Art des Betriebs. Für bestimmte Betriebe gibt es zudem Sonderregelungen, die eine begünstigte Besteuerung ermöglichen. Um eine optimale Steuerstrategie zu entwickeln und die Besteuerung zu minimieren, sollte die Betriebsveräußerung frühzeitig geplant und die steuerlichen Auswirkungen sorgfältig geprüft werden.


Diese beiden Themen werden unsere Grundidee für die kompletten Steuerrecht Masterkurse sein.


Ich freue mich enorm Sie bald in den anderen Steuerrecht Masterkursen zu begrüßen.


Ihr
Nico Molitor


PS: Dieser Kurs beinhaltet keine individuelle Steuerberatung. Ein individuelle Steuerberatung kann nur ein Steuerberater mit einem abgeschlossen Examen durchführen. Hier lernen Sie nur, wie etwas funktioniert, sodass Sie eigene Schlüsse aus dem Kurs ziehen müssen. Steuerberatung ist eine individuelle Leistung, sodass nur ein Steuerberater Ihnen genau Auskunft in Ihren speziellen Fall geben kann. Bitte prüfen Sie den Inhalt auf Aktualität und Richtigkeit. Ich übernehme keine Haftung für etwaige Fehler, die jeden mal passieren können. Dieser Kurs dient nur der Wissensübermittlung.
target_audience: Menschen, die das deutsche Steuerrecht verstehen wollen
Menschen, die gerne Steuern sowie Anwaltskosten sparen wollen
Menschen, die verstehen wollen wie Sie die Gewerbesteuer usw. trifft

Comp 19 Partnership Comprehensive Problem Part 19 Sch K-1
Comp 20 Partnership Comprehensive Problem Part 20 Diagnostics & Review
Comp 20 Partnership Comprehensive Problem Part 20 Diagnostics & Review

requirements: None
courses.description:
This course currently consists of a comprehensive problem showing the data input process of a Partnership into tax Form 1065.
This course will put together a systematic format of entering data into a Form 1065 that will minimize errors, isolate problems as they happen, and remove the possibility of having to start the process all over again.
We will enter each M-1 adjustment individually into both the tax return and an Excel worksheet so that we fully understand how they work.
We will start by reviewing the data for the comprehensive problem.
Then we will enter the data into an Excel worksheet that will be used to help us organize the information.
We will be using Lacerte Tax software to enter the tax data into Form 1065. However, we will also provide PDF files of the tax forms so learners can enter the data directly into the tax forms as we go. The tax forms can also be found on the IRS website.
The course will demonstrate how to enter the data into the tax forms in stages to reduce potential mistakes and to identify mistakes as they happen so they can be fixed as easily as possible.
We will start the data input with the balance sheet.
Then we will enter the income statement as it is formatted in the adjusted trial balance.
Next, we will systematically go through Schedule K and M-1 adjustments. We will isolate these adjustments, reviewing them on the tax forms, in the software, and using our Excel worksheet.
We will then review the tax forms.
Next, we will review the Form K-1s and basic calculations.
The course will demonstrate the exporting of the K-1 Form to the individual Form 1040 for an owner of the Partnership, showing the flow through process.
target_audience: Business owners considering a Partnership form of business entity

courses.title: 2025-26 Enrolled Agent Part-2 Businesses(1st Half) Questions
courses.bio: 2025 - 26 Enrolled Agent (EA) Question Bank: Part-2 Businesses (1st Half)
courses.description:
The 2025 - 26 Enrolled Agent (EA) Exam Question Bank Course for Part-2: Businesses (1st Half) is designed to provide comprehensive preparation for aspiring Enrolled Agents who aim to excel in their EA exams. This question bank focuses on critical business-related tax topics, which form a significant portion of the Enrolled Agent Exam Part 2. With a total of 550 carefully crafted multiple-choice questions (MCQs), each supported by detailed explanations, this course offers in-depth knowledge and practice that enables students to master the key areas tested in the exam.
This question bank covers five major topics essential for the EA Exam:
Business Entities, Accounting Periods, and Methods (126 Questions) – Dive into the various types of business structures, accounting periods, and methods crucial for understanding tax obligations and strategies. This section helps build foundational knowledge for accurately advising businesses.
Business Income and Expenses (138 Questions) – Learn the ins and outs of income recognition, deductible expenses, and business expense classifications. This section provides comprehensive coverage of reporting income and allowable deductions, vital for accurate tax preparation.
Employee Compensation, Benefits, and Business Deductions (125 Questions) – Explore the rules around employee wages, benefits, and other business deductions, covering everything from health benefits to retirement plans. This topic ensures you understand the treatment of compensation and associated deductions under IRS regulations.
Asset Basis, Depreciation, and Amortization Essentials (96 Questions) – This section clarifies asset basis, cost recovery, and amortization. It’s a must-study for anyone looking to handle business asset management and understand depreciation schedules, an area heavily tested on the EA exam.
Business Asset Disposition (65 Questions) – Gain insight into the treatment of gains, losses, and dispositions of business assets, ensuring you can advise on end-of-life asset management strategies.
Each practice test requires an 80% passing score, allowing you to assess your understanding and readiness for the real exam. The explanations provided with each answer offer valuable insights into why a particular option is correct, reinforcing key concepts and improving retention.
This course is designed not only as a preparation tool but also as a way to boost confidence and knowledge in business taxation. Whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned professional seeking to solidify your expertise, this question bank will serve as a crucial resource on your path to becoming a licensed Enrolled Agent.
target_audience: This course is designed for aspiring Enrolled Agents (EAs) and tax professionals preparing for the Enrolled Agent Exam, specifically Part 2: Businesses. It’s ideal for individuals who want a structured, practice-focused approach to mastering business-related tax topics and are looking to gain confidence in handling complex business tax scenarios. This course will be valuable to: New tax professionals seeking a deeper understanding of IRS regulations and tax strategies for businesses. Current EAs and accountants who want to strengthen their knowledge in specific areas of business tax to improve their client service. Students or career changers aiming to enter the tax field and obtain EA certification to expand their career opportunities. Business owners or entrepreneurs who want insights into tax-related matters affecting their businesses and seek a more comprehensive understanding of tax compliance and planning. The course content is structured to ensure a focused learning experience with practice tests, detailed explanations, and an 80% passing score requirement to simulate real exam conditions. Whether you’re just beginning your tax career or are a seasoned professional, this course will deepen your business tax knowledge and prepare you for the EA exam.

requirements: We should be familiar with QuickBooks and or accounting.
courses.description:
Use QuickBooks to track personal tax item as well as business expenses easily, so that we have more of our year-end tax preparation materials in one place that is well organized.
Tracking personal tax-related items in a business QuickBooks account is actually a highly controversial topic in the world of accounting and bookkeeping, the conventional wisdom being that we should separate any personal items from the business files as much as possible, whether they be tax related or not.
Many small businesses use QuickBooks primarily to help with year-end tax documentation needs, however, and a system that can achieve more of these needs in one place will be worth the time to learn.
Professional bookkeepers can use these methods to help differentiate themselves from the competition by providing more service that client will greatly appreciate for minimal extra effort once the system is set up.
We will provide two methods for tracking personal tax items in our business QuickBooks file and let you decide if either of these methods will work well for your needs.
One method will work with equity draws accounts and the other method will utilize QuickBooks classes to track personal tax-related items in the business QuickBooks file.
Both methods have their pros and cons and the choice between the two will come down to the individual needs and preferences of the business and bookkeeper.
QuickBooks does a great job of tracking business expenses which we can also think of a business-related deductions, deductions a sole proprietor would report on a schedule C.
There are many other personal deductions a business owner may want to track as they are paid, however. For example, a business owner may want a system for tracking charitable payments, medical payments, child care payments, college costs payments, retirement plan payments, and state tax payments.
QuickBooks can help to track these personal payments as well as business payments, and we will provide methods for doing so.
target_audience: Business owner who want a method for tracking personal tax related items using QuickBooks Desktop Pro 2019
Bookkeepers who want a system to provide more to their clients using QuickBooks Pro Desktop 2019
Accounting students who want to apply concepts to accounting applications like QuickBooks Desktop Pro 2019

requirements: 具备基本的财税知识
courses.description:
2024年财政部和国家税务总局都出台哪些税收政策？这些税收政策对企业营运影响如何？应该如何应对才能最大限度降低企业税务风险，并提高税务效益?


与2023年度相比，2024年出台的新税收政策并不多，但“减税降费”依然是不变的主旋律。
1. 增值税和进出口税收新政策


2024年增值税方面最重要的税收政策当属《中华人民共和国增值税法》正式颁布，自2026年1月1日起施行。“这不仅标志着增值税制度在“而立之年”正式迈入法治化新阶段，也是我国税收法治建设的重要里程碑”。


在进出口税收方面，自横琴粤澳深度合作区2024年3月1日封关运行开始，内地出口横琴视同出口退税货物范围扩大，横琴合作区内主体进口自用的机器、设备等免征进口关税、进口环节增值税和消费税。对横琴合作区内企业生产的含进口料件在合作区加工增值达到或超过30%的货物，经“二线”进入内地免征进口关税，按规定征收进口环节增值税和消费税。


在中国（上海）自由贸易试验区（含临港新片区）的海关特殊监管区域内，对企业自2024年6月27日起自境外暂时准许进入试点区域进行修理的货物实施保税，复运出境的免征关税、进口环节增值税和消费税。


在进出口税收政策方面还扩大启运港退税政策实施范围。
此外，针对2023年度出台的一系列增值税加计抵减优惠政策，2024年配套出台文件进一步明确享受增值税加计抵减的先进制造业企业、集成电路企业和工业母机企业各自需满足的条件以及清单制定审核流程。
最后，自2024年12月1日起在全国正式推广应用数电发票，是税收征管数字化转型的重要里程碑。以上是2024年在增值税和进出口税收方面出台的重要新税收政策。


2、企业所得税


2024年度新出台的企业所得税优惠政策并不多，因为2023年度出台的企业所得税优惠政策，除研发费用加计100%扣除作为制度性安排外，其他优惠政策，如集成电路和工业母机企业研发费用加计120%扣除、新购进单位价值不超过500万元的设备器具一次性扣除和小微企业所得税实际有效税率5%等优惠政策都执行到2027年12月31日。


2024年度新出台的最主要的企业所得税优惠政策是专用设备数字化智能化改造企业所得税优惠政策。在2024年1月1日至2027年12月31日期间发生的节能节水、环境保护和安全生产专用设备数字化、智能化改造投入，不超过该专用设备购置时原计税基础50%的部分，可按照10%比例抵免企业当年应纳税额。


此外，针对2023年及以前年度出台的集成电路企业、软件企业和工业母机企业企业所得税优惠政策特别是研发费用加计扣除政策，2024年配套出台文件进一步明确享受企业所得税优惠政策的集成电路企业、软件企业和工业母机企业各自需满足的条件以及清单制定审核流程。


3、个人所得税


2024年度新出台的个人所得税优惠政策也不多，因为2023年度出台的个人所得税优惠政策，除提高个人所得税有关专项附加扣除标准作为制度性安排外，其他的个人所得税优惠政策，如全年一次性奖金单独计税、上市公司股权激励单独计税、粤港澳大湾区境外人才税负差额补贴免税、创业投资企业个人合伙人所得税可以选择按单一投资基金核算或者按创投企业年度所得整体核算两种方式之一等优惠政策均执行到2027年12月31日。


2024年新出台的个人所得税优惠政策主要有两个，一个政策是境内上市公司股权激励个人所得税递延36个月缴纳，这个政策执行到2027年12月31日，另一个政策是在全国范围内推广实施个人养老金个人所得税优惠政策。


4、其他税种新政策


2023年度出台企业改制重组有关土地增值税和契税优惠政策，2024年将原来支持企业改制的印花税政策的适用范围，适当扩大至企业改制、重组、破产清算以及事业单位改制，与其他税收政策形成合力，加大对改制重组的政策支持力度。这些政策均执行至2027年12月31日。


2024年为促进房地产市场平稳发展，三部门联合出台政策优化住房交易契税政策，明确与取消普通住宅和非普通住宅标准相衔接的增值税、土地增值税优惠政策。


此外，自2024年12月1日起全面实施水资源费改税试点，最终实现水资源费改税在全国范围内的全面改革完成。


以上是对2024年度出台的主要税收政策的大体回顾。我们将在课程中分析2024年度中国新出台的增值税、企业所得税、个人所得税以及其他税收政策要点及其对企业营运的影响，帮助大家了解2024年度新税收政策的出台背景、历史演变和政策目标，并通过案例分享帮助大家更好掌握新税收政策的要点，加深对新税收政策影响营运的理解，同时也初步探讨如何利用新税收政策作税务筹划，提高企业税务效益。
target_audience: 对中国财税政策感兴趣的学员

courses.title: IRS Form 2553 "S" Corporation Election
courses.bio: Learn everything you need to know about filing Form 2553 including late election relief
objectives: What are the benefits and drawbacks of an "S" Corporation structure?
How to file the S corporation election?
If I file the election late, what are my options under the late election relief procedures?

Course Materials: What Entities are Eligible for an S Corporation Election
Tax Advantages & Disadvantages of an S Corporation
Late Election Relief Under Revenue Procedure 2013-30
S Corporation Confirmation from the IRS
Annual Reporting Obligations for an S Corporation

requirements: Basic understanding of federal tax rules
courses.description:
The S corporation election is a popular entity tax classification in the United States.  One of the greatest misconceptions about the S corporation is that it is a legal entity formed under State Law.  This is not true.  The S corporation is a federal tax election only and is not a legal entity type.

Many entrepreneurs choose the S election classification because it helps reduce their federal self-employment taxes.  In this guide, we want to cover the most popular aspects of the S corporation election and what it means to operate an S corporation.
We will cover the following topics within this guide:
1. What is an "S" corporation under federal tax law.
2. What entities are eligible to make the S corporation election.
3. What are the ownership restrictions and operating limitations once you make the S corporation election.
4. What are the primary tax advantages and disadvantages of making the S corporation election.
5. How to complete the IRS Form 2553 election form.
6. What do you need to file when the S corporation is late.
7. What are the annual reporting requirements for my S corporation once the election is approved by the IRS.
Once you have completed this guide and reviewed the materials, you should have a better understanding of the S corporation election and how to file the election with the IRS.
target_audience: New business owners with an LLC or Corporation

courses.title: Value Added Tax (VAT) - Implementation in Saudi Arabia/ Gulf
courses.bio: General Concepts, Operations, Implementation and Accounting of VAT
objectives: Learn Concept and Principles of VAT
Know its implication in Saudi Arabia and gulf
What is subject to standard rate, zero rate or exempt.
How to handle Export and Imports
How to do VAT Accounting for VAT Payable/ Receivable/ Neutral
How to handle discounts and adjustments
How to fill a VAT Return
requirements: Degree or Diploma in Accounting/ Tax
courses.description:
Tax Accountant are in high demand now in the Gulf as GCC is implementing VAT. This course helps the Accountants and the stakeholders to understand VAT Concepts and Operations and it provide guidance on VAT Accounting.
Value Added Tax is already implemented in most parts of the world and now it is Gulf's turn. So, in Gulf pre-implementation work has been completed and from January 01, 2018 all the registered business have started charging VAT on supplies of Goods and Services with in Saudi Arabia.
As the member states in GCC are negotiating to treat GCC on Single Territory Concept, the concept and rules are same in all states with minor exceptions hence this course will help prepare all the accountants and administrators in the Gulf for this implementation process.
After this course they will be equipped to respond to this implementation challenge and will lead their organization in the whole process as well as train their team to get best output and achieve organizational goals.
target_audience: This course is for Accountants, Consultants and Administrators who manage VAT or going to manage it soon.

courses.title: Personal Income Tax in Canada
courses.bio: Good Stuff to Know
objectives: save money when you file your personal tax return
ask the right questions of your financial advisor
requirements: All materials are included and no prior knowledge is neccessary to complete the course
You should have a program capable of opening PowerPoint Presentations
You should have a program installed on your computer that can open PDF files
courses.description:
If you would like to know more about the Canadian income tax system this is the course for you. You will learn about deducting expenses, claiming income and the receipts that you need. There are a few tips – to help you save when you file your personal return. This information is not intended to replace the professional advice that your accountant will provide – merely to give you the knowledge you need to ask the right questions.

What is Covered in Each Lecture?

Tax System – When are your personal tax returns due? What receipts should you have and how long should you keep them?

Types of Taxable Income – Employment, pension, rental and investment income is discussed.

Employment Income - Learn about tips, T4’s, and the type of expenses that can be claimed if you get a T2200 from your employer.

Investment Income – This lecture covers interest, dividends and capital gains.

Pension Income – This lecture is about OAS, CPP and considerations about when you should apply for them. Also a discussion of RRSP and RRIF’s.

Rental Income – The forms you need to fill out if you are renting part of your house or another property. Discussion around the taxation of the sale of a cottage.

Medical Expenses – Medical expenses are subject to a limitation based on your income. Discussion of strategy to maximize the medical expense credit.

Other Credits – This lecture is about claiming dependants, a discussion about common law status, claiming tuition credits and the fitness and arts credit.

Moving Expenses – When can you claim moving expenses? A discussion on receipts and carrying forward expenses.

Tips – How to claim medical expenses and charitable donations in a family? Benefits of pension splitting and transferring tuition.
target_audience: This course is for individuals who would like to know more about the Canadian income tax system

This course is designed to give you a thorough understanding of GST concepts, covering everything from registration to filing returns. You will gain hands-on experience with GSTR-1, GSTR-3B, E-Way Bill generation, and Input Tax Credit (ITC) reconciliation.

courses.description:
Fale comigo e receba um desconto: 85991821500
Olá você, seja bem vindo ao curso online de Contabilidade tributária completa e reforma tributária
Professor: Marteson Castelo Branco
Bacharel em Ciências Contábeis, pós em direito tributário, gestão de tributos e  finanças corporativas.
O que irei aprender nesse curso?
Sim! Nosso curso abordará os assuntos mais atuais e as mudanças em tempo real.
O que iremos aprender?
- Nivelamento para iniciar os estudos tributários.
- Tributos federais, estaduais e municipais.
- Regimes tributários – Lucro Real, Presumido e Simples Nacional.
- Noções de planejamento tributário.
- Reforma tributária – Como ficará.
- Aulas complementares.
- O conteúdo que iremos aprender servirá para empresas de todos os tamanhos, não somente microempresas.
Para quem é esse curso?
- Estudantes e profissionais de Contabilidade, Direito, Administração, Economia e Finanças.
- Empresários, Consultores e todos os interessados em entender de maneira detalhada a tributação das empresas.
Como estudar esse curso?


Se você não tem tanta noção do tema:
Estude de acordo com a ordem postada, aula por aula, módulo por módulo. As aulas e módulos foram postados numa ordem lógica de aprendizagem.


Se você já tem razoável ou muita noção do tema:
Pode escolher os temas que você julga que precisa melhorar, ou ir direto naqueles que você não tem tanto conhecimento. Se você já domina, por exemplo, PIS e COFINS, não faz sentido estudar de novo.
O que você será capaz de fazer após o curso?
- Analisar a tributação sobre o faturamento e lucro de uma empresa.
- Emitir opinião sobre a tributação de uma empresa.
- Fazer comparativos e planejamento tributário buscando reduzir licitamente a carga tributária.


Antes de decidir por se matricular, peço que você leia abaixo, gostaria de responder algumas dúvidas frequentes.
Tem certificado?
R: Tem sim. Após o fim do curso você pode baixar.
Tem material para baixar?
R: Tem sim. Apostilas serão disponibilizadas. para baixar.
Posso acessar por quanto tempo?

Posso fazer perguntas?

Posso solicitar reembolso?

Eu apresento a tela do meu computador, mostro os slides, faço as leituras, explicações, comentários e exemplos práticos de como acontece na realidade.
O curso será atualizado:

courses.title: Anatomy of a Civil Tax Controversy
courses.bio: From A to Z
objectives: What are the primary steps involved in the IRS audit process, and how can taxpayers prepare for each stage?
In what ways does the Appeals process maintain its independence from the IRS compliance function, and why is this independence critical?
How do the ex parte communications rules impact the interaction between Appeals and compliance during a tax controversy?
What criteria must be met for Appeals to raise new issues during the appeals process, and why are these criteria significant?
How does the Appeals process balance the need for efficient tax collection with the taxpayer’s concerns regarding the intrusiveness of collection actions?
What are the implications for a taxpayer if an agreement is not reached during the Appeals process, particularly regarding the subsequent steps they must tak
How can taxpayers effectively raise issues during the Appeals process, and what types of issues are considered relevant by Appeals employees?
In what ways can the legal and factual hazards of litigation influence the decision-making process of Appeals employees?
What roles do the IRS Chief Counsel and Appeals team manager play in the resolution of tax controversies, and how do their responsibilities differ?
What strategies can taxpayers employ to prepare for a potential Tax Court petition following a notice of deficiency?
How does the IRS's collection methods, such as installment agreements and offers in compromise, provide options for taxpayers facing tax debts?
12. What lessons can be learned from the case of U.S. v. KPMG regarding the limitations of attorney-client privilege in the context of tax advice?

Anatomy of a Civil Tax Controversy - Par: Anatomy of a Civil Tax Controversy - Part 1
Anatomy of a Civil Tax Controversy - Part 2
Anatomy of a Civil Tax Controversy - Part 3
Anatomy of a Civil Tax Controversy - Part 4
Anatomy of a Civil Tax Controversy - Part 5

requirements: Basic tax and/or accounting
courses.description:
There is a certain rhythm to the audit process, and it’s a very scary beat. In this presentation, I'll discuss the steps that most examinations begin and end with. We'll discuss eggshell audits, those audits where unbeknownst to the IRS at the start of the examination, the taxpayer has major criminal problems and what you can do to help shepherd your client through the pending storm. We'll also discuss the attorney-client privilege in the tax realm as well as the necessity to retain a Kovel accountant when there are underlying criminal tax issues that are lurking. Finally, we'll take a short digression into IRS Appeals.
Curriculum / Topics covered:
1. What are the primary steps involved in the IRS audit process, and how can taxpayers prepare for each stage?
2. In what ways does the Appeals process maintain its independence from the IRS compliance function, and why is this independence critical?
3. How do the ex parte communications rules impact the interaction between Appeals and compliance during a tax controversy?
4. What criteria must be met for Appeals to raise new issues during the appeals process, and why are these criteria significant?
5. How does the Appeals process balance the need for efficient tax collection with the taxpayer’s concerns regarding the intrusiveness of collection actions?
6. What are the implications for a taxpayer if an agreement is not reached during the Appeals process, particularly regarding the subsequent steps they must take?
7. How can taxpayers effectively raise issues during the Appeals process, and what types of issues are considered relevant by Appeals employees?
8. In what ways can the legal and factual hazards of litigation influence the decision-making process of Appeals employees?
9. What roles do the IRS Chief Counsel and Appeals team manager play in the resolution of tax controversies, and how do their responsibilities differ?
10. What strategies can taxpayers employ to prepare for a potential Tax Court petition following a notice of deficiency?
11. How does the IRS's collection methods, such as installment agreements and offers in compromise, provide options for taxpayers facing tax debts?
12. What lessons can be learned from the case of U.S. v. KPMG regarding the limitations of attorney-client privilege in the context of tax advice?
target_audience: Accountants, Tax professionals, Tax attorneys, anyone seeking to learn more about tax

courses.title: Personal Service Providers(PSPs) Course
courses.bio: The taxation of personal service providers
objectives: Definition of a personal service provider
Outcome of being a personal service provider
How to exit from a PSP classification
Deductions available to a personal service provider
Deductions NOT available to a personal service provider
requirements: No prerequisites
courses.description:
The taxation of personal service providers (PSP) was introduced largely to curtail tax schemes in which an employee would resign from employment and subsequently, form a company or a trust (personal service provider) and thereafter offer the same services to the former employer.
The taxation of PSP has been extended beyond this scenario and includes any PSP whether or not the services are rendered to former employers.


Topics Discussed:
Definition of a personal service provider
Outcome of being a personal service provider
How to exit from a PSP classification
Deductions available to a personal service provider
Deductions NOT available to a personal service provider
From the single shareholder perspective
Employees’ tax on a fee
Income Tax on taxable income
Provisional Tax
Trusts classified as a personal service provider


The Presenter:
Ruzel van Jaarsveld
Ruzel has over 26 years financial and bookkeeping experience, working with many industries and corporate environments, with extensive knowledge and practical application of trial balance, payroll, VAT, PAYE returns, Inventory control, Management Accounts, E-filing and Procedures of Importing and Exporting.
Ruzel is a seasoned appointed facilitator with Biz Facility, and for numerous years has been presenting various national practical financial workshops to business owners and corporate financial staff.

What you will learn?

courses.title: Tout savoir sur la transmission de patrimoine
courses.bio: Donation, succession, fiscalité. Préparer sa retraite, transmettre son argent et ses biens. Diminuer la fiscalité
objectives: Comprendre le fonctionnement de la transmission de patrimoine en France
Comprendre ce qu'est une donation
Comprendre ce qu'est une succession
Comprendre ce qu'est un testament
Comprendre la fiscalité relative aux donations et successions
Calculer les droits de donation
Calculer les droits de succession
Les solutions pour optimiser la transmission de son patrimoine
requirements: Aucune expérience nécéssaire, les modules sont prévus pour des débutants
courses.description:
Dans ce cours, tu vas apprendre les bases de la transmission de patrimoine, un sujet bien plus stratégique qu’il n’y paraît. Trop souvent perçue comme une préoccupation lointaine, la transmission mérite pourtant d’être anticipée, même lorsqu’on est jeune. Pourquoi ? Parce qu’elle permet de protéger ses proches, d’éviter les conflits familiaux, et surtout d’optimiser la fiscalité liée à l’héritage.
Tu découvriras les règles qui encadrent les successions en France : qui hérite en l’absence de testament, comment fonctionnent les parts réservataires, quels sont les droits de succession à régler, et comment ils varient selon le lien de parenté. Nous aborderons également les différents outils juridiques et financiers à ta disposition pour organiser au mieux une transmission : donation simple ou avec démembrement, testament, donation-partage, assurance vie, pacte Dutreil, et bien d’autres solutions patrimoniales efficaces.
L’objectif de ce module est de te donner une vision claire et concrète des enjeux liés à la transmission, afin que tu sois capable de faire des choix éclairés, pour toi ou pour tes proches. Que tu sois héritier, futur donateur, ou simplement curieux, tu comprendras comment construire une stratégie patrimoniale cohérente, conforme à tes valeurs, à ta situation, et à tes objectifs à long terme. Ce savoir te sera utile à chaque étape de ta vie.
target_audience: Personnes s'intéressant au monde de la gestion de patrimoine
Personnes souhaitant comprendre le fonctionnement de la transmission de patrimoine
Les jeunes héritiers ou futurs héritiers

courses.description:
ACCA is one of the fastest growing association, of Chartered Accountants of UK. In this course, we are providing one of the subject, (Taxation) of its Second level called as Skill Level. The aim of the syllabus is to develop knowledge and skills relating to the tax system as applicable to individuals, single companies, and groups of companies. The syllabus for Taxation - United Kingdom (TX-UK) introduces candidates to the subject of taxation and provides the core knowledge of the underlying principles and major technical areas of taxation as they affect the activities of individuals and businesses. On successful completion of this exam, candidates should be able to:
A. Explain the operation and scope of the tax system and the obligations of tax payers and/or their agents and the implications of non-compliance
B. Explain and compute the income tax liabilities of individuals and the effect of national insurance contributions (NIC) on employees, employers and the self-employed
C. Explain and compute the chargeable gains arising on individuals
D. Explain and compute the inheritance tax liabilities of individuals
E. Explain and compute the corporation tax liabilities of individual companies and groups of companies
F. Explain and compute the effects of value added tax on incorporated and unincorporated businesses
G. Demonstrate employability and technology skills

courses.title: Declaração de Imposto de Renda da Pessoa Física (IRPF) 2023
courses.bio: Imposto de Renda na Prática
objectives: Aprender na Prática como preencher a Declaração do Imposto de Renda do absoluto zero
Evitar em cair na malha fina da Receita Federal
Fazer o preenchimento de maneira correta
Conseguir Ganhar Dinheiro Extra fazendo declaração do imposto de Renda
requirements: Precisa somente de internet e um computador ou celular
courses.description:
Declaração de Imposto de Renda na Prática


Todo o conteúdo foi elaborado por quem a mais de 15 anos trabalha em contabilidade, foi feito especialmente para que você consiga dominar todo o assunto e se tornar um especialista em IMPOSTO DE RENDA, com o conhecimento adquirido você vai conseguir ter uma renda extra fazendo as declarações.
Esse curso é feito especialmente para as pessoas que gostariam de aprender como fazer corretamente a declaração do Imposto de Renda, evitando em cair na malha fina...
Primeiramente é demonstrado na toda a parte teórica referente as regras, obrigatoriedade, dispensas em cada situação da declaração, posteriormente é feito na prática a demonstração da maneira correta e efetuar o preenchimento...
Nesse curso é demonstrado e explicado todas as fichas da declaração, além da explicação sobre a Declaração de Ajuste Anual é explicado tudo sobre a declaração de Espólio...
É demonstrada o preenchimento direto no programa baixado no computador e também o preenchimento online...
É explicado como chegar na alíquota efetiva, como é feito o cálculo, a diferença entre declaração por Deduções Legais e a declaração Simplificada...
Além de tudo isso, tem aula referente como verificar a situação do CPF na Receita Federal, como fazer parcelamentos, caso tenha pendências como pode ser resolvido...
Everson Hirt/Contador
target_audience: Pessoas que querem aprender o passo a passo de como fazer uma declaração de imposto de renda

courses.title: Guia Prático de Imposto de Renda para INVESTIDORES
courses.bio: Aprenda a declarar IRPF dos principais investimentos do Brasil e exterior para otimizar suas finanças pessoais.
objectives: Como investir de acordo com as “regras do jogo”, aproveitando as isenções de impostos em suas operações financeiras;
Como enviar a Declaração de Ajuste Anual do Imposto de Renda da Pessoa Física;
Como declarar seus investimentos em Renda Fixa, Ouro, Dólar, Bitcoin, Imóveis, Fundos Imobiliários, Ações, Stocks e REITs;
Como realizar o lançamento de aluguéis, juros, dividendos, JSCP, bonificação, desdobramento e subscrição;
Como calcular o preço médio de seus investimentos;
Como preencher os principais campos e funcionalidades do programa IRPF;
Como utilizar programa Carnê-Leão Web e apuração mensal de impostos;
Quando utilizar o GCAP para apurar ganho de capital e recolher o imposto devido;
Como escolher entre o envio por Deduções Legais ou Desconto Simplificado.
requirements: Ter interesse em aprender sobre como declarar seus investimentos.
Também é desejável que você tenha conhecimentos básicos de matemática e informática.
courses.description:
Este curso prático de Imposto de Renda para Investidores é direcionado a pequenos e médios investidores, estudantes e profissionais da contabilidade que prestam serviços de declaração de imposto de renda para investidores. Durante o curso, você aprenderá a declarar a maioria dos investimentos disponíveis no mercado brasileiro e americano, conhecendo as regras de tributação e isenção de investimentos, e como otimizar suas finanças pessoais.
Você verá exemplos práticos de como declarar dólar, ouro, criptomoedas, poupança, CDB, LCI, LCA, Tesouro Direto, fundos de investimento imobiliário (FII), imóveis físicos, ações e investimentos no exterior. Além disso, aprenderá a calcular o preço médio de compras e vendas nas operações com FIIs, ações e investimentos no exterior, evitando assim pagar impostos desnecessariamente em seus investimentos.
Aprenderá sobre as obrigações adicionais mensais, que são esquecidas por muitos investidores. Entender sobre este processo lhe proporcionará mais tranquilidade na hora de prestar contas à Receita Federal nos programas IRPF, Carnê Leão e GCAP.
O principal objetivo deste curso é que você compreenda as principais regras e conceitos tributários que envolvem a declaração de Imposto de Renda para investidores, a fim de que possa investir melhor e conquistar mais patrimônio no longo prazo. Com o conhecimento adquirido, você poderá declarar seus investimentos de forma eficiente e consciente, evitando problemas com a Receita Federal e maximizando seu patrimônio investido.
target_audience: Estudantes de Ciências Econômicas, Contabilidade e Administração;
Contadores que realizam declaração de clientes que investem na bolsa de valores.

courses.title: Kryptowährungen und Steuer: Was jeder Investor wissen sollte
courses.bio: Einblicke in die Kryptobesteuerung in Deutschland
objectives: Du wirst einen vollumfänglichen Überblick der Krypto-Steuer erhalten
Du wirst in der Lage sein verschieden Szenarien aus der Realität steuerlich einschätzen zu können
Du wirst lernen, wie du deine Einkünfte aus Kryptowährungen korrekt ermitteln kannst
Du wirst den richtigen steuerlichen Umgang mit Sonderfällen wie z.B Airdrops & Forks lernen
requirements: Du solltest schon einmal etwas von Bitcoin gehört haben
courses.description:
Willkommen zum Online-Kurs „Kryptowährungen und Steuern - Was jeder Investor wissen sollte“, geleitet vom erfahrenen Diplom Finanzwirt und IT-Experten Werner Hoffmann, Mitgründer und CEO von Pekuna. Mit seiner Tätigkeit in bayerischen Finanzämtern und einem soliden Hintergrund in Informatik, bringt Werner Hoffmann das nötige Know-how mit, um Sie durch die Komplexität von Kryptowährungen und Steuern zu navigieren.


Der Kurs ist perfekt zugeschnitten auf alle, die in die Welt der Kryptowährungen eintauchen möchten oder bereits investiert haben, aber unsicher im Umgang mit der steuerlichen Seite sind. Wir starten bei den Grundlagen und klären die Frage „Was sind Kryptowährungen?“, um ein solides Fundament für die folgenden Module zu schaffen.


Als nächstes steigen wir in die Grundlagen der Besteuerung ein und erkunden die wichtigsten steuerlichen Aspekte, die jeder Krypto-Investor kennen sollte. Von dort aus bewegen wir uns zu den Sonderfällen der Besteuerung und decken spezifische Situationen und Herausforderungen auf, die sich aus Kryptowährungen ergeben können.


Im Modul zur Einkunftsermittlung zeigen wir Ihnen, wie Sie Ihre Krypto-Einkünfte korrekt berechnen und deklarieren, um böse Überraschungen mit dem Finanzamt zu vermeiden. Und natürlich haben wir auch eine umfangreiche Q&A-Session eingeplant, in der wir auf die häufigsten Fragen aus dem Krypto-Steuerbereich noch einmal gesondert eingehen.


Melden Sie sich jetzt an und sichern Sie sich Ihren Platz in diesem umfassenden Kurs, um Ihr Wissen über Kryptowährungen und Steuern auf das nächste Level zu heben. Werden Sie zum Experten und navigieren Sie sicher durch die steuerlichen Herausforderungen Ihrer Krypto-Investitionen!"
target_audience: Krypto-Investoren und Krypto-Anleger mit Deutscher Steuerpflicht

This course will also cover other important topics related to the Form W-9, including the purpose of the form, form expiration, changes in circumstance, and much more.
Course content:
Lesson 1: Introduction to the Form W-9
We will begin the course by explaining the basics of the Form W-9. Highlighting who should provide the form and who should not.
Lesson 2: Overview of the Form W-9
In this lecture we will provide a quick overview of the form, focusing on the header section and other key areas you need to be aware of.
Lesson 3: W-9 Line by Line Walkthrough
It's time to break down the form line by line, starting with the header section down to the certifications.
Lesson 4: W-9 Line by Line Walkthrough
We continue our line-by-line walkthrough.
Lesson 5: Expiration Period, Change in Circumstances, Common Errors, and No Form Provided
In this lecture, we will dive into the common errors and other important information you need to know.
Lesson 6: W-9 Conclusion
It's time to wrap up the Form W-9 and briefly review what we've learned over the course.

Our Foundation Course, which is the introductory course we offer, has been CPE Accredited.


We look forward to seeing you!
The ComplyPro Team

O que é a Tax One?
Em um universo com tantas opções, a Tax One se destaca como a mais completa solução fiscal para empresas. Desenvolvida na plataforma ONESOURCE, da Thomsom Reuteurs, é o mais moderno sistema desse nicho disponível do mercado. Seu foco, portanto, é revolucionar o departamento tributário de qualquer companhia.
Para isso, o software em nuvem apresenta incrível desempenho tecnológico de forma acessível e inovadora. Sua interface se conecta ao ERP da empresa, tirando todos os dados de uma mesma base. Ao mesmo tempo, conta com módulos federais, estaduais e municipais, acompanhando em tempo real a legislação e suas mudanças constantes.

Saiba mais sobre o Tax One
Sabendo o que é, como funciona e tendo descoberto as funcionalidades da Tax One, é impossível não se interessar. O sistema se apresenta como a plataforma mais completa do mercado, com módulos que asseguram essa posição perante os concorrentes. courses.title: Small business tax secrets every owner needs to know
courses.bio: Increase business growth by learning the legal business tax secrets you can use to pay thousands less in taxes
objectives: How to turn taxable income into tax-free income by holding meetings at your house
How to save thousands on payroll taxes
How to legally take a vacation as a business expense
How to avoid paying capital-gains taxes
How to ensure your tax accountant is doing everything they can for you
Many more tax-savings tips!
requirements: No prerequisites required
courses.description:
"Was very helpful and to the point. Covered alot of items in short amount of time. Thank you!!!!" - Phyllis
========================================================================================
In this course you'll learn ways to save thousands in taxes every year. For example, did you know that you can turn taxable income into tax-free income just by holding business meetings in your house once per month? Or that you can take legal tax deductions as part of a vacation? How about a way to eliminate capital gains taxes entirely?
This 12-video course explains the best tax strategies for each month of the year. This is NOT a tax technical course trying to turn you into a CPA. It's for freelancers, entrepreneurs, real estate agents, summer sales representatives, and other business owners who want to know how to make smarter business decisions related to their tax situation. I'll show you little-known secrets that anyone can use to pay less in taxes. These tips are critical for growing your company, maximizing cash flow, and outpacing your competition.
Each lesson in the course is direct and to the point using common language that's easy to understand. You don't have to be a tax expert to make better business decisions to save on taxes. You just need to know the rules of the game that can be used in your favor. After this short course, you'll have knowledge that will serve you for the rest of the time you're a business owner. There's also tips for how to save money on your tax return as an individual too.
target_audience: Freelancers & entrepreneurs who want to save money on their taxes

courses.title: Escrita Fiscal High Performance - Level I
courses.bio: Auxiliar Fiscal
objectives: Domínio completo da área fiscal: O curso abrange desde os conceitos básicos até as práticas mais avançadas da área fiscal.
Preparo para o mercado de trabalho: O curso inclui conhecimentos sobre o mercado de trabalho, ética profissional e desenvolvimento de habilidades essenciais.
Experiência prática: O curso utiliza softwares simulados e planilhas online para que os alunos pratiquem e vejam como é a rotina
Atualização profissional: O curso aborda as principais mudanças na legislação fiscal e inclui módulos sobre o SPED e outras obrigações acessórias.
requirements: Conhecimentos básicos de informática: Como navegar na internet, utilizar softwares de edição de texto e planilhas eletrônicas.
Acesso a um computador com internet: Para assistir às aulas online, realizar os exercícios e acessar os materiais do curso.
Organização e disciplina: Para acompanhar o conteúdo e realizar as atividades propostas.
courses.description:
Domine a área fiscal e conquiste seu espaço no mercado de trabalho com este curso completo e prático!
Torne-se um expert em Auxiliar Fiscal e abra portas para uma carreira de sucesso com este curso online abrangente e atualizado. Abordamos desde os conceitos básicos até as práticas mais avançadas da área, com foco em preparar você para o mercado de trabalho.
O que você vai aprender:
Fundamentos da área fiscal: Conheça o papel do Auxiliar Fiscal, suas responsabilidades e áreas de atuação.
Legislação tributária: Domine os principais tributos, regimes tributários e obrigações acessórias.
Escrituração fiscal: Aprenda a escriturar livros fiscais, lançar notas fiscais e utilizar softwares específicos.
Apuração de impostos: Calcule impostos como ISS, PIS/COFINS e retenções federais.
Obrigações acessórias: Domine o SPED, EFD, DCTF e outras obrigações.
Organização de documentos fiscais: Saiba como organizar e arquivar documentos fiscais de forma eficiente.
Ética profissional: Conheça o código de ética e a conduta profissional na área fiscal.
Preparo para o mercado de trabalho: Elabore um currículo de sucesso e prepare-se para entrevistas de emprego.
Diferenciais do curso:
Conteúdo completo e atualizado: Abrange todos os aspectos essenciais da área fiscal.
Aulas práticas e objetivas: Com exemplos reais e exercícios que facilitam o aprendizado.
Simulações e softwares: Experimente na prática o dia a dia do Auxiliar Fiscal.
Materiais complementares: Planilhas, guias e recursos extras para download.
Suporte do instrutor: Tire suas dúvidas e receba feedback personalizado.
Este curso é ideal para você que:
Deseja iniciar uma carreira na área fiscal.
Busca aprimorar suas habilidades e conhecimentos.
Quer se atualizar sobre as últimas mudanças na legislação.
Precisa de um guia prático para o dia a dia profissional.
Inscreva-se agora e comece a construir uma carreira de sucesso na área fiscal!
target_audience: Para quem está dando os primeiros passos na área fiscal, este curso fornecerá todo o conhecimento necessário para construir uma base sólida e se desenvolver profissionalmente.
Para você que já possui alguma experiência, o curso auxiliará a aprimorar suas habilidades, se atualizar sobre as últimas mudanças na legislação e dominar as ferramentas mais utilizadas no mercado.

courses.title: Income Tax Preparation When You're Self-Employed
courses.bio: Understand the basics regardless of changes in tax laws!
objectives: Learn how you can legally save hundreds of dollars in taxes, penalties, and interest you may be required to pay each year
Know when and how to make estimated tax payments to avoid penalties and interest
Understand the business deductions that may be available to you
Learn how to track income and expenses to reduce taxable net income
Know what forms you are required to file with your taxes from your self-employment income
Understand the questions asked by a tax professional or software about business operations

Estimated Payments: When to Make Estimated Tax Payments
How to Make Estimated Tax Payments
Filing Taxes When You Are Self-Employed: IRS Free File and Filing Software

requirements: You should be able to do simple math (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division)
courses.description:
This new course is designed for freelancers, entrepreneurs, and side hustlers that don't want to pay more in taxes than they are legally required to! It is a simplified view of the taxes that may apply to those with self-employment income. The principles discussed don't change even when the tax law does!
In this course you will:
Learn to legally save on taxes, penalties, and interest you may be required to pay each year
Learn how to make estimated tax payments to avoid penalties and interest
Understand the business deductions that may be available to you
Know what forms you are required to file with your taxes from your self-employment income
Learn how to track income and expenses to reduce taxable net income
Become comfortable with any questions you may be asked by tax professionals or software regarding your business operations
Stop being confused and frustrated by the taxes you are paying on income received by being self-employed. Whether you are a side-hustler with just a little income or your sole-proprietorship supports you financially, the material provided in this course can help you keep more of your hard-earned money in your own pocket.

Enroll now and be one step closer to saving money on your taxes year after year!
target_audience: Anyone planning to have self-employed income

courses.description:
Tax Administration is becoming one of the most challenging and time-demanding aspects of the work of a tax professional and the various penalty provisions of the Tax Administration Act are the main issue. This online course outlines, in understandable language and with a very practical focus, the various penalty provisions and how and when they apply.

The TAA is very technical and specific and it is essential for every tax professional or business person responsible for managing tax risk, to understand the rules and the process that has to be followed.

Outline of the various penalty provisions in the Tax Administration Act and an explanation of which penalties apply when

courses.title: UK Customs Declaration Training with tradePhlo
courses.bio: Getting started with the Customs Declaration Service (CDS)

Introduction to UK Customs & CDS: UK Customs and the new Customs Declaration Service
Functions, features and benefits of CDS
Data Elements (DE), SAD/C88 Boxes: Details of the eight data groups
UK Trade Tariff: Overview of the UK Trade Tariff
Commodity codes, structure, and additional codes
Declaration categories, types and special procedures
Import & Export Controls & Customs Proce: Customs Procedure Codes (CPC) and key changes in CDS
Documents and Certifications: Replacement of LIC99 override statement with CDS Waiver
Union & national document codes and status codes

requirements: There are no specific requirements for this course.
courses.description:
TradePhlo Customs Training Program is an online course designed to provide participants with the essential knowledge required to navigate the UK Customs and the Customs Declaration Service (CDS). The course is divided into eight modules, each covering a specific topic related to customs and international trade.
Module 1 provides an introduction to UK Customs and CDS, including the Border Operating Model, types of goods, functions, features, and benefits of CDS, and C88/E2 replacement. Module 2 covers data elements and SAD/C88 boxes, detailing the eight data groups, what data elements are, and the correlation table between DE and SAD/C88 boxes.
Module 3 focuses on the UK Trade Tariff, providing an overview of the tariff, its appendices, declaration categories, commodity codes, structure, and additional codes, and tariff classifications videos. Module 4 delves into delivery terms, valuation, and representation, including the commonly used Incoterms, additions and deductions in valuation, and representation.
Module 5 covers import and export controls, including sanitary and phytosanitary controls, rules of origin, Customs Procedure Codes (CPC), and key changes in CDS. Module 6 focuses on methods of payment and authorizations, including guarantees and authorizations.
Module 7 provides an overview of documents, certifications, and authorization indicators, including the replacement of LIC99 override statement with CDS Waiver, Union and national document codes and status codes, Import Matrix, Export Matrix, and example scenarios.
The practical training concludes the course with tradePhlo example scenarios, including an example CDS import declaration, example CDS export declaration, and key documentation, including SAD/EAD/C88 review.
This course is suitable for individuals and businesses that are involved in international trade and customs operations, providing practical knowledge and tools to ensure compliance with customs regulations and facilitate efficient and smooth international trade transactions.


Start a new Career
In addition to providing valuable knowledge and skills related to UK customs and the Customs Declaration Service (CDS), completing the TradePhlo Customs Training Program can also open up career opportunities within our company. As a growing business, we are always on the lookout for talented individuals who are passionate about helping customers navigate the complexities of customs and international trade. By undertaking this course and demonstrating your knowledge and expertise, you may be eligible to apply for Operational Analyst roles within our company. We are committed to providing a supportive and collaborative work environment where our employees can thrive, and we are excited to welcome new members to our team who share our values and commitment to excellent operational service.
As an Operational Analyst, you would be responsible for analyzing and improving our import/export processes, identifying opportunities for cost savings, and ensuring compliance with all relevant regulations. This position requires a deep understanding of customs procedures, which can be obtained through the TradePhlo Customs Training Program.
target_audience: Anyone interested in understanding UK Customs and its relevance to International Trade
Importers and exports looking to do customs clearances
Customs brokers/Freight Forwarders looking to understand CDS or shift from CHIEF to CDS
Graduates looking for a job in taxes and declarations

courses.title: Learn How to Get 501c3 Tax Exempt Online
courses.bio: How to complete US 501c3 Tax Exempt Applications Online for
objectives: Apply for a US tax Exempt Status online
Register Corporate Name
File for an Articles of Incorporation
Apply for an instant Tax ID online
requirements: Students should have completed How to Build Your Nonprofit Startup- Part 1 to have required information.
Students should be able to type info in Adobe PDF files in order to Complete assignments within the system.
Students should be familiar with navigating online, saving and retrieving online files.
Students should be able to legally apply for 501c3 status in the US.
courses.description:
In this course, aspiring Nonprofit startups will learn to account for the legitimacy of their organizations by gaining the proper documentation in less time and less money than it took prior to 2014. Fortunately today's technology will allow applicants to complete virtually all of their filing online. Students will learn how to complete applications leading to tax exempt status online. This will allow donors to receive tax related credit as a reward for giving to your cause. Students will also learn how to develop a project budget summary. This is important because many people are denied funding because their budget does not line up with their proposed projects. Additionally students will learn about the pros and cons of securing a fiscal sponsor and how to get one. NOTE: While the information learned will be quite useful, organizations that are absolutely certain that they will receive over $50,000 in each of the first 3 years of operation or churches that are not planning to house or operate social  or charitable services may not be able to apply through this online method.
Since this is a follow up course from How to Build Your Nonprofit Startup- Part 1, Students should have completed the exercises from that previous course. They will need to have access to their assignment results. Students need to be able to type info in Adobe PDF files in order to complete assignments within the system. They have the option to download and print those documents as well for manual completion. Students should be able to download, save and retrieve downloaded files to successfully complete course assignments.
The Course Structure includes: video lectures, quizzes, along with hands on assignments.
This Course may be completed in a 3 hours over the course of the number of days that it takes to receive feedback from applications.
Keywords include: nonprofit, startup,tax exempt, 501c3, 1023, fiscal sponsor, fiscal sponsorship, EIN, Articles of Incorporation, Tax ID
target_audience: This Course is intended for Nonprofit start-ups who want to obtain their tax exempt status in the US and those seeking to build a Human Services project. IMPORTANT NOTE: This online process is for those who DO NOT expect to receive more than $50,000 in the first 3 years of operation. The information and exercises are especially useful for those intending to apply for grants or seek funding.

courses.title: "SAP Tax on Sales and Purchases (TAXINN) Complete Configure
courses.bio: "SAP GST Tax Configuration (TAXINN) | Sales & Purchase Cycle Explained" 2025
objectives: SAP Tax on Sales and Purchases (TAXINN) | Complete Configuration & Process Flow"
"Complete Guide to SAP TAXINN | Sales & Purchase Tax Configuration in SAP"

requirements: SAP Tax on sales and purchase Complete Video
courses.description:
Video Description  SAP fico Tax on sales and purchase . (finance and controlling)
This comprehensive video tutorial covers the complete configuration and process flow of Tax on Sales and Purchases (TAXINN) in SAP ERP. Aimed at SAP FI and SD/MM consultants, the session begins by explaining the basic concepts of indirect tax and its importance in Indian taxation, specifically GST. It walks you through step-by-step configuration of tax codes, condition types, access sequences, and pricing procedures using TAXINN (condition-based) procedure.
The video also demonstrates how to create and maintain tax codes in FTXP, assign them in OBYZ, and integrate them with pricing procedures like TAXINN via MM and SD modules. You'll learn how tax is calculated during purchasing and sales cycles through live demonstrations of PO creation, MIRO (Invoice Receipt), Sales Order, and Billing (VF01).
Key SAP transactions and tables related to tax processing are also discussed, making it easier to trace and troubleshoot tax issues. This session is ideal for those looking to understand end-to-end tax flow in SAP from both configuration and practical perspectives.
Perfect for beginners and intermediate users preparing for real-time SAP projects or certification.
Let me know if you’d like a transcript or breakdown by chapter.
target_audience: SAP Tax on sales and purchase Complete Video

courses.title: よくわかる電子帳簿保存法の基礎知識
courses.bio: このコースは、よくある電帳法の改正点や条文を順番どおり解説するセミナーではありません。電子帳簿保存法に初めて触れる方が、その内容をわかりやすく理解できるように構成した、いわば学習するための講座です。
objectives: 電子帳簿保存法の基本を理解することができます。
対象となる帳簿・書類・電子取引の種類や内容について学べます
電子帳簿保存法を適用する場面と、その適否をYES/NOフローチャートで学べます
要件の基本的考え方を理解し、内容を横断的にマトリクスで整理できます
電子帳簿保存法に取り組むための順番・作業プロセスがわかります

はじめに: 電子帳簿保存法について
適用範囲: 適用範囲のマトリクス表
要件① 真実性の確保: 真実性の３つの具体的要件
帳簿・書類データ保存の真実性
スキャナ保存の真実性
タイムスタンプ付与の特例
真実性の要件のまとめ
要件② 可視性の確保: 可視性の３つの具体的要件
帳簿・書類データ保存の可視性
システム関係書類とは
スキャナ保存の可視性
取引年月日その他日付
可視性の要件のまとめ
要件③ その他: その他の３つの具体的要件
スキャナ保存のその他要件
電子取引のその他要件

requirements: 電子帳簿保存法に関心のある方であれば、どなたでも大丈夫です。
courses.description:
いま話題の電子帳簿保存法。世の中には、電子帳簿保存法に関するセミナーが数多くあります。しかし、その多くは、従来と比べてどのような点が変わったのかという改正にフォーカスしたものや、電子帳簿保存法の条文を順番通りに解説していく形式です。


そのため、専門家でない方がそれらを聞いても、電子帳簿保存法の内容を理解することはなかなか難しいのが現状です。


このコースは、電子帳簿保存法に初めて触れる人が、その内容をわかりやすく理解できるように構成した、いわば学習するために作った講座です。


電子帳簿保存法を一から理解したい方、仕事で電子帳簿保存法の知識が必要な方に、お役に立てると思います。


このコースは大きな3つの柱からなっています。


１．基本用語
電子帳簿保存法の対象となる帳簿、書類、電子取引について学習します。帳簿にも色々な種類がありますし、書類にも自社で作成するものもあれば、取引先から受領するものもあります。ここで、3つの用語をしっかり押さえます。


２．基本コンセプト
電子帳簿保存法を適用する形態について学習します。形態は基本、帳簿・書類・電子取引の3つなのですが、帳簿が優良電子帳簿と一般帳簿に分かれており、実際の適用においては、6つあります。YES・NOフローチャートを使って、適用の可否を解説します。


３．適用要件
電子帳簿保存法の適用するための要件を、真実性、可視性、その他の3つに大きく分類し、わかりやすく説明していきます。一見、バラバラに見える要件ですが、6つの形態を横断的に見てみると、実は理に叶っていて過不足なく設計されていることがわかります。


最後になりますが、このコースでは、学習効果を高めていただけるようにスライドは一式ダウンロードできます。コースの復習や社内検討の際の参考資料としてご活用下さい。


それではコースでお待ちしています。
target_audience: わかりやすく電子帳簿保存法を学びたい方
社内のＤＸ・デジタル化を進めている方
業務システムの開発に携わるシステムエンジニア・プログラマーの方

courses.title: Engaging SARS - SARS Requests and Turnaround Times
courses.bio: Basic concepts and ideas to help you get started with the SARS objection process.
objectives: Compiling and submitting your ITR12 or ITR14
Types of Communications that SARS can issue?
Effective communication with SARS: how much time do you have?
Engaging SARS –what does the (TAA) Tax Administration Act say?
SARS delaying refunds to taxpayers, what can you do?
SARS issued a letter of demand/verification –what happens if you do nothing?
SARS issued an additional assessment – what do you do now?
Objections 101 – getting started – the basics you need to know.
South African Tax
requirements: Basic understanding of Tax
courses.description:
****Please note that this course is based on South African Tax****


There are ways to reduce frustration, save time and costs when engaging with SARS. With tax filing season in full swing, many taxpayers are dealing with the reality of challenging a SARS assessment. However, the Office of the Tax Ombud recently found that roughly 94 percent of certain assessments raised by SARS over the period investigated lacked merit. This means that taxpayers should not have had to pay or otherwise deal with the consequences of an additional assessment.
This course incorporates basic concepts and ideas to help you get started with the objection process and will help you understand your rights when dealing with SARS, give you valuable insight into what SARS is looking for and how to structure a “notice of objection” to give you the best chance of success for yourself and your clients.


Topics Discussed:
Compiling and submitting your ITR12 or ITR14
Compiling your information
Types of Communications that SARS can issue?
Audit
Review
Effective communication with SARS: how much time do you have?
Turnaround times as per the TAA
Engaging SARS –what does the (TAA) Tax Administration Act say?
Applicable sections in the TAA to help you compile your objection.
SARS delaying refunds to taxpayers, what can you do?
SARS issued a letter of demand/verification –what happens if you do nothing?
SARS issued an additional assessment – what do you do now?
Objections 101 – getting started – the basics you need to know.
High level view
Drafting the letter to SARS
Suspension of Debt
Building your case


All Included:
Video presented course
Downloadable course material
Certificate of training
SAIT Accredited - 4 verifiable CPD points
--------------------------------------------------------------------
About the Presenter:
Daniel van Tonder
Daniel van Tonder is the Head of Taxation at FinSolve Accounting and Taxation – situated in Durbanville Cape Town.
He completed his B- Compt degree in Financial Accounting while still busy with his articles at Diemont, Zimmerman & Bolink Auditors in Polokwane.
After his articles he entered the private sector to gain valuable experience as a Group Finance Manager and Group Internal Tax Practitioner.
He is currently busy with his post graduate diploma in taxation through Unisa.
Daniel is a registered tax practitioner and a proud member of the South African Institute of Taxation.

courses.description:
Are you dreading doing taxes for your side hustle this year?


Maybe you've tried researching what you need to do to properly prepare and file taxes for your freelance or side hustle business, but you're still left feeling overwhelmed and with many unanswered questions.


Can I lighten the load for you?


You don’t need to dedicate hours upon hours to becoming a tax whiz.
You don't even need to hire a Registered CPA.


You just need to understand how a side hustle is taxed, along with what's needed to properly set up and create an efficient system for tracking your income and expenses.


As a Certified Public Accountant serving clients for 20+ years, this is what will set you up for smooth sailing when it comes to tax preparation.


That's why I put together this course for freelancers, gig workers, and people with side hustles just like you.


In this course, I'm going to teach you exactly what you need (and DON'T need) to do to prepare for tax time so you can avoid the headache of trying to figure this all out on your own.


A few things you will learn inside this course:
What you need in order to file your side hustle taxes (hint: you don't need to be an LLC!)
How to calculate your quarterly estimated tax payments
Why you should have separate side hustle business bank accounts
How to set up your side hustle financial "books"
